35a7(ti): du grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi las byang dang bskul tshig gi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten dbang
35b1(ti): can ji skad kun// srid pa'i mi la sman slad du// tshul bzhin bsgrubs naji ltar bgyi// rdzas dang 'thun pa ci la bsten// rtags dang mtshan ma ji ltar 'byung // rdzogs sangs
35b2(ti): rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// dben la gnyan pa'i nyams dga' bar// pad+ma mtshan dang ldan pa yi//
35b3(ti): rigs su gyur pa'i yum gsum yang // bsgrub pa'i don du bzhag par bya// rdzas su gyur pa'i yo byad kyang // tsit+ta bcu gcig yang dag ldan// ban d+ha lcang lor ldan pa yi// pad+ma'i
35b4(ti): rigs su gyur pa ru// mtshan dang ldan pa'i rag tas bkang // tshil chen zhun mar kha lngar gtang // gsur chen dud pa rgyun mi bcad// gsar rnying zhing gi gshog pa dgram//
35b5(ti): ci 'byor yo byad gsum ba sogs la// bdun gsum tshul bzhin bsgril bar bya// rgyan dang chas gos la sogs pa// shul chen ral ka gtso bo la// srid pa spyi blugs na
35b6(ti): bgos te// rtse lnga 'bar ba phyag cha bsnams// 'phreng ba chen po de bzhin bgrang // yum yang g.yang gzhi'i skrag pa la// rtse gsum 'bar ba'i g.yab mo thogs// 'phreng ba
35b7(ti): chen po gtso dang 'thun// dngos grub zhal bu rin chen rigs// dar dkar kha bcad de bzhin gzhag/ rdo rje rigs ldan rtag tu gsol// bdag nyid man ngag he ru ka/ sum yang
36a1(ti): srid pa bde 'gro ma// gnyis su med par bsgom bya ste// rag ta la ni srog snying drang // badz+ra shan ting pad+ma ka ru ti b+h+yo/ snying gi dkyil nas drangs nas
36a2(ti): su// mngon sum longs par bsams nas su// sku mdog dkar mo la nyi ma dang zla ba 'bum gyis thod dang 'phreng ba byas nas 'ong ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes na mig zur gsum pa gcig
36a3(ti): yod pa/ gsang ba'i phyag gnyis kyis pad+ma thams cad kyi ge sar bzung ba'o// lcags dang zangs kyi dri la zhags la snying brgyus pa 'phen pa/ mig g.yas pa nas khrag gi mchim
36a4(ti): 'dzag pas thams cad dbang du sdud pa/ mig g.yon pa nas bdud rtsi'i chu mig 'dzag pas sems can thams cad kyi gsos byed pa/ mig gnyis nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchi
36a5(ti): ma 'thor ba g.yu'i ral pa can/ bzod par gsol zhing brten dbyangs kyis bskul ba ni/ hUM/ che zhes chen mo gsang ba'i gzungs// thig le gsang ba'i yum gcig ma// dkar mo nyi
36a6(ti): ma'i thod 'phreng can// gru gsum 'bar ba'i mig gcig ma// g.yu yi ral pas srid pa sgrol// chags pa'i phyag gis pad+ma 'dzin// rin chen mchi ma skye 'gro'i gsos// tsit+ta'i
36a7(ti): zhags pas mu sngags sgrol// thig le gsang ba'i yum gcig ma// sngon chad sbyor mdzad ji bzhin du// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// zhes bya zhing gsang ba'i gzungs
36b1(ti): mar bya zhes dam ba ca' byas na/ zhag bdun na zla ba gcig ltung / bcu bzhin nyi ma gcig ltung / nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig na dngos grub kyi ban d+ha ra rnying gtubs pa dang / ra ga ta bsra/
36b2(ti): pas gang ba 'ong ngo // de man pa gzhan dag kyang 'ong ngo // ji ltar byung yang ni mtshan ma spang / nyi shu gcig la sku mngon du 'byung ngo // der bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin gsal bar
36b3(ti): byas la/ ga sar gyi rag ta dbang du bsdus te sbyor ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/ zla gam 'bul zhing sbyor ba'i tshul ston to// bdag chags pa ma skyes dang / mos rkang dkris bor nas
36b4(ti): mdzes pa dang chags pas sbyor ba dbul lo// der mngon du sbyor te/ gsang ba'i sems dang dngos grub sngar byung ba bsras la/ sna la bdag nyid mchod par bya/ de nas sgrub pa
36b5(ti): mo'i grogs mo la sbyin/ de nas ma mo gzhan la yang sbyin/ de nas tha tshigs dam pasras te/ gsang ba'i gzungs mar dam lung srul/ de nas phrag dog spang ba'i phyir/ sgrub zla gsu
36b6(ti): char sbyar nas ni/ sgrub zla'i so so'i dam bsre'o// de nas slad chad ci bya yang mi 'gal te bsam dgu 'ong ngo // grub pa'i yon tan ni ma mo gzhan lta ci smos/ khros pa'i dbang mo
36b7(ti): che bzhi dang / thugs gsang ba'i yang phyi mo ma sring gi tshul du las byed bskul na bran bzhin bsgo ba nyan no// he ru kas ni sku bskyed pa man chad tsam gyis ni 'dar lcug lkug brgyug rtsa
37a1(ti): 'ong ngo // 'jig rten 'dir bsam pa ches 'phral la mi 'grub pa med do// 'di sgrub pa'i dus su dang por gtor ma rnam gsum gtang ngo // bshags
37a2(ti): byang bya/ tshe rabs kyi lan chags kyi gtor ma btang / dam skongs bgyid/ 'di ni nyi zla thod 'phreng can gyi sgrub thabs so// srid pa bde 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs ni/
37a3(ti): mya ngan las 'das te/ 'gro ba'i don du thugs rje'i 'od kyis mdzad pas/ bsgom pa'i ma mo yin no// dben la gnyan pa'i gnas su ni// rigs bzhi yum dang ldan byas te//
37a4(ti): yo byad bzhi yang de bzhin bshams// gsar pa zhing gi mchod pa bshams// rigs bzhi ba na d+ha yang dag ldan// zhing gi dud pa rgyun mi ga cad// mchog gi phur pa bzhi yang
37a5(ti): dril// dung chen 'phrang bas yang dag bgrang // stag lpags g.yang gzhi gos su gyon// shun chen g.yang gzhi de bzhin gsol// rgyu ma bsgril ba'i zhags pa bsdogs//
37a6(ti): / chu dang ma 'dres dang sa ma'i khrag/ dam rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rtse gsum g.yab mo thogs nas su// bsgrub cing bstan pa'i lha mo ni// rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che//
37a7(ti): rdo rje rigs la dbang byed de// sku mdog dkar mo la g.yu'i ral pa can/ spyan gsum rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' la rdo rje'i ga bur 'khyil ba/ ma chags pa'i
37b1(ti): sbyor bas 'khyud pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje rtse dgu pa bsnams pa/ g.yon zhing gi g.yang gzhi bsnams shing bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud pa/ ma rgyan gyi rgyal mo la khros pa'i tshul
37b2(ti): ston cing sbyor ba'i mdangs can no// rdo rje khams gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che ni/ sku mdog sngon mo la nor bu rin po che'i ral pa can/ spyan gsum rin po che'i mche ba gtsigs
37b3(ti): pa 'od zer sngon po phyogs bcur 'phro ba/ gsang ba'i mkha' la rin po che yi ga bur 'khyil pa/ rgyu ma bsgril ba'i zhags pa 'phen pa/ bdud dang mu stegs 'ching ba// ma
37b4(ti): dbyings phyug ma la khros pa'i tshul ston cing sbyor ba'i mdangs can te/ rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag mo yin no// rdo rje pad+ma khros pa'i dbang mo che ni/ pad+ma rigs kyi dbang mo che ste/
37b5(ti): skaskra mdog dmar mo la bse'i ral pa can/ spyan gsum byi ru'i mche ba gtsigs pas/ gsang ba'i mkha' la byi ru'i ga bu ra 'khyil ba/ 'od zer dmar pos nub phyogs dbang du sdud
37b6(ti): pa/ khrag gi dngas ma 'thor zhing bdud dang mu stegs kyi snying 'byin pa/ gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas srid pa la 'khyud pa/ ma bdag nyid ma la khros pa'i tshul ston cing sbyor ba'i
37b7(ti): mdangs can no// rdo rje srid pa'i bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che ni/ las kyi rigs la dbang ste/ sku mdog ljang khu la rdo rje dril bu'i ral pa can/ spyan gsum rdo rje rgya gram gyi mche ba
38a1(ti): can/ 'od zer ljang khus byang phyogs dbang du sdud pa/ lag par g.yang gzhi thogs shing bdud dang mu stegs kyi mgo gcod pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' la
38a2(ti): bse'i ga bur 'khyil pa/ grub pa'i sbyor bas khams gsum 'khyud pa/ ma gcig pu ma la khros pa'i tshul ston cing sbyor ba'i mdangs can no// bzod par gsol zhing dbyangs snyan
38a3(ti): pas bskul ba ni/ hUM/ che zhes khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dkar mo g.yu yi ral pa can// spyan gsum rdo rje'i mche gtsigs ma// zhing gi g.yab mos mu stegs zlos
38a4(ti): shel gyi ga'ur gnas rigs 'chang // gnyis med sbyor bas khams gsum 'khyud// sbyor ba'i mdangs kyis kun la khyab// yum la khros shing srid pa'i gsos// bdag dang
38a5(ti): gnyis su med par sbyor// hUM/ che zhes khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog sngon mo rin chen ral pa can// spyan gsum rin chen mche ba gtsigs// rgyu ma sgril ba'i dril zhags
38a6(ti): kyis// bdud dang mu stegs thams cad 'ching // rin chen ga 'ur gnas rigs 'chang // mi lan sbyor bas srid pa 'khyud// sbyor ba'i mdangs kyis kun la khyab// yum la
38a7(ti): khros nas kun la khyab// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// hUM/ che zhes khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dmar mo bas yi ral pa can// spyan gsum byi ru'i mche gtsigs
38b1(ti): can// khrag gi dang mas bdud dpung 'joms// byi ru'i ga'ur gnas rigs 'chang // gnyis med sbyor bas khams gsum 'khyud// sum la khros shing rnal 'byor skyong // bdag
38b2(ti): dang gnyis su med par sbyor// hUM/ che zhes khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog ljang khu bsgyings ma la// rdo rje dril bu'i ral pa can// spyan gsum mche brgya gram btags//
38b3(ti): khra dang g.yang gzhis mu stegs sgrol// rdo rje ga 'ur gnas ris 'chang // grub pa'i sbyor bas 'jig rten 'khyud// sbyor ba'i mdangs kyis kun la khyab// yum la khros shing sems
38b4(ti): can sgrol// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// zhes skul lo// bsgrub pa la zhugs pa dang rgyu gcig bsgral/ zhag gsum na gcig bsgral/ bdan na gcig bsgral//
38b5(ti): zhag bcu gcig gi nub mo gsang ba'i yul du dam bca'/ gsum gyi nub mo sgra chen po 'byung zhing me chen po 'bar/ bdun gyi nub mo nam mkha' la sna tshogs pa'i ral pas
38b6(ti): thams cad la thibs so 'byung ngo // de lta bu dag byung ba dang bdag nyid dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad de/ zhabs lha brgyad brdzis pa/ phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pa/
38b7(ti): zhing gi na bza' rlon pa la// sbrul dang thod pas yang dag brgyan// dbang gi ngang las bsnyen pa bca'// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba dbul// dgu nas mngon sum 'byung ba dang //
39a1(ti): bdag nyid dpa' bo sgog pa yi// ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa la// 'dzum pa'i dngas kyis pad+ma bsdu// de nas lha mo'i chags sems kyis//
39a2(ti): gnyis su med par sbyor ba 'bul// gus pa'i tshig gis skan sgrogs pa// dpa' bo sgeg pa ye shes sku// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// pad+ma gsang ba'i mchod 'bul
39a3(ti): gyis// dgos pa chen po'i ngang nyid las// chags pa chen pos byin gyis brlabs// de skad bstod pa mchod pa 'bul// der ni bdag dang mngon sbyar te// drod kyi byang chub
39a4(ti): sems nyid dang // rag ta'i dngas ma bsres nas ni// sna la bdag nyid gtso mo mchod// de nas sgrub zla bzhi char sbyin// de nas sgrub pa'i ma mo sbyin// de nas dam bsres mna'
39a5(ti): bsgrags te// rtog pa'i phrag dog gsang ba'i phyir// bsgrub zla bzhi dang bdag sbyar te// kun dang dam pasres nas bsgrags te// gtor ma gzhan gyi gong ma sbyin// 'di grub na
39a6(ti): 'jig rten gyi bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub la/ lhur yang sri'u dang tshe la mkhas so// ma mo nas 'byung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos// ma mo bzhi yang bran mor 'khol lo// de ni
39a7(ti): khros pa'i dbang mo che'i sgrub thabs so// de bzhi yi ma bzhi ni sgrub tu skyon che ste/ bu mo 'grub na bu mos ma bzhi 'khol bas lhag par sgrub mi dgos so// da ni
39b1(ti): thugs kyi dges snga ma bzhi'i sgrub thabs 'byung ste/ de ni rta'i lo la chos bcu bzhi la bsgrub pa'i sa bshas/ brgyad la 'jug ste nya'i bar du bsgrub pa bya'o// de yi yo byad
39b2(ti): ba tsa la bya ba// dkar mo mgo gcig ban d+ha ni// zlum la pad+ma chags pa dang // 'jam la ri mo nyung ba ste// gtsug tu bu khung byung ba ste// dkar mo chen mo'i phyag
39b3(ti): na bsnams// ljon shing lcang los shin tu brgyan// ljon shing lta bu ya tsa yod pa// nag mo chen mo'i phyag na bsnams// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad rtsar bris// a dkar
39b4(ti): gtsug na yod pa ni// dmar mo dbang sgyur phyag na bsnams// dum bu gnyis su 'dug pa la// rdo rje rgya gram rtsar bris la// ser mo las mkhan phyag na bsdams//
39b5(ti): gtsug bsrubs nang du rub pa la// TI rnams gtsug tu bcings pa la// hUM chen dgur ni 'bar ba ste// dpal chen nyid kyi phyag na bsnams// zhes 'byung ste/ ban d+ha
39b6(ti): lnga dang ldan pa dang // shel gyi rgyu bzhi yang dag gsol// gnyan po chas su btsal ba dang // gzhan yang dam rdzas sna tshogs pa'o// skrag pa chen po gtso bo ste/
39b7(ti): zhwa dkar pos yang dbu brgyan no// 'jig rten gzungs bzhi rims sdud ma// sha mdog dkar la mdangs bzang mo// so thags dam la smin dkyus ring // dkar mo
40a1(ti): mig gcig tshul du snang // brtson 'grus can la drag shul che// ral pa can la hra ra'i mig/ nag mo ral pa'i tshul du snang // sha mdog dam
40a2(ti): la mdangs sdug ma// smra ba snyan la 'gro ba sdug/ dmar mo dbang sdud tshul du snang // zug bzhi ring la mche ba rno// sha mdog sngol brtul zhugs che// ser mo las mkhan
40a3(ti): tshul du snang // rgyal chen bzhi yi gzungs dang ldan// yum bzhi'i gzungs dang ldan byas te// yum bzhi'i bstan pa so sor drang // bdag nyid man ngag sems ldan pas/
40a4(ti): bzhi char bsnyen pa gcig tu drang // brten dbyangs snyan pas bskul ba ni// hUM/ shar gyi dkar mo mig gcig ma// na bza' tshil chen thul pa la// ban d+ha rlon pa'i dril bus
40a5(ti): brgyan// lan phran khrag gis 'khril ba la// dung gi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// shar phyogs srid gsum phur pas 'debs// dung chen 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// zhag gis
40a6(ti): lan 'phran 'khrigs pa yis// steng du ya bdud gtun shing 'ching // bar du brgya byin phung bar byed// 'og tu dmyal khams stongs par byed// ma g.yal thig le gsang ba'i
40a7(ti): gzungs// hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i lho phyogs na// nag mo chen mo mche ba can// na bza' zhing lpags gos zu la// ban d+ha skam po'i dril bus brgyan// rdo rje la phran rin chen
40b1(ti): 'khyil// lcags kyi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// lho phyogs srid gsum phur pas 'debs// shes rab thabs kyi thod rdengs can// dril chen ral 'phran gsigs pa yis//
40b2(ti): steng du ma hA de ba 'ching // bar du gshin rje phung bar byed// 'og tu byol song stongs par byed// ma g.yel thil le gsang ba'i gzungs// hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i nub phyogs
40b3(ti): nA// dmar ma tshan mo dbang sgyur ma// na bza' rag to'i gos zul// sbrul nag 'khrigs pa'i chun phyang can// pad+ma rag tA'i lan phran can// mche ba dmar po gtsigs pa
40b4(ti): yis// nub phyogs srid gsum phur pas 'debs// mi khrag 'bar ba'i thod rdengs can// rag ta'i lan phran gsigs pa yis// steng du tshangs pa chen po 'ching // bar du klu
40b5(ti): yi gnas rnams 'joms// 'og tu yi dwags stongs par byed// ma g.yel thig le gsang ba'i gzungs// hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i byang phyogs na// ser mo chen mo las mkhan mo//
40b6(ti): mdzes pa'i na bza' chen mo la// maM sa rlon pa'i thul pa can// dri chu khol ma'i ya bas bskor// lan tshar dri chu 'bar ba 'gyur// gser gyi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// byang phyogs
40b7(ti): srid gsum phur pas 'debs// maM sa spungs pa'i thod rdengs can// dri chu lan 'phran gsigs pa yis// steng du tshogs kyi bdag po 'ching // bar du gnod sbyin phung bar byed//
41a1(ti): 'og tu bgegs rigs stongs par byed// ma g.yel thig le gsang ba'i gzungs// gling bzhi gsang ba'i gzungs gcig ma// bdud rtsi rnam lnga dbu la
41a2(ti): rdzogs// g.yas na g.yang gzhi ru mtshon gyis// thams cad gnam lcags chen pos 'debs// mu stegs yag sha'i snying 'byin ma// g.yon na ban b+ha khrag 'khrug pas// bud
41a3(ti): med thams cad dbang du sdud// ral pa can gyi 'khor skyong ma// 'bum phrag yangs pa'i 'khor mnga' zhing // sgrub pa po la brtse dgongs ma// 'dir skyon sgrub pa'i rtags phyung
41a4(ti): zhig/ ces bskul ba dang / zhag bzhi'i nub mo dngos grub kyi rtags dang po'o// rag ta dang / tshil bu dang / mchog tu gtubs pa ban d+ha bzhi'o// dgu'i nub mo ban d+ha pad+ma rag
41a5(ti): ta dang / snang srid sbyor ba'i byang chub sems la sogs/ bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang bsres pa yang 'ong ngo // dga' ba mi skyed par myur du cig la longs spyod do// de'i nub mo rgyu bzhi yang
41a6(ti): der bsgral lo// bdun gyi nub mo bzhi char sku mngon du 'byung ba ni rgyan dang cha lugs su ldan pa/ shin tu yid btsugs pa'i lha mo bzhi 'ong ngo // bdag man ngag gi ting nge 'dzin gsal
41a7(ti): bar bsgoms la steg pa'i mdangs phyung ste/ gau sar gyi rag tu dbang du bsdus la/ pad+ma'i nang du rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ rim pa bzhin du zla gam 'byed cing sbyor ba 'bul lo//
41b1(ti): de ltar sbyar te gong ma'i tshul bzhin du bya'o// de nas phyi de nub mo mchog phran chas su gsal la bsgral ba/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i dngos grub kyang der sbyar ro// 'di bzhi ni
41b2(ti): go la phrag dog chung / dbang che la gsang ba'i dam la rub bo// bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub pa yin pas/ gsang ba'i dges snga mor lung sprul ba yin pas de man chad ci bya yang
41b3(ti): mi dgos/ sbyor ba yang dus su dbul lo// las kyang tshul bzhin du byed do// sgrub pa la 'jug pa tshul ni gong ma dang 'dra/ 'di ni thugs kyi rigs sde mo gsang ba'i yang phyi mo bzhi
41b4(ti): sgrub thabs so// 'di yan chad kyi ma mo grub na tshe 'di'i yon tan ci smos/ phung po 'jig pa'i dus su glu dbyangs dang / rol mo la sogs pa 'od dang rtags bzang pos bsu nas
41b5(ti): bde ba can gyi gnas su bsgrub mi dgos par skul lo// 'di yan chad kyi ma mo grub na/ 'di man chad kyi ma mo rang bzhin gyis grub pas 'og ma lhag par bsgrub mi dgos so//
41b6(ti): 'di ni ma mo gtso mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas ma bdun bsgrub par 'dod na/ gnas dur khrod du song la/ yum rdo
41b7(ti): rje rigs kyi mtshan dang ldan pa gsum dang / rdzogs pa'i slob dpon gnyis dang ging gcig gis bsgrubs te/ ban d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa skam po bdun gyi gsum du bdud rtsi rnam pa
42a1(ti): / lA ma bsgrubs pa'i skam por sku la/ gsum du 'jig rten gyi sman sna tshogs su la/ gcig tu byang chub sems dang rag ta nyi tshe stsa la/ ban d+ha
42a2(ti): rin po che mtshan dang ldan pa gcig tu bdud rtsi a mri ta srul te/ shel lding dkar nag gsum/ shel dkar po gcig/ rtsa ra nag po gsum/ ku ku ra dkar po gcig/ nam
42a3(ti): mkha' lding gcig/ mchog gi sman sbrang bam po gcig/ chas gos thams cad nag por bsgyur te/ gsur chen gyi dud pa rgyun mi bcad par phyung la/ 'dzab grangs pa dang /
42a4(ti): zhag bdun na sgra chen po 'byung / der rgyu zung gcig bsgral la mchod pa bya/ ma'i tshul du brten/ zhag dgu na mi sdug pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ste/ der zung gcig
42a5(ti): bsgral/ bcu gnyis la nyin mtshan 'byung ste/ der zung gcig bsgral/ sring mo'i tshul du brten/ bco lngan bdun car mngon du 'byung / bdag ma nyams na mdzes par 'ong //
42a6(ti): nyams na nag mo ral pa can ma cig cig byed pa/ mche ba dmar tsa re 'dug par 'ongs te/ bdag man ngag gsal na dbang du bsdu/ mi gsal na bzod pa gsol te bskang bar bya/
42a7(ti): man ngag dang ldan na dang po mi sdug kyang sdug kun ston no// dod mo nas sdug na pad+ma bsdu/ nga rgyal bskyed de sru mo'i tshul du brtag go// der phyag 'tshal zhing 'on dpon zer zhing 'o/
42b1(ti): byed do// der pad+ma rag ta hUM gis brngubs pa dang / rgyan bor nas gzungs ma gsum dang bcur byas nas/ mel tse thun re la gnyis gnyis kyi sbyor ba dbul lo// sna la ga
42b2(ti): bo dang sbyor/ de nas 'khor dang sbyor ro// de nas sbyor ba sna tshogs dang / byang chub sems gnyis dang / 'dod pa bzhin dam pasres te/ nga yi brnag pa'i las rnams kun//
42b3(ti): bka' los sgrubs shing pho brang stsal// bran mo yin gyi mna' ma bza'// zhes lung stsal te/ de phyin cad bran mo bzhin las byed do// da ni sbas pa'i ma bzhi
42b4(ti): bsgrub par bya ste/ yo byad gong ma kun gyi steng du zhing lpags kyi g.yang gzhi/ zhing gi rgyu zhags/ srid pa spyi blugs kyi zhwa/ ral pa can/ dung chen dang / byi ru dang / gser gsus
42b5(ti): brgyan zhing chen gyi rdza lnga thogs pas bsgrub ste/ rtags gong ma dang 'thun/ bsgrub pa'i thabs gong ma dang gcig/ yon tan ma bdun man chad kun 'khol/ des bsam pa
42b6(ti): 'grub/ lhur yang dgra la rbad par bzang ngo // da ni a ka dza ti bsgrub par bya ste/ stegs bu gru bzhi pa cig gi steng du/ dra phying gtsang ma cig bting la/ dam rdzas
42b7(ti): sna tshogs pa'i dmar gtor cig gi nang du sman gi wang srul la/ dar dmar po kha tshon gang ba cig gis kha bcad la/ kha nub phyogs su bltas te/ zhag bdun bstan pa byas la/
43a1(ti): yum mtshan dang ldan pa la dbab bo// bskul ba ni/ hUM/ srid pa'i ma mo yal dam can// skye 'gro ral gcig 'jig rten sgrol// mig nas khrag/
43a2(ti): 'thor stong khams bsreg/ kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems// ma byung ba yi dus mtha' nas// 'jig rten las kyi dbang sgyur te// sems can don la rab tu brtson//
43a3(ti): snying rje byams pa'i dkyil 'khor du// brtse ba'i sems kyis gshegs su gsol// zhes bskul/ yum mtshan dang ldan pa la phab ste dris na srid pa'i gtam smra'o//
43a4(ti): da ni bu mo spun gnyis bsgrub par bya ste/ hUM/ ma mo chen mo yal dam can// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dpal mo ba tsan// gnam phyed gos su gsol ba mo//
43a5(ti): sa phyed gdan du 'ding ba mo// 'khor ni gnam sman 'bum gyis bskor// chibs su gsar gyi sha pho chibs// mgo la g.yu yi rA bcu 'bar// phyag na gser gyi dril
43a6(ti): zhags bsnams// bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud// che zhes srid cig ma g.yel cig/ da ni bu mo chung ba bskul// hUM/ ma mo chen mo yal dam can// dan ting
43a7(ti): g.yu yi go tseg la// gser dang g.yu yi cod pan can// g.yu yi dril zhags 'bum gyis brgyan// chibs su dung sha dkar po tshabs// khas blangs dam bcas bsnyen lam
43b1(ti): ni// bskul nam bzhengs da tshur spyon// gser skye mas gar bu de yis bstan// byes su gar 'gro yang bsam pa 'grub bo// hUM ha dung ste hUM/ 'di rnams ni nang du
43b2(ti): brtan pa bcos dka'/ ma mo phyi ma rnams ni zhal nas gsungs pa'i sgrub thabs yod na phrag dog che la bcos dka' ste/ blo chung ngu rnams kyi don du mi rung ste/ 'dir ma
43b3(ti): gsungs so// sgrub thabs tha ma ste le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// / da ni ma mo dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u 'chad de/ yung dang dang sa ma tsa rnams la// rigs
43b4(ti): kyi ma mo la sogs te// gu ya gsang ba'i yum bzhi dang // rgyan gyi ma sring bsgom par bya// des ni ma mo dbang du sdud de/ dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u sta bco lnga pa'o// /
43b5(ti): / skyes mchog blo ldan man ngag can// sngon sbyangs rtsal shugs 'dir rdzogs so// lnga phung yan lag mir snang yang // dgongs pa dpal gyi skur bzhugs
43b6(ti): pas// rdo rje gshog rgod rtsal shugs kyis// dbang can bran du bkol ba'i phyir// gtan tshigs sgrub thabs 'di brnyes pas// dam tshig ldan zhing spyod pa bzang // 'gro
43b7(ti): ba'i don la dgongs pa yi// rtsal can rnams la 'phel bar shog/ gnod 'dul lha yis yang zhus pa// 'jig rten dbang can ji skad kun// srog chags
44a1(ti): kun la gnod byed pas// bskang ba'i cho ga ji ltar lags// 'jig rten mgon la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // 'jig
44a2(ti): rten makon gyi bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul yang dag pa// sarba ru pas thams cad skongs// skangs bzlog chen po'i las chen bya// ma hA shan ting mi g.yo rdzogs//
44a3(ti): zhi rgyas chen po'i las zhes bgyi// ngas gsungs pa la gdon mi za// sarba ru pa thabs gnyis te// sna tshogs pa yi 'bru sna la// ngar phye bre gang btags nas su// snang srid
44a4(ti): gzugs su byas nas su// dpa' bo 'bru lngas byin gyis brlabs// rnam shes chang bar bsgom byas te// sna tshogs spyan gzigs dkor chas brgyan// khams gsum sems
44a5(ti): can thams cad la// lus ngag glud du bsngos byin te// tshe srog pho nyas 'gugs byed pa// 'di ni phyi yi cho ga yin// gu h+ma sarba ru pa ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig 'bru sna la// ngar phye
44a6(ti): bre gsum bcad nas su// rin chen sna tshogs phyar btags te// sum cha gcig la ri rab gzugs// de nas ngar phye sum cha la// gcan gzan rgyal po drug gi gzugs//
44a7(ti): dkar la mdzes dang ldan par bya// rtsal gyi rgyal po drug po la// mdzes ldan gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// srog chags gtso bo drug po zhon// shugs kyi rgyal po drug po la// kha
44b1(ti): dog ldan zhing rgyan chas brgyan// 'dod chags gtso ma drug po zhon// 'dab chags gtso bo drug po la// sna tshogs dar gyis brgyan pa'o// sems can rgyal po de dag kun// spyan
44b2(ti): gzigs dkor chas yang dag ldan// ri rab bang rim dang po la'o// gtso mo drug la 'bul bar bya'o// de nas ngar phye sum chal// glang chen gzugs ni bcu bzhi dang // stag
44b3(ti): gzig la sogs bcu bzhi dang // mdangs ldan bya yi gzugs can dang // 'dod chags rgyal mo bcu bzhi dang // dkar mo ku ku ra tsa'i gzugs// srog chags gzugs ni de skad
44b4(ti): kun// ri rab bang rim par ma la'o// ma me bcu bzhi'i rdzas yin no// de nas ngar phye sum cha la// snang srid sems can gzugs su byas// kha dog sna tshogs yang dag ldan//
44b5(ti): ri rab bang rim tha mar gzhag/ sna tshogs zas dang nor bur ldan// srid pa chags byed la sogs te// sman mor grags pa kun gyi rdzas// ri rab bum pa'i rtse mo la// sna tshogs dar
44b6(ti): gyi rgyal mtshan lnga// grwa bzhi dbus dang lnga la'o// dkyil du dmar po dar gyi gdugs// gser skyems 'phra men skyogs lnga ste// dbus su bas yi bya 'o gang // stegs bu gru bzhi dri
44b7(ti): zhim ldan// rag ta dza gad maN+Dal la// sna tshogs me tog gcal bkram ste// de yi dbus su gtor ma gzhag/ de bas spags pa'i maN+Dal la// rdzas dang ldan pa'i gtor ma gzhas/
45a1(ti): dbus su dpal gyi mchod pa la// mda' dang dar sna zhags par ldan// phud dang rag ta sman sbyar ba'o// sngags mkhan chas su bya ba ni// dmar po
45a2(ti): nag po sngon po bzung // zhag gsum bsnyen pa byas nas ni// bla med ting 'dzin gsal bar bya// yang na cha mchog he ru ka/ skra mdog mthing nag ral pa can// dbu gsum phyag
45a3(ti): kyang drug pa ste// dbus mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar po// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje la// bar ma zhing gi dbyug pa la// tha ma sbrul gyi zhags pa yis// khams gsum ma mo
45a4(ti): dbang du sdud// g.yon gyi dang po ban d+ha la// bar ma zhing gi g.yab mo yis// ma mo thams cad 'gug 'dren pa'o// tha ma dung chen ga 'u ru// gnam lcags gzer gyis
45a5(ti): btab pa ru// mi phyugs kun gyi tshe dang g.yang // yi ge hUM gis bsdus nas ni// yum yang dug gsum dbang sdud ma// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang 'dra// gnyis su med pa'i
45a6(ti): mchod pa'abul// dpal chen tshe mchog he ru ka dang / dbang mchog he ru ka la yab yum 'dud pa'i mchod pa 'bul bar bsams la/ 'phra men ma yan chad 'khor du gzhag pa'i
45a7(ti): bsnyen pa ni/ he ru ka kro d+hi sha ri s+t+waM/ ha he phaT/ ma mo yo ki ni ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ lan gsum bzlas/ zhag gsum bar du 'bum bzlas te// de nas bskang bzlog gtor ma
45b1(ti): gtang / gong du dpags pa'i gtor ma la// che mchog he ru ka la sogs pa mchod// hUM/ bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// dkar
45b2(ti): nag dmar ba'i zhal mnga' ba// phyag drug phyag mtshan skye shi sgrol// sbrul chen zhags pas mtshogs 'gugs// g.yang gzhi g.yab mos thams cad 'dul// dug gsum
45b3(ti): dbang du sdud pa'o// yum dang gnyis su med pa ste// khro bo'i tshogs kyi mchod pa ste// thugs rje dbyings nas rol pa mdzad// ces bstod pa la sogs dang / dpal gyi ma
45b4(ti): tshogs gzhung bzhin mchod/ bshags byang gi 'phrin las bcol// de nas ma mo rnams kyi srog gi snying po nas kun bsdus te/ a mr-i ta la bden pa bdar// bdag nyid che ba'i
45b5(ti): nga rgyal bskyed// nga ni khrag 'thung chen po ste// khams gsum snying khrag kun gyi bdag/ nga ni rus 'cha' chen po ste// khams gsum keng rus dur khrod bdag/ nga ni sha za chen po ste//
45b6(ti): khams gsum maM sa kun gyi bdag/ nga ni skye 'gro dbugs kyi bdag/ nga ni skye 'gro bkrag gi bdag/ ma mo kun gyi re gnas yin// mtshogs skongs bzlog gtor ma long // tshe dang
45b7(ti): dbang thang mngon par spel// phag dgod dud pa btang nas kyang // gtor ma bsngo ba 'di skad do// hUM/ mchogs rnams ni gnyen mchod phyir// 'bru sna ni mang po dang /
46a1(ti): rin chen ni sna tshogs las// klung bzhi'i gtor na la// srog chags ni mad pos bkor// kun kyang ni rin po che// rgyan dang ni ma lugs
46a2(ti): ldan// 'jig rten ni zas kyis dkor// dkon pa'i rdzas kyis brgyan// mu men gyi stegs bu la// rin chen ni gcal bkram ste// byi ru'i sgras btsugs pa// spros kyi sa
46a3(ti): gzhi la// dbang gi ni dkyil 'khor ldan// dar dkar ni yol bres la// gsal ba'i me bus nas// rgyal mtshan sna tshogs btsugs// le brgan ni gdugs kyis bkag/
46a4(ti): dud pa ni gnyen phyung la// gser gyi sgyu ma bltams te// tshe srog gi sbyin du 'bul// chung srid kyi glung du 'bul// longs spyod kyi sbyin du bsam// 'dir spyon ni glud bzhes
46a5(ti): shig/ hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jig rten yongs kyi mnga' bdag mo// ma mo tshogs kyi rgyal mo ste// srid gsum yongs la mnga' mdzad mo//
46a6(ti): skyesgyu 'gro yongs kyi za byed mo// na bza' stong gsum g.yang gzhi la// thod rlon mang po'i 'phreng ba can// lag na snying gi longs spyod ma// 'dir spyon tshe srog glung ba zhes
46a7(ti): shig/ mdos bdag rdo rje rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// shar phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// dkar mo sprin chen gos zu la// log na gser gyi spu gri thogs// srid pa gsum
46b1(ti): gyi rus 'ju'am// 'di skyon masrog klung bzhes shig/ madros bdag chen mo mongs long zhig/ !/ rin chen rigs kyi rgyal saso// b+h+yo phyogs bams kyi mang 'bas
46b2(ti): mo// nag mo g.yu yi gos zu lo// bskal pa me yi 'od 'bar zhing // phyag na ma yi dkyil 'khor thogs// srid pa gsum gyi drod 'bebs te// skye 'gro kun gyi tshe 'phrog ma/
46b3(ti): 'dir spyon tshe srog glung bzhis shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos long zhig/ pad+ma rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// nub phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// dmar mo khrag gi gos zu
46b4(ti): can// lag mthong pa khrag gis bkang // skye 'gro kun gyi khrag 'thung ma// 'dir spyon tshe srog glung bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos long zhig/ las kyi rigs kyi
46b5(ti): rgyal mo ste// byang phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// lag na ne le'i rgyal pa thogs// ser mo rlung gi gos zla can// skye 'gro kun gyi dbugs 'phrog ma// 'dir spyon che srog
46b6(ti): glugrung bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos long zhig/ nam mkha' rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// 'jig rten yongs kyi mnga' bdag mo// mthing nag nam mkha'i gos zu la/
46b7(ti): gser gyi dril zhags bsdog cing 'phen// skye 'gro kun gyi bkrag 'phrog ma// 'dir spyon tshe srog klud bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos long zhig/ ri rab gling bzhi'i zom rtse
47a1(ti): nas// snang srid srog gi phur sogs bdag/ sku mdog mthing kha chen po la// dbu dang spyan ni cir yang ston// rin chen ral pa sna tshogs kyis//
47a2(ti): snang srid kha dog gsal mdzad ma// spyan gnyis mdzes pa'i mchi ma yis// g.yas pas snang srid dbang du sdud// g.yon pas skye 'gro gsos mdzad ma// lnga bcu rtsa bdun
47a3(ti): gtso mo ste// skye 'gro kun gyi mnga' mdzad ma// ma mo chen mo gshegs nas kyang // mdos bdag chen mo midos long zhig/ klung bdag chen mo glung bzhes shig/ che zhes
47a4(ti): chen mo dkar mo ste// nyi zla stong gi 'phreng ba can// lcags dang zangs kyi dril zhugs la// snying gi zhags pa bsdog cing 'phen// sprul pa chen mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos
47a5(ti): bdag chen mo mdos long zhig/ glung bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ che zhes chen mo nyi ma'i mdangs// srid pa gsum char sgrol mdzad ma// lag na shel gyi spu gri
47a6(ti): thogs// khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos long zhig/ grung bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hU~M/ che zhes nag mo khrag 'thung ma// srid pa
47a7(ti): gsum char dbang du sdud// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang // khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdes bzhes shig/ thud bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ hUM che ge/ da mar mo bdud rtsi'i
47b1(ti): bdag/ srid pa gsum gyi gsos mdzad ma// lag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs// khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas byung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ klud bdas
47b2(ti): chen mo grung bzhes shig/ hUM che zhes ljang nag gnas sprul ma// srid pa gsum cur gsang bar sbyor// lag na zhing ljags rgyal mtshan thogs// khros pa'i rgyal mo'i mang
47b3(ti): rgas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glud bzhes shig/ ma dos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ hU~M/ mtshan ni srid pa'i rgyan byed ma// lag na skra yi zhags pa thogs// phung
47b4(ti): byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glung bzhes shig/ hUM/ mtshan ni dbyings phyug chen mo la// lag na me yi dbyug pa
47b5(ti): thogs// phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ klung bdag chen mo grung bzhes shig/ hU~M mtshan ni bdag nyid chen mo ste/
47b6(ti): lag na zhing gi rgyu zhags 'phen// phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung // madros bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glung bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ mtshan ni
47b7(ti): gcig pu chen ma yi// lag na maM yi ga yong gzhi rdabs// phung byid chen mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mangs bzhes shig/ klung bdag chen mo grung bzhes shi/
48a1(ti): hUM/ gling bzhi mgyogs ma'i dkyil 'khor nas// srid pa shar gyi bdag mo ste// dkar mo chen mo mig gcig ma// lag na ban d+ha zlum po
48a2(ti): thogs// skye bar byed pa'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glungad bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ srid pa lho yi mnga' bdag mo//
48a3(ti): nag mo chen mo mche ba can// lag na ban d+ha sul mangs thogs// srid par byed pa'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glungad
48a4(ti): bzhes shig/ hUM/ srid pa nub kyi mnga' bdag mo// dmar mo dbang gi rgyal mo la// lag na ban d+ha lcang lo thogs// 'ching bar byed pa'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag
48a5(ti): lags kyi mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glung bzhes shig// srid pa byang gi mnga' bdag mo// ser mo chen mo las kyi gtso// lag na ban da rgya gram thogs/
48a6(ti): len par byed pa'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ da de'i khol mo la bsngo bar bya s+ya/
48a7(ti): srid pa yongs kyi zab mo// shan shan ne'u tshogs kyi rje// gos su mi lpags rlon pa la// tha ma mi mgo stong gis bskor// srid pa kun gyi bdag nyid ma// zangs
48b1(ti): ko na tsha'i ming nas byung // mdos bdag chen mo mangs pazhes shig/ krung bdag chen mo krung bzhes shig// ha la ha la gdong brgyas// srid pa kun gyi khyim bdag mo//
48b2(ti): sdug lpags g.yang gzhi gos su gon// he ru kas nir ming nas byung // mdos bdag lags kyi mdos bzhes shig/ grud bdag chen mo grung bzhes shig/ 'jig rten kun
48b3(ti): gyi byan mkhan mo// sprin dkar mdzes pa gos su gyon// lag na ma yi pags pa thegs// e ka dza ti'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glung
48b4(ti): bdag chen mo klud bzhes shig/ hUM/ cha byad sngon mo chen mo la// mu tig go 'phang gos zul// tshe dang g.yang la rku 'phrog byed// nam mkha'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung // mangs
48b5(ti): bdag chen mo mangs bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo grud bzhes shig/ cha byad dkar mo chen mo la// lag na lcags kyu 'bar ba thogs// gling bzhi nyul byed ming nas phyung // ri
48b6(ti): rab gling bzhi'i gru 'degs ma// cha byad dkar mo sgeg ma la// lag na rdo rje kha T+wAM thogs// ha ra ting dkar mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mangs bzhes shig/ klung
48b7(ti): bdag chen mo krung ba zhes shig/ cha byad nag mo chen mo la// lag na me yi 'khor lo thogs// dun ting nag mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos pazhes shig/ grung bdag
49a1(ti): chen mo glung bzhes shig/ cha byad dmar mo sgeg ma la// lag na chu yi 'khor lo thogs// shan ting dmar mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo
49a2(ti): mdos bzhes shig/ glung bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ cha byad ser mo sgeg ma la// lag na rlung gi 'khor lo thogs// grub ting ser mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag
49a3(ti): chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ dmag gi rgyal mo chen mo bzhi// rigs bzhi dmag dpung 'khor gyis bskor// kha rje za kha'i bdag mo ste/
49a4(ti): mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo glung bzhes shig/ dngos po cha byad nag mo la// 'jigs su rung ba'i ral pa can// sku stod stag lpags g.yang gzhi
49a5(ti): la// sku smad zangs kyi zhabs ma can// mi phyug gsod pa'i khri ba thogs// khyod ni 'dod khams gtso mo ste// gshin rje ma chen ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes
49a6(ti): shig/ glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ lha chen brgyad kyi ma chen mo// srin mo chen mo bskam ma dang / srin mo chen mo rab tu bskul ma dang / srin mo chen mo phor thogs ma dang /
49a7(ti): srin mo chen mo dri 'dod ma dang // srin mo chen mo g.yang gzhi ma dang / srin mo chen mo gsod byed ma dang / srin mo chen mo sha za mo dang / 'jig rten khams 'di 'khrug byed cing //
49b1(ti): srog chags kun la gnod byed ma// mkhal ma snying dang nad khrol gyis// snyim pa shin tu bkang nas su// rang gis rang la thim par stob// za yin rnam pa kun tu rgyug/ ma bdun
49b2(ti): chen mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glung bdag chen mo grung bzhes shig/ shar phyogs khams nas kun tu rgyug/ mi mgo'i phor ba khrag gis ba
49b3(ti): grong sgor 'thor zhing nad 'bebs ma// ma bdun chen mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag lags kyi mdos bzhes shig/ glung bdag lags kyi glung bzhes shig/ gling bzhi kun
49b4(ti): tu rgyug 'gro ste// sa 'og kun nas snoms byed cing // 'jig rten 'chi bdag za ba mo// sa bdag chen mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud
49b5(ti): bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ nag mo chen mo ha la hral mo// thab dang gzhob kyi gdong zla mo// ma yams chen mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig
49b6(ti): glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ gling bzhi kun gyi rgyug 'gro ma// phyogs bzhi dag na sring mor grags// sring mo chen mo pho nya'i tshul// pho nya chen mo'i ming nas phyung //
49b7(ti): mdos bdag lags kyi mdos bzhes shig/ grung bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ gzhan yang dbang phyug ma dang / brten ma yang brjod/ gtor ma yang gtang / 'khar
50a1(ti): brdungs te/ klu stan dbyangs kyang blangs nas su// khrom lam 'am na ri DUr bsgral// man dag sman pas rtse dpal drangs// des ni bsam pa 'i bzhin
50a2(ti): 'grub// de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas// lha rnams 'chi bas 'jigs gyur te// rab tu spangs te skrag gyur nas// gnod 'dul lha yis 'di skad gsol// sbrul grog ni
50a3(ti): mchis gyur na// 'di rten go cha'i phan yon gang // 'jig rten mi la ji ltar bsgrags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di rten phan yon bsam mi khyab// 'jig
50a4(ti): rten mi la sgrogs pa ni// lha mo yongs 'khyud bde ba'i skal// lha rnams khyed kyis bsgrags mi dgos// gling bzhi'i spyi mdos chen po'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//
50a5(ti): / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// cho ga 'di brten phan yon gang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bshad du gsol// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig
50a6(ti): gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// lha rnams srog gi 'jigs 'gyur na// srog chags gzhan lta smos ci dgos// srid gsum dbang can 'di bskangs na// dus min 'chi ba'ang bzlog
50a7(ti): par 'gyur// dus la bab pa nur bar nges// 'jig rten longs spyod brten par 'gyur// rabs brgyud chad pa'i lha dang mi// cho ga 'di la brten byed na// spun bzhi bu yis
50b1(ti): 'dur bar nges// cho ga 'di la brten byed na// 'chi bdag zhags pas zin pa yang // zhags pa nag po bcad nas su// smyo 'bog nyid kyang rnam par 'jig/ tshe ring bde
50b2(ti): ba phun sum tshogs// 'jig rten 'di na bde skyid de// rig 'dzin sa la de bzhin gnas// cho ga 'di la brten byed na// bran g.yog 'gab rnams 'phel bar 'gyur// gzhan
50b3(ti): ma rnams kyis bkur sti zhing // rgyal po lta bur che bar 'gyur// cho ga 'di la brtan byed na// dbul po nor phyugs 'phel ba dang // skyid pa rtag cing bsam pa 'grub// dbyig
50b4(ti): la sogs pa rtag tu rnyed// rmang pos phyogs bzhi yul yang zin// des na mya ngan sdug bsngal med// pha rol dmag dpung rnam par 'jig/ lo phyugs rtag tu legs par
50b5(ti): 'gyur// cho ga 'di la brten byed na// 'jig rten dbang can thams cad kyis// byang chub sems ltar bkur sti zhing // tshe dar chung srid 'phel ba dang // bsgo ba'i tshig rnams
50b6(ti): bran bzhin nyan// 'di yi yon tan bsod nams kyis// phyi ma'i dngos grub mchog yin te// bsod nams nyid du gong na med// 'di la yon tan brjod mi lang // de skad
50b7(ti): gsungs pas lha rnams dga'// mdos kyi phan yon gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// dbang can mo rnams
51a1(ti): bskang ba yis// dbang byed po la mi 'tshal lam// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// 'dod
51a2(ti): chags nga rgyal chen po yis// zhe sdang byed la dbang mo che// srid pa'i ma yis 'jig rten bskyed// 'di bskangs kyang bzlog cho ga rdzogs// de nas pho ris bcos 'dod na// /
51a3(ti): stegs bu go 'phang mthon dman byed// cho ga'i rdzas ni 'di ltar ro// 'bru sna bcu gsum ngar phye la// rin chen sna brgyad bdar nas kyang // rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su
51a4(ti): bya// dbang po yan lag rin po che// gsal byed brgyad kyang de bzhin bzhag/ sna lnga dar gyi tshom bu lnga// lus dang yan lag de bzhin rgyan// bdud dang brang dkar chen po
51a5(ti): dang // de ba nor gyi bdag po dang // gshin rje ru tra'i rdzas yin te// skyes to re la'ang de bzhin no// bre cha gsang phye bre bzhi la// mkhar thabs mda' yis rnam par brgyan//
51a6(ti): legs bzang dar dkar dgu yis rkyen// de bzhin sha dang rin chen chang // dkar glud rkyen dang chas pa ni// dkar po che la de bzhin no// bye chagasang phye bla gam la// za
51a7(ti): 'og mda' yis rnam par brgyan// legs bzang dar dkar mda' yis rkyen// de bzhin sha dang rin chen chang // se slud rkyen dang chas pa ni// byang shar mtshams su de bzhin
51b1(ti): no// nas dang nyungs kar don gyi rgyun// srid pa kun la de bzhin te// 'byung po phal la sme gtor byed// de'i tshe na 'di skad brjod par bya'o// kye / dpag bsam shi
51b2(ti): gi sked pa la// gser mkhar de ni ser po la// gser sgo ni thabs sa thabs// g.yu thod ni sngon pos bskor// de'i bdag po ste// skos rje ni brang dkar cig/ skos
51b3(ti): mkhan ni ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen po mdos long zhig/ glud bdag chen po glud bzhes shig/ gser mkhar ni dbu rtse nas// rin chen ni stegs bu la//
51b4(ti): lkugs kyi mu khyud can// de'i nang shed na// srid pa ni brang dkar ma// zhig 'dzin ni ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen po mdos long zhig/ glud bdag chen po glud bzhes
51b5(ti): shig/ rim pa ni bcu gsum na// gnam gyi stang shed na// lkugs mkhar ni sngon po na// gser gyi ni mtha' bskor zhing // zangs kyi ni sgo sprul pa// de yi ni
51b6(ti): bdag po ste// dbang phyug ni chen po la// ma ha ni shwa ra shig/ nag po ni chen po la// ya bdud ni ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen po mdos long zhig/ glud bdag
51b7(ti): chen po glud bzhes shig/ de yi ni gling phran na// yar gyi ni yar la shod// bdud pas ni thabs mkhas te// bdud pas ni shugs drag ste// 'gro ba ni kun gyi bdud//
52a1(ti): 'gro ba'i tshe dpal 'phrog/ skyes bu ni skyes to re// ya bdud rgyal 'theb ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen po mdos long zhig/ glud bdag chen
52a2(ti): po glud bzhes shig/ lho phyogs kyi gling na bzhugs// rus mkhar gling dgu'i bdag po ste// shi bdag kun gyi khrab 'debs ma// gshin rje'i rgyal po'i ming nas phyung /
52a3(ti): mdos bdag chen po mdos long zhig/ glud bdag chen po glung bzhes shig/ gnam gyi mthongs na gnas pa ste// 'dzam bu gling ni nor gyi bdag/ ma hA de ba lha chen po//
52a4(ti): btsun mo u ma de bar bcas// nor lha chen po'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen po mdos long zhig/ glud bdag chen po glud bzhes shig/ byang phyogs gnam gyi
52a5(ti): mthongs na gnas pa ste// dung mkhar ni dkar po la// g.yu'i mtha' bskor cing // bas yi ni sgo sru la ni// de yi ni bdag po ste// khyab 'jug dung gi thor tshugs can//
52a6(ti): gnam lha dkar po'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen po mdos long zhig/ glud bdag chen po glung bzhes shig/ byang shar gyi mtshams shes na// bas mkhar ni gling dgu na//
52a7(ti): dung gi ni mtha' bskor te// lcags kyi ni sgo srul ba// de yi ni bdag po ste// shar phyogs gnam sa phyed kyi bdag/ tshangs thur lus la thor tshugs mgo/ btsan 'gong rgyal
52b1(ti): po'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen po mdos long zhig/ glud bdag chen po glud bzhes shig/ sa btsan rol po rgya rol po// mdos bdag chen po mdos bzhes shig/
52b2(ti): glang bdag chen po glung bzhes shig/ btsan la sogs pa de bzhin no// da ni ma hA shan ting gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ gsang phye khal gcig la// ji ltar
52b3(ti): 'dod pa'i zas byas la// dkor cha spyan gzigs yang dag ldan// de ni phyi rgyud shan ting ngo // de la 'jig rten shes bskor te// dmar gtong dam rdzas ldan pa ni//
52b4(ti): ting gsang ba'i cho ga yin// gnyan pa'i sa ni bde ba ru// gru bzhi spos chus maN+Dal la// zas byin stang du gang bar gzhag/ las dang phan yon gong ma bzhin// bsngos pas
52b5(ti): sbas pa de bzhin gzhag/ phyi rgyud 'thun te dkar po'i gos// gsang bar 'thun te gnyis kar 'dra// 'di brtsams bsam pa ma grub na// 'jig rten dbang can phung bar 'gyur//
52b6(ti): las rnams kun gyi brnag pa ste// cho ga rdzogs lung chen po 'di// gang gis rtogs pa dngos grub ste// ngas gsung ba la the tshom med// de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas// 'jig
52b7(ti): rten dbang can mngon par dga'// lha rnams thams cad mthu skyes nas// sems can kun la phan pa bsgrub// dam tshig mtha' la rnam par 'gyur// pho mdos kyi le'u ste bco
53a1(ti): brgyad pa'o// / g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed pa// lu gu rgyud la 'gal byed pa//
53a2(ti): sems can kun la gnod byed pa// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems bsgyur ba'i// nan thur las rnams ji ltar 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa
53a3(ti): gsan nas kyang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems bsgyur te// sems can kun la gnod pa la// nan thur las rnams ngas bstan gyis//
53a4(ti): nyon cig gnod 'dul yang dag pa// ji ltar yid 'thad gnas su ni// dkyil 'khor mtshan dang ldan pa dang // dbang gi dkyil 'khor kha sprod la// dbus su kun tu bzang mo'i
53a5(ti): mkha'// mdzub gang ba la drag por bri// ze ba sor bzhi cha skams la// 'gugs dang spor ba'i sngags kyis brgyan// dbang gi dkyil 'khor kha ra na la// gnan dang 'phang ba'i
53a6(ti): sngags kyis bskor// de nas kha ran gru bzhi la// sor brgyad pa yi tshad du bya// rdo rje pad+ma'i spel mar bri// de nas maN+Dal rgyas pa la// 'od dpung thod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan//
53a7(ti): sgo bzhir mkha' bzhis brgyan par bsams// de nas rdzas kyi ngo bo ni// rgyu yi gtso bo dgu sogs te// grub pa'i rnal 'byor dgu rbad pa// gnyis la chags 'dzin spun gnyis
53b1(ti): bri// bdun la ma bdun sngags bris te// drag po'i kha dran 'khor lo bzhag/ dbang dang drag por ldan pa yi// lcags zangs shing bu gang yang rung // dbang drag phur bu dgu po
53b2(ti): la// mgo la mkha' 'gro lnga lnga bsam// ngos la rnal 'byor bcu bzhi bsgom// sked par chags 'dzin la sogs bsam// rtse mor ma mdun bsam nas su// dmigs pa'i
53b3(ti): dngos po gang yang rung // dkar nag dkyil du brgyab nas su// dge sdig las kyi mtshams phye nas// dngas ma'i dngos po thams cad kun// gtubs nas ma mo'i zas bstabs
53b4(ti): na// de ltar brgya ba na lha yang 'chi// dang por bdag nyid bsgom bya ba// 'phra men rgya mtsho nyid kyi sku// dbang drag sku mdog chen mo la// dbu gcig zhal lnga 'jigs pa'i sku//
53b5(ti): dbu la mkha' 'gro lnga bsgom zhing // mche ba can la gtsigs shing bzhad// ma mo thams cad dbyings nas 'gyed// phyag na dbang drag phur bu 'dril// 'dran dang gnan dang phar
53b6(ti): 'phang ba'i// sngags rnams rab tu bzlas byas nas// rnal 'byor ma rnams rbad nas su// gang la bya ba'i dngos po de// dbang drag dkyil du bzung nas ni// rnam shes dbyings
53b7(ti): su btab pa dang // dge sdig las rnams sbyangs nas su// lha zug phral nas zos bsams nas// rdo rje brag kyang 'jig par 'gyur// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// ces bka'
54a1(ti): stsal pa dang // de nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gtso bo rdo rje sems dpa' stan las langs te/ gar gyi brda phyug btsal nas 'di
54a2(ti): skad ces gsol to// dbang drag dkyil 'khor byin parlabs dang // dbang drag phur bu'i cho 'phral gyis// 'dran gnon spor ba sngags kyi mthu// mgon po chen pos bstan du
54a3(ti): gsol// de skad ces rdo rje sems dpas gsol pa gnang ste/ ci yang mi gsung bar dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor du ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ badz+ra bo d+hi dz+wa la maN+Dal la ga bu
54a4(ti): tra b+ha ga tra ta// tra stau baM kI la ya/ dzA hUM nan s+pha ra na ya/ tsit+ta pu ka zhes gsungs pas/ khams gsum thams cad mkha' gru gsum gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor/ ga ting dpag med
54a5(ti): pa'i gzhal yas khang dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor du gyur nas/ dbang drag gi phur bu ya shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis brgyab pas/ steng nas char du 'babs pa/ dbang drag
54a6(ti): gdengs pa'i gting khung du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs te/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang lha gnod 'dul kha sbub tu brgyal/ dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor gyi gdengs kar srid pa'i
54a7(ti): dbang can mang po ni ga nakyil du bskyal te/ snying dkar nag gi mtshams su phur pa phog ste dag sdig gi sha mtha' phyed nas/ sems kyis sems su byin gyis brlabs so// de
54b1(ti): nas thams cad brgyal bsas pa dang / 'di skad ces glu blangs so// dbang drag dkyil 'khor yum gyi mkha'// mkha' yi dkyil 'khor bde gshegs gnas// gting dpag
54b2(ti): med pa'i gzhal yas su// dbyings nas dbang drag phur bu yis// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun// rang rgyud snying nas drangs nas su// dbang drag mkha' la gzhag nas
54b3(ti): kyang / slan chad gsang ba'i dbyings su sbyor// gu h+ye b+ha ga sa ma ya s+t+waM/ laM laM ma tsi ta ho/ zhes gsungs pas/ brgyal ba thams cad dran pa slar rnyed/ de nas dbang
54b4(ti): drag gi dkyil 'khor nas/ snying 'dar yod yang byed pa rang rang gis tshor ro// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas// dkyil 'khor chen po a la la// dbang drag dkyil
54b5(ti): 'khor bde ba'i mchog/ gsang sngags chen po a la la// 'dren gnon spor 'phang cho 'phrul che// mtshon cha chen po a la la// dbang drag phur bu dge sdig sbyong // khrag
54b6(ti): 'thung chen po a la la// bla med khrag 'thung che ba tsan mchog/ mkha' 'gro chen po a la la// ye shes mkha' 'gro sprul pa'i mchog/ ces smras so// rdo rje sems dpas
54b7(ti): yang gsol pa/ rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyi mchog/ mu stegs thams cad kyi gshed bdag nyid de/ bdag gi ming yang rdo rje sems dpar btags pa yin na/ 'dir bla/
55a1(ti): med bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor chen po rung dag kyang brgyal bar gyur na/ mi mthun pa gzhan lta smos kya
55a2(ti): 'tshal/ dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di/ dus gsum du 'gyur ba med par brtan pa nyid du bdag nyid 'dzin ces gsol pa dang / de nas dbang gi dkyil 'khor chen
55a3(ti): po yis mu stegs ka la chen po gdan du bting bar gyur to// bsgrub pa'i bar chad byed pa dang / rnal 'byor gyi dgra bgegs gnon pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// /
55a4(ti): / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dbang can 'di rnams kun// srog gis bskangs na ji ltar bskang // nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan
55a5(ti): 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// srid pa'i/
55a6(ti): dbang can 'di rnams kun// srog gis bskangs pa 'di rnams so// hUMgatso mo yum gyi mngon spyod ma// spyi gtsug ga yu yi rdo rje rtse dgu 'bar// g.yu yi ral pas stong
55a7(ti): gsum khyab// g.yas kyi phyag na rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bsnams// g.yon gyi phyag na bdud rtsi lnga yi los spyod 'gyod// ye shes rol pa'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs// khams
55b1(ti): gsum srid pa gsum la mnga' mdzad ma// rtag tu dbang phyug chen mo grogs mdzod cig/ bltas pas mi mthong gcig kyang med// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam
55b2(ti): bskang // hUM shar gyi phyogs kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba sa la dbang sgyur zhing // 'gro ba'i rus la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yi rus pas bskang byas nas//
55b3(ti): mthun pa'i rdzas chen nga 'bul gyis// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// hUM/ lho yi phyogs kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba chu la dbang sgyur zhing // 'gro ba'i khrag la
55b4(ti): mnga' mdzad ma// 'di ni khrag gis bskang byas nas// mthun pa'i rdzas che nang 'bul gyis// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// hUM/ nub kyi phyogs kyi mnga' bdag
55b5(ti): mo// 'byung ba me la dbang sgyur zhing // 'gro ba'i drod la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di ni drod kyis bskang byas nas// mthun pa'i rdzas chen nga 'bul gyis// bcol ba'i las
55b6(ti): rnams grub par mdzod// hU~M/ byang phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba rlung la dbang sgyur zhing // 'gro ba'i dbugs la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di ni dbugs kyis
55b7(ti): bskang byas nas// mthun pa'i rdzas chen nga 'bul gyis// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// hUM/ nam mkha' rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// nam mkha' stong la dbang sgyur
56a1(ti): zhing // 'gro ba'i bkrag la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di ni bkrug gis bskang byas na// mthun pa'i rdzas che nang 'bul gyis// bdag gis
56a2(ti): las bcol grub par mdzod// rgyu lus bsgral ba'i phung po yis// ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma lnga dang gtso bo yab yum bskang ngo // da ni mdos bdag gi ma mo
56a3(ti): rnams bskang ba ni/ srid pa bde 'gro khams gsum kun gyi yum mchog ste// sku mdog mthing ka chen mo la// dbu dang zhal gyis stong khams khengs// rin chen ral pas snang
56a4(ti): srid gsal// khyod ni 'dod khams gtso mo ste// phud kyi bdag mo'i thugs dam bskang // ye shes tshogs kyi rje mo dang // gnyis su med pa'i phud kyi bdag/ bcol
56a5(ti): ba'i las rnams grub par mdzad// dpag bsam shing gi yal ga la// dkar mo g.yag thod ral gcig ma// nyi zla stong gi thod 'phreng can// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong
56a6(ti): nas// khrag gi dri snom da mar gyi ro myong ma// ral pa'i zar bu g.yon nas gcig tu 'khyil// srid pa'i sa gzhi g.yog cing khengs mdzad ma// g.yas pa lcags dang
56a7(ti): zangs kyi dril zhags la// snying gi zhags pa sdog cing 'phen// g.yon na ban d+ha mgo gcad khrag 'dzag ma// tshangs pa la sogs lha chen brgyad kyi mgo gcad nas// nyi zla stong
56b1(ti): gis sku la brgyan cing klubs// snang srid snying gi bdag mo ste// 'di yi snying gis bskang byas nas// mthun pa'i rdzas chen nga 'bul gyis// nga yi las bcol grub par mdzo
56b2(ti): che zhes dkar mo nyi ma'i mdangs// dkar mo ral gcig thugs dam bskang // che zhes nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum thams cad gsal bar mdzad// bskang ngo
56b3(ti): bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // che zhes khams gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum thams cad gsang bar sbyor// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang //
56b4(ti): srid pa bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che// srid pa thams cad bde la sbyor// che zhes khams gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum thams cad dbang du sdud/
56b5(ti): srid pa thams cad bde la sbyor// bskrang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // snang srid kun gyi rgyan mdzad ma// rgyan gyi rgyal mo'i thugs dam paskang // mtshan ni dbyings
56b6(ti): phyag rgyal mo ste// dbyings phyug ma yi thugs dam bskang // bdag nyid lhag lhag bzhad mdzad ma// bdag nyid chen mo'i thugs dam bskang // mtshan ni gcig pu chen
56b7(ti): mo ste/ lag na zhing gau g.yang gzhi thogs// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // da ni thugs kyi dgyes sde mo grub pa'i rtags dbyung / rtag tu
57a1(ti): dbang phyug rgyal mo'i grogs// srid cig shar gyi mnga' bdag mo// dkar mo mig gcig ral pa can// 'khor ni dkar mo 'bum snga
57a2(ti): sa/ bdang ngo gal pa'i rgyugs byun// sbyi pa rnams s+ho// rnas po na sa badz+raH// 'al na nag mo 'bras mas// bskye
57a3(ti): bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // srid pa nub kyi mnga' bdag mo// dmar mo dbang gi rgyal mo ste// 'khor ni dmar mo 'bum sder bcas// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam
57a4(ti): bskang // srid pa byang gi bdag mo ste// ser mo chen mo las kyi gtso// 'khor ni ser mo 'bum sngar bcas// thugs dam gnyen po bdag skong gi/ bskang la 'bras bu
57a5(ti): mchis par mdzod// de yan chad ni ma mo bcu bzhi'i bskang thabs so// skabs 'dir a phyi chen mo yang mchod par 'byung bas don gyi sbyar// da ni de'i
57a6(ti): khol mo rnams sha khrag dmar dang a mri tas bskang bar bya ste/ srid pa kun gyi khyim bdag mo// he ru kas nr-i'i thugs dam bskang // ha ra ting dkar mo'i thugs dam bskang //
57a7(ti): du na ting nag mo'i thugs dam bskang // shan ting dmar mo'i thugs dam bskang // grub ting ser mo'i thugs dam bskang // srid pa gru 'degs chen mo bzhi// bco
57b1(ti): ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// dmag gi rgyal mo chen mo bzhi// shar gyi dkar mo mche gtsigs ma// bskrang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // lho yi nag mo
57b2(ti): kha lhag ma// nub kyi dmar mo mchu 'jib ma// byang gi ser mo rkan ldag ma// rigs bzhi dmag dpung 'khor gyis bskor// thugs dam gnyen po bdag bskongs
57b3(ti): gis/ bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// e ka dza ti dpal gyi yum// lcags kyi so la zangs kyi sgra// sna tshogs zhal la zhing sgrol ma// thugs dam gnyen po
57b4(ti): bdag gis bskang // bcol ba'i 'phrin las grub par mdzod// e ka dza ti'i thugs dam bskang // srid pa'i ma mo bzhi yi thugs dam bskang // srin mo chen mo bdun gyi thugs
57b5(ti): dam bskang // sring mo chen mo bzhi yi thugs dam bskang // ma mor grags pa kun gyi thugs dam bskangs so// de ltar nang gi dam rdzas dang ldan par byas la/ shal smug
57b6(ti): po'am nam mkha' lding la sogs pa rgyu gang bsgral yang rung ste/ 'byung ba chen po lnga yis ye shes kyi khro mo lnga dang gtso mo bskang ngo // sha khrag dmar dang ting nge 'dzin gyis
57b7(ti): 'khor gyi ma mo'i thugs dam bskang ngo // bsgrub pa po'i bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub nges so// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med ces he ru kas bshad/ le'u ste nyi shu
58a1(ti): rgya/ pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// dgug dang 'dren pa'i las rnams ni// pho nya'i las rnams bdag
58a2(ti): bgyid 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// srid gsum 'dul ba'i pho nya ni// bdag nyid man ngag sems ldan te/
58a3(ti): sems kyi dkyil nas bskul ba ni// hUM/ dpal gyi pho nya bka' sdod ma// khyung gi khrag chen lding ba la// lcags kyi ma mo khyung mgo zhon// mgo gsum po la lag drug po/
58a4(ti): g.yas na rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ bar ma spu gris srid gsum sgrol// tha ma dri la zhags mu stegs 'tshang // g.yod pa ban d+ha rag ta 'bar// bar ma 'khor lo bskal pa'i mi// tha
58a5(ti): ma lcags kyu 'du 'phro can// gnas ni dur khrod dkyil du bcas// snyungs ni thugs kyi dkyil du skrangs// bton ni ljags kyi rtse la bton// 'gyed ni dam nyams dgra la 'gye//
58a6(ti): dbang ni srid pa gsum la byed// za ni skye 'gro yongs la za// nyul ni gling bzhi khyab par nyul// bang ni glog pas nges par mgyogs// sbod ni dngos po gcig la skrod// rgyal
58a7(ti): kha chen pos bdud dpung 'joms// tsham rngam chen pos dgra bgegs sgrol// nga rgyal chen pos mu stegs 'dul// rdzu 'phrul chen pos ri rab snyil// khyod ni srid gsum
58b1(ti): sgro byungs// lan g+ha 'drug bskul banaH// gangs bu bsgos par b+h+yo// dem po rta dka' rjo sa// / a tam+b+ha da 'phreng can// byug drug gal dang zla gsu
58b2(ti): mig gcig ma// mgo la tshol gyi yob zhu gyon// mtshan ni sprin dkar go cog can// phyag gnyis pad+ma'i gdong bzung zhing // mtshan ni 'jig rten dbang phyug ma// g.ya
58b3(ti): na zhing gi rgyu zhags 'phen// bdud dang mu stegs 'ching byed mu// mtshan ni sbrul chen zhags pa can// g.yon na ban d+ha rlon pa thogs// snying khrag dron mas bkang nas
58b4(ti): su// rnam lnga'i bcud dang bsres nas gtong // sgrub pa po la sid+d+hi 'bebs// mtshan ni bdud las longs spyod ma// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// zhing gi rus pa phur
58b5(ti): bu 'dril// dgra bgegs gnon pa'i las la brtson// mtshan ni gsang ba'i mchog phur can// g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// lcags dang zangs kyi dril zhags la//
58b6(ti): ming snying brgyus pa'i zhags pa yis// srid pa gsum char 'jig mdzad ma// mtshan ni gser gyi dril zhags can// sprul pa'i phyag gnyan brdabs pa yis// zhing lpags
58b7(ti): rlon pa'i g.yeng gzhi yis// khams gsum rdul phran bzhin du rngog/ mtshan ni g.yang gzhi ru mtshon can// skul zhing lpags g.yang gzhi gsol// stong khams khyab par
59a1(ti): myos mdzad ma// mtshan ni zhing gi na bza' la// kha nas mi khrag rlon pa 'thor// stong khams thams cad sreg pa mo// mtshan ni kha nas ma
59a2(ti): 'bar ma// sku la mi mgo'i sa ral kha// skye 'gro thams cad skongs mdzad ma// mtshan ni me tog chun 'phyang can// 'bar gtum chen mo khro ma'i tshul// khro rgyal chen
59a3(ti): mo gshin rje gshed// bka' yi pho nyamagyogs byed ma// nga rgyal can rnams dbang du sdud// gang la bya ba rdul du rlog/ 'di ni pho nya'i gtso mo ste// bcol ba'i las
59a4(ti): rnams grub par mdzod// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// pho nya chen po'i le'u ste nye ro gcig pa// / gsung drung lha yis yang gsol pa/
59a5(ti): rgyud lung chen po 'di dag la// skye bo gang zhig yi rangs te// mos pa'i dngos grub cir yang 'gyur// gang zhig 'di la ma dad pa'i// skur pa 'debs pa'i skye bo la//
59a6(ti): rnam par smin pa ci lta bu// ngo mtshan lha la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang
59a7(ti): dag pa// ngas gsungs pa yi lung 'di la// skye bo gang zhig brtson 'grus pa// lus 'di nyid nas srid pa rje// tshe 'di nyid la dgongs pa rdzogs// rgyal po bzhin du che bar
59b1(ti): nges// ngas gsungs pa yi lung 'di la// rnal 'byor gang zhig dang mos pa// sgyid gsum thams cad dbang du bgyid// shes rab mig gis bltas pa'i tshe// srid gsum
59b2(ti): dkyil 'khor rdzogs par mthong // de la rim 'gro mchod pa byed// bsgo ba'i tshig rnams bran bzhin nyan// ngas gsungs pa yi lung 'di la// gang zhig skur pa 'debs
59b3(ti): pa de// dam sri dmar por nges par skye// dbang chen kun gyis bsdigs mthong nas// tshe 'di nyid la smyo 'bog cing // dus min par ni srog zad nges// ngas gsungs pa yi
59b4(ti): lung 'di la// don med phyal bar sgrogs pa de// dmyal ba'i rdo rjer lhung nas kyang // thar pa'i dus med 'i dod 'bod// phyin chad sdom zhes smra bar nges// ngas gsungs pa yi/
59b5(ti): lung 'di la// mi dad spong ba'i sems can de// gshin rje'i zhags pas bzung nas kyang // nyes dmigs khram la btab nas su// tshogs kyi bdag la phul nas kyang //
59b6(ti): lha zug thams cad 'brel par nges// ngas gsungs pa yi lung 'di la// skye bo gang zhig dad mos pa// 'jig rten 'di yi yon tan yang // yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba
59b7(ti): bzhin// 'jig rten phyi ma'i dngos grub kyang // thar pa'i bde ba'i 'bras bu yis// rigs 'dzin sa la gdon mi za// skye 'gag med pa'i dngos grub kyis// mi 'gyur
60a1(ti): rdo rje dngos grub thob// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// de skad bka' stsal pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs te/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas
60a2(ti): dang / 'phra men rgya mtsho la sogs te/ ma mo stong gi tshogs dang / lha chen po gnod 'dul la sogs te/ g.yung drung lha'i rigs mang po dang / rdo rje gzhon nu mo la
60a3(ti): sogs te/ rigs kyi bud med mang po dang / he ru kas nri la sogs te/ 'jig rten gyi dbang mo chu rab tu mang po dang / 'jig rten dbang can mang po rnams gus pas
60a4(ti): yi rangs te/ thar lam bde ba chen po yang thob nas/ a la la'i sgra phyung ste/ rig 'dzin gyi dam tshig can du gyur to// 'jigs byed dpal gyi zhal nas dmed bcugs
60a5(ti): pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// / srid pa'i rdzogs lung chen po rdzogs so// / cho ga rdzogs lung chen po 'di/
60a6(ti): gang gis rnyed pa dngos grub ste// ma nyams dag na bsam pa 'grub// dam tshig gtsang na rnyed par 'gyur// sbrid pa gsang ba'i rdzogs lung 'di// 'gro ba'i don la dga'
60a7(ti): ba dang // theg pa chen po gtsor len cing // rdo rje slob dpon mchod byed cing // lu gu rgyud la brtse bsdoms pa'i// skal ldan de dang 'phrad par shog/ gu rgya gsang
60b1(ti): ba'i dbang phyug la// shrId+d+hA nas gsang bsgrubs pa// bod yul 'jig rten sgrogs pa ni// shrI dz+nyA nas yang dag bshad// de skad dpal gyi dz+nyAn gleng // gshog rgod
60b2(ti): 'od drag shul stsal// lnga phung yan lag mar snang yang // sngon gyi yon tan bsod nams chen po dang // rang byung ye shes srul chen te// lu gu rgyud la brtsa bsdams
60b3(ti): nas// chos nyid rnal 'byor spyad legs na// gu h+ye gsang ba'i slob dpon de// shrI dz+nyA na'i gam du byon// snga phyi med par phyin pa dang // sngon gyi thugs dam gcig
60b4(ti): pa'i mthus// srid pa'i rgyud lung chen po 'di// tshar gcig ljags kyis bshad pa yis// sems kyi dkyil du bsdus pa ni// dar dkar zang g.yag gsal ba la// le
60b5(ti): brgan tshon gyi zhen pa ltar// lugs ma'i sgrom bu mang po ru// rin chen gser chu blugs pa bzhin// de bzhin sems la gsal ba yis// bod yul 'gro ba'i don phyir du//
60b6(ti): shrI dz+nyA na'i rdul shugs kyis// rgyud lung dpe ru bris pa yin// slob dpon nyid kyis ni sngon gyi tha tshigs dang 'gal bar thugs gser te/ dpe bod yul du khyer ta ma gshegs
60b7(ti): pa dpal gyi ye shes kyis thugs mnyes pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te/ dges nas chos mang du bstan te/ rgyud lung 'di ni thun bcu bdun du bgyis pa'i tshar gcig gis
61a1(ti): bin nas/ dang min bris su bris nas spun+da sbyar brims pa dang / dgas te gros bstan pas/ slob dpon gyis dkyus su bris/ srad kyis
61a2(ti): ku sa ra de yis snod nas dpe gus par gyur // klu thig bgyis pas/ rdzog 'ga' yang ma norate/ khrom du 'gos pa bzhin du ni/ dkyil 'kho ga spyam dang / dzin
61a3(ti): gsum dang / rgyal mtshan gsum bsgyur d+ha'o// gsang bzugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / bsgrub pa b+hag rgyu'i dkyil 'khor dang / gsang ba TIg pa'i kyil 'khor gsum
61a4(ti): zhi ba sems kyis/ ye shes sems dpa' rdzogs pa chen po'i sa dang / kun tu bzang po rdzogs pas 'dzin gyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i thig le'i rgyal mtshan dang / mi
61a5(ti): g.yo ba bde ba chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang / mi 'gyur ba byang sems kyi thig le'i bla ma'i rgyal mtshan dang gsum mo// sku che ba'i yon tan gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//
61a6(ti): gnod 'dul sgra yis yang gso slo ba// 'gro ba'i rgyu mchog bsdu ba dang / rnam 'byor rnams la pa na ga dgas phyir// mngon rdzogs yang la bdag can 'cham/
61a7(ti): mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka'i sprul pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// rnal 'byor pa yi tshe mchog ni// yang dag nyid du ngas bshad do// de la tshe lung rnam pa mang mchis
61b1(ti): kyang / lung las man ngag tu bsgrubs pas/ mi 'phrogs pa rdo rje nges pa'i tshe/ 'phel 'grib rten gyi tshe dang gnyis so// de la mi 'phrogs pa rdo rje nges pa'i tshe la/ bsgrub
61b2(ti): pa chen po dus la bab ma bab bstan pa dang / dus la bab na rigs lnga gang du 'gro/ yang sgrub pa'i thabs dang / yon bdag la rgyas par ba ba dang / bsgrubs nas gtams pa'i sa dang /
61b3(ti): sngags mkhan nyid la bsgrub pa dang lnga'o// de la bsgrubs pa chen po dus la bab ma bab brtag pa ni/ la sa gar le na ga nas gang du 'gro ba sgom pas thag bcad/ dus la bab na
61b4(ti): bsgrub pa'i thabs ni/ bdag A yu bi na du a bi thugs gsal ba dang / tshe'i rigs A yu dz+nyA na 'dzar gsal ba gnyis/ bi du na ya'i thugs gsang ba byang chub sems dkar la
61b5(ti): 'char ba dang / bi dun dza'i thugs gsang ba byang chub sems dmar la gdang ba skyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'phro 'du las/ gser dngul ba srel ba zhes bya ba'i kha dog 'dra ba'i 'od
61b6(ti): zer gyis rigs lnga'i gnas su khyab par bya ste/ rigs lnga thams cad chags pa'i thugs bskyod/ gsang ba dgyes pa bskyed nas bde ba'i mchod pa 'bul lo// rigs lnga zhes bya
61b7(ti): ba ni mkha' bzhi dbyings dang lnga ste/ dung can mkha' dang / ba na glang can gyi mkha' dang / pad+ma can gyi mkha' dang / ri mo can gyi mkha' dang bzhi'o// dbyings ni gsang ba bde
62a1(ti): ba'i yum grogs mo'i rgyal mo dus chen po la bab kyang / 'di lnga'i mkha' 'gro ma las ma gtogs pa gzhan med pas/ 'di la gsang ba bde ba'i
62a2(ti): mchod pa phul te thugs dam bsangs la/ ye shes kyi 'phro 'dus bsgyur ba ni/ bsgyur ba'i sbubs so// de la bskul ba'i tshig 'di skad do// a ni ma skyes su nyid las/
62a3(ti): gsang ba bde ba'o don 'byung ba// rdo rje la gnas pad+mor bskyil// ma chags mi ldan 'phro 'du yis// yum gyi thugs dam des skyongs la// 'gro ba'i tshe dpal brtan pa mdzod/
62a4(ti): bde ba rgyas 'debs tshe ni rdo rje brtan// bde ba rmongs byed tshe 'di pad+mar stan// bde ba za byed tshe 'di nges par spel// bde ba tshe 'phel 'gro ba re bskong // bde klong yangs pa srid pa
62a5(ti): kun gyi yum// gang 'dir dus la bab kyang mkhas slar sgyur cig/ de la nyams bsnur la gdags pa'i sa ni slar mkha' dbyings dang lnga nyid gsang ba'i 'phro 'du dbang gi dkyil 'khor
62a6(ti): bskyed la gdams so// de la bskul tshig ni/ shar phyogs bde klong pho brang nas// nges pa'i tshe la dbang sgyur ba'i// sku mdog dkar mo bsgyings pa la// spyan gsum dung gi lan
62a7(ti): tshar can// 'od zer dkar po phyogs bcur 'phro// ma chags thabs la mngon par rol// gsang ba'i mkha' la shel gyi ga pur bskyil// g.yas kyi phyog na rdo rje dgu bsnams//
62b1(ti): g.yon gyi phyag ni ga pur nyid la brten// rdo rje rtse gsum shar phyogs dbang du sdud// shel gyi ga pur nges pa'i tshe gdams so// lho phyogs bde klong pho blang nas// nges pa
62b2(ti): tshechol dbang sgyur ma// sku mdog sngon po bsgyings pa la// nor bu rin chen lan phran can// spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs mdzad ma// 'od zer sngon po phyogs bcur 'phro//
62b3(ti): gnyis su med pa'i thabs le rol// gsang ba'i mkha' la ren chen ga pur bsgril// g.yas kyi phyag na nor bu rin chen kai ke ru// g.yon pa ga pur nyid la brten// nor
62b4(ti): rin chen ke ke ru// lho phyogs 'dzam gling dbang du bsdu// rin chen ga pur nges pa'i tshe gdams pa'o// nub phyogs bde glong pho brang nas// nges pa'i tshe la dbang sgyur ba//
62b5(ti): sku mdog dmar mo bsgyings pa la// spyan gsum byi ru'i lan phran can// 'od zer dmar po phyogs bcur 'phro// mi len thabs la mngon par rol// gsang ba'i mkha' l-i byu ru'i ga
62b6(ti): bur bsgril// g.yas kyi phyag na pad+ma'i go pur brtsegs pa bsnams// g.yon gyi phyag ni ga pur nyid la brten// pad+ma dgu brtsegs nub phyogs dbang du sdud// byu ru'i ga bur
62b7(ti): nges pa'i tshe gdams so// byang phyogs bde klong pho brang nas// nges pa'i tshel dbang sgyur zhing // sku mdog ljang khu bsgyings mal// spyan gsum rdo rje'i lan phran can// 'od
63a1(ti): zer ljang ku phyogs bcur 'phro// grub pa'i thabs la mngon par rol// gsang ba'i mkha' la rdo rje ga pur bskyil// g.yas kyi phyag na rdo rje bsnams
63a2(ti): g.yon pa ga bur nyid la brten// rdo rje rgya gram byang phyogs dbang du sdud// rdo rje ga pur nges pa'i cho gdams so// steng 'og bde klong pho byung nas// nges pa'i tshol dbang mdzad pa
63a3(ti): cir yang 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// spyan gsum lan 'phran cir yang 'phro// ched 'ga' g.yu yi ral pa can// 'od zer sna tshogs gling bzhir 'phro// gnyis med brtan
63a4(ti): pa'i thabs la mngon par rol// gsang ba'i mkha' la g.yu laM ga pur bsgril// g.yas kyi phyag na ru mtshon shing bsnams shing // g.yon na ba nad rag tas bkang nag pur ci
63a5(ti): brtan// du mdung shing gi g.yang gnyis srid pa thams cad du spyad// gusuM yig pu rengs pa'i cha gdams so// de nas pad+ma'i dbang du bsdus la sring ba ga bu sa ste/
63a6(ti): byang chub sems la gradams so// dngos grub ni gsang ba nid do// de ni che ga dmas pa'o// tshe yon bdagal rgyas par bya ba ni// bo la a dkor ze/ mal
63a7(ti): me dmar skyes byin gyis brlabs la/ thabs dang shes rab kyi 'phro 'dus lce la dbab/ de nas tshe rtags mngon par bstis/ der bstim nas rtags dang mtshan ma sna tshogs /
63b1(ti): snang // der snang zhing gsal ba'i ngo bor 'byung / de la 'khor kyang de bzhin te// yi ge brgyad kyang 'khor bar gzhag/ las kyi bum par bstim par byed// de ni phung po yang
63b2(ti): dag rgyas// gzugs nyid rdo rje ri rab pas// che bar byin gyis brlabs nas su// cis kyang mi 'jig brtan par bsgoms// de ni rgyas par bya ba'o// tshe sngags mkhan la bsku
63b3(ti): ba ni// bdag nyid che ba'i lhar bsams te// drod kyi 'phro 'dus yang bsams la// rgyun mi 'chad par dgyes pa yi// dbyings la sogs pa'i thugs dam skongs// nges pa
63b4(ti): nyid du gnyis su gsal ba las/ a dang e gnyis rgyun mi 'chad par gyes pas/ mkha' bzhi dbyings dang lnga'i thugs dam bskang / gcig nas gcig tu gnas gyur te//
63b5(ti): 'dren pa'i phyag rgyas gsal bar drangs// gsang ba nyid du 'du bar bsgom// bdag nyid rin chan dkyil 'khor du// thugs kha'i ngo bor gsal bsgoms te// shes rab
63b6(ti): dbang gi mchod par 'bul// mdangs ma'i lam du byung nas ni// ye shes sras su bzhag nas ni// ye shes sbas pa'i tshe zhes bya// tshig tu yang / khro bo thugs las bskyed
63b7(ti): pa'i 'phro 'du yis// A yu dz+nyA na bin du a ni thabs kyi sku// a yu dz+nyA na bin du dza te shes rab gsal// thabs kyi rang bzhin ska mdog dkar pa la// yum gyi tshom bu 'od saM
64a1(ti): laM// g.yas na rdo rje thugs kar gsor// g.yon pa mkha' la chags pa'i g.yab mo 'debs// yum gyi sku mdog le brgan la// dkyus
64a2(ti): pa'i rtags su gser gyi 'od zer 'phro// phyag g.yon rdo rje ga pur bsnams// g.yas na la brgan g.yab mo 'dor// srid par dbang sdud yab kyi thugs bstims shing
64a3(ti): byin du dza/ de ltar thugs la mchod pa phul nas/ dpal gyi 'khor tshogs kyis bskor te gzhag/ 'phel 'grib sten pa'i tshe la don rnam pa lnga ste/ bstan pa'i tshe nyams ma
64a4(ti): nyams brtag pa dang / nyams na dgug pa'i thabs dang / khugs nas bskur ba dang / rgyal bar bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba'o// de la tshe nyams ma nyams brtag pa ni//
64a5(ti): pra dang mtshan ma ltas dang mo cha yan chad kyi brtag go// nyams na dgug pa'i thabs ni bdag nyid dbang gi he ru kar bsgoms la/ thugs kar ye shes kyi 'od zer spros la/
64a6(ti): tshe'i ma mo rnams bskul te dgug go/ dgug pa'i dngos po ni yi ge nI las pho nya bkug pas hUM du dmigs te/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas drangs ngo // hUM/ shar phyogs b+ha ga'i
64a7(ti): glong yangs su// 'byung po'i lag tu tshe nyams pa// dri za'i lag tu dpal nyams pa// de yi pho nya bskyod mdzad de// sku mdog ser skya spyan gsum ral pa can// phyag mang
64b1(ti): g.yas na lcags kyu dgus gtams shing // g.yon pa gar thabs g.yab 'dor ma// 'byung po'i lag nas tshe drongs la// dri za'i lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ lho
64b2(ti): phyogs b+ha ga'i klong yangs su// gshin rje'i lag tu tshe nyams pa// srin po'i lag tu dpal phrogs kyang // de yi pho nya bskyod mdzad de// sku mdog sngon mo spyan gsum
64b3(ti): ral pa can// g.yas kyi phyag na lcags kyu dgus gtams shing // g.yon pa'i gar thabs g.yab 'dor ma// gshin rje'i lag nas tshe drongs la// srin po'i lag nas
64b4(ti): dpal skyobs shig/ nub phyogs b+ha ga'i glong yangs su// klu yi lag tu tshe nyams ma// yi dwags lag tu dpal phrogs na// de yi pho nya bskyod mdzad de// sku
64b5(ti): mdog mtshul du spyan gsum ral pa can// g.yas kyi phyag na lcags kyi dgus gtams shing // g.yon pa gar thabs g.yab 'dor ma// klu yi lag nas tshe drangs
64b6(ti): la// yi dgas gnas nas dpal skyobs shig/ byang phyogs b+ha ga'i klongs yangs su// gnod sbyin lag tu tshe nyams sam// bgegs kyi lag tu dpal phrogs
64b7(ti): na// de yi pho nya bskyod mdzad ma// sku mdog ljang gu spyan gsum ral pa can// g.yas kyi phyag na dril bu dgus gtams shing // g.yon pa gar thabs g.yab
65a1(ti): 'dor ba// gnod sbyin lag nas tshe drongs la// bgegs kyi la nas dpal skyobs shig/ steng gi b+ha ga'i klong yangs su// yab bdud
65a2(ti): lag nas tshe nyams sam// rgyal 'gong lag nas dpal phrogs na// de yi pho nya bskyod mdzad de// sku mdog dmar mo khrag gi ral pa can// nyi zla can du mdzad
65a3(ti): pa'i mthu bo che// g.yas kyi phyag na zhing gi g.yang gzhi bsnams// g.yon na tshangs pa'i mgo ba rud khrag 'dzag bsnams// yab bdud lag nas tshe drongs la//
65a4(ti): bgegs kyi lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ 'og phyogs b+ha gi'i klong yangs su// sa bdag lag nas tshe nyams sam// ma bdud lag nas dpal phrogs kyang // de
65a5(ti): yi pho nya bskyod mdzad ma// nag mo chen mo ral pa can// g.yas kyi phyag na tri shul ru mdung bsnams// g.yon pa ba na da rag tas bkang ba bsnams// sa bdag
65a6(ti): lag nas tsho drongs la// ma bdud lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ mtshams bzhi b+ha ga zur thig la// btsan dgongs lag nas tshe nyams sam// 'brog srin lag nas
65a7(ti): dpal phrogs kyang // de yi pho nya bskyod mdzad ma// rin chen srid 'degs mdzes pa'i za ma tog/ g.yon na dung gi zo ba bsnams// g.yas na g.yu yi za ma tog/ btsan
65b1(ti): 'gong lag nas tshe drongs la// 'brog srin lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ oM badz+ra yag sha ban d+ha ra ga taM badz+ra phaT/ hUM ni hUM ni hUM hUM nI dza Ta/ de ltar nyams dang sbyar/
65b2(ti): te khugs pa dang tshe brten par bya ste/ 'phel 'grib kyi tshe rten la bsdus te/ tshe rten ci yang rung ba cig bstim/ de nas badz+ra shang kaM gi ri gi ra zhes rjod de/ tshe rdo rje'i
65b3(ti): gur du gyur par bsgom mo// de'i nang du tshe hUM mthing kar dmigs te/ khro bo hA ya dzI bas bsrung bar bsgoms/ gur gyi tshe rol du mgo bar brnyan ma brgyad bsgom/ rgyas
65b4(ti): gdab pa'i tshig bshad byas la rgyas gdab bo// tshig tu yang / srid pa rgyas 'debs dbang phyug nga'i rgya de nas gnyis med rol pa bde mchog yum gyi rgya/ de nas mkha'
65b5(ti): 'gro grub pa'i rgya/ rang byung rgyas btab las mkhan rgyas thob cig/ ces brjod la las mkhan mo rgyas gdab/ rgyas par bya ba ni tshe dpa' bo 'bru lngar dmigs la phung po la
65b6(ti): bsdus te/ de nas rdo rje rgya gram gyi go mgo/ de nas rdo rje rkyang bka' nan bya/ de'i sngags ni sarba me tr-i kri ka la tse na baM/ dung pu ra te rag hUM hUM/ bskul ba ni nges pa'i tshen
65b7(ti): 'thun no// rdo rje tshe'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// // gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dbang can thabs kyis ni// dgra bgags
66a1(ti): thun la dbab pa'i las// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang
66a2(ti): dag pa// dgra bgegs thun zor dbab pa dang // de yi bskul tshig 'di skad do// hUM/ gser gyi nam mkha' ser po phyung dkyil na// gser mtsho ya mo byang nga phyang //
66a3(ti): gser mkhan ser mo phyung dkyil na// mnga' bdag rje mo su bzhugs na// gnam gyi gtso mo gser gyi rgyal mo bzhugs// phyag na gsar phur ser po bsnams// nan
66a4(ti): tur dgra la 'phen pa'i tshe// gser gyi phur bu bdun bdun 'phen// gcig ni dpral ba'i mtshams su brdeg/ tshe dang srog gi rten 'brel ma// gcig ni mig gi
66a5(ti): dkyil du brdeg/ lta ba kun gyi bcud 'phrog ma// gcig ni lce yi dkyil du brdeg/ smra ba ngag gi dbang sdud ma// gcig ni dpung 'og gnyis su brdeg/ stobs
66a6(ti): chen kun gyi rtsal 'grog ma// gcig ni snying gi dkyil du brdeg/ tshe srog gnyis kyi dbang sdud ma// gcig ni pho mtshan dkyil du brdeg/ skye shi gnyis kyis ras bcod
66a7(ti): ma// gcig ni sus mo'i dkyil du brdeg/ 'gro ba kun gyi dbang sdud ma// g.yu yi nam mkha' sngon mo phyang nge phyang // mnga' bdag rje mo su bzhugs na// nam
66b1(ti): mkha' g.yu yi g.yu sku bzhugs// phyag na g.yu yi zo ba sngon po bsnams// dngul gyi nam mkha' dkar po phyang de phyang // mnga' bdag rje mo su bzhugs na// dngul
66b2(ti): gyi btsun mo bla ma bzhugs// phyag na dngul zor dkar mo bsnams// zangs kyi nam mkha' dmar po phyang nge phyang // mnga' bdag rje mo su bzhugs na// zangs kyi
66b3(ti): rdo rje dmar mo bzhugs// phyag na zangs zor dmar po bsnams// lcags kyi nam mkha' sngon po phyang dkyil na// dug mtsho nag mo byang dkyil na// mnga' bdag rje
66b4(ti): mo su bzhugs na// srog gi bdud mo chen mo bzhugs// sder mchu mang pos rtsa rgyus 'dren// snying gi rtsa tshan srug cing za// ma mo mkha' 'gro las kyi dus/
66b5(ti): stag gi mgo can ma mo ni// rus mgo sum brgya drug cu 'brel// 'thog cing 'gyed pa'i ma mo yin// las mkhan chen po las mdzod cig/ rgyud mkha' chen mos
66b6(ti): rgyud skul cig/ ma mo zor mkhan chen mo ni// tsi na d+ha ma ni sngags zlos shig/ mu stegs phung po bshig byed ma// 'dzam ma chen po yid 'phrog yin// 'dod
66b7(ti): tshegs khrag gi dkyil 'khor na// ma mo zor mkhan stong gis bskor// nan ltar g.yos pa'i dus byung na// ya bla bdud kyang mi che'o// ma bla bdud mo mi che'o//
67a1(ti): btsan la kha bzhi ga la che// mgyogs ma sde brgyad ga la che// gan ma thi dkar po ga la che// dri bo dri mo ga la che// ma mo mkha' 'gro
67a2(ti): las kyi dus// rus pa'i phur bu bdun bdun 'phen// ya la bdud kyang mi che'o// 'thab bral gnas nas zhags thogs ma// sum brgya sprul pas 'gyed pa yi//
67a3(ti): pho nya sum brgya drug cu la// mngag pa rdo rje las mdzod cig/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas su 'phen// rnal 'byor dam srid dam bral gyis// ya la bdud kyang mi
67a4(ti): che'o// ma bla bdud kyang mi che'o// ga na ma zor chen mo bcu gsum gyis// bgegs kyi khong khrag sprug cing za// sa zor chan mo bcu gsum gyis// dgra
67a5(ti): bo'i snying khrag 'khrug cing 'thung // de ltar zor gyi bdag mo dang // mi nad rims kyi bdag mo dang // rta yi khrag dang bang bu'i chu// ra yi khrag dang gser bdar ba'i//
67a6(ti): g.yu ba dar chang dbang phud kyi nang // yungs kar blangs la sngags 'di bzlas// hUM snying b+h+yo/ snying na pa tu taM/ khong khrag ru bi ra rta sarba na swA hA/ yang na brgya bdun
67a7(ti): bzlas// yang na nyi shu rtsa bdun bzlas// yang na bcu bdun bzlas par bya// cho ga 'di rten phan yon gang // srid pa gsum yang thal bar rlog/ lha rnams
67b1(ti): kun kyang 'dar zhing g.yob// bdud dang srin po thal rlag na// ma lus dgra bgegs smos ci dgos// ma mo gser zor gyi le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// /
67b2(ti): / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bsgrub la bar chad byed pa dang // bstan pa gnyen po bshig pa dang // dge ba'i bshes gnyen sku
67b3(ti): dgra la// mo yi khrag zor ji ltar gtang // mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi
67b4(ti): gtso// bstan pa 'jig dang bar chod la// sku dgrar gyur pa bsgral pa ni// yang dag nyid du ngas bshad do// de la dang por khrag zor gtang ba ni// dngul
67b5(ti): skyogs dkar por sha rus sbyar ba gzhag/ g.yu skyogs sngon por dbugs dang dri chu gzhag/ zangs skyogs dmar por rag ta sna lnga sbyar la gzhag/ ljags skyogs
67b6(ti): sngon por drod dang maM sa dri dang gzhag/ gser skyogs sar por bkrag mdangs sha chen gzhag/ skya tshe dang / lan tshwa dang / yungs nag la sogs gang bya ba smod cing
67b7(ti): skul lo// de la skul tshig 'di skad do// hUM/ dngul skyogs dkar po ru// bdud rtsi sems sbyar nas// dmar chan khrag blug shing // bzor ro shar du bzor//
68a1(ti): 'phang ngo shar du 'phang // ma mo shar gyi mnga' bdag mo// shar bdud choms shig rnam snang gsal// btsan la sgyur cig rdo rje dbang mo
68a2(ti): che// dgra bo tshogs shig sbas pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// g.yu sgyogs sngon po ru// bdud rtsi chu sbyar cing // dmar chen khrag blugs te// be zor ro byang du bzor//
68a3(ti): 'phang ngo byang du 'phang // byang gi ma mo b+h+yo// byang bdud tshoms shig yang gsal g.yos// ba tsan kha sgyur cig las kyi dbang mo che// dgra bo choms shig sbas
68a4(ti): pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// zangs sgyogs dmar po ru// bdud rtsi rak+ta sbyar// dmar chen khrag blugs shing // bzor ro nub tu bzor// 'phang ngo nub tu 'phang //
68a5(ti): ma mo nub kyi ma mo b+h+yo// nub bdud choms shig gnyen gsal ma// btsan kha sgyur cig pad+mo dbang // dgra bo choms shig sbas pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// lcags
68a6(ti): sgyoskyogs nag po ru// bdud rtsi maM sa sbyar// dmar chen khrag blugs te// bzor ro lho ru bzor// 'phang ngo lho ru 'phang // ma mo lho'i ma mo b+h+yo// lho bdud
68a7(ti): tshems shig 'od gsal 'bar// btsa na kha sgyur cig rin chen dbang mo che// dgra bo choms shig sbas pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// gser skyogaso ser po ru/
