222b1(ti): byarlabs// de nas par bye bzhi rtsal// snang srid sems can gzugs su byas// kha dog sna tshogs yang dag ldan// sha sA dag ni sna tshogs dang // khrag swA dag na snga/

223b4(ti): dkor du mang ba las// rams gsu gcig la// gser gyi lu gu gse ru la// dpral na g.yu'i mdos cha khyi li li// bal ser nam mchis te de nas byung // dngul
223b5(ti): gyi lu gu dkar ru la// zangs kyi mdos cha khyi li li// bal dkar ma mchis de nas byung // ra ma sa g.yu gcig la// zangs kyi lu gu dmar po la// da bral nags
223b6(ti): mdos bya khi li li// bal dmar ma mchis de nas byung // ra ma sa g.yu cig la// lcags kyi lu gu nag po la// dpral na zangs kyi mdos bya khyi li li// ba la sngon ma
223b7(ti): mchis de nas byung // dang po bal byung ste// bal la rmel ba'i mi ma mchis// bal rme la su yi rme la// nam mkha'i bu mo skar mig ma yis rmi la// rmel ba'i mi
224a1(ti): mchis kyang // gru bu 'thul ba'i mi ma mchis// gru bu su yis btul// mgon bzangs phya bu mos btul// gru bu thul ba'i mi mchis
224a2(ti): kyang // nu ma mkha' su yis bri// rgya nag mdos mkha na nag po ha kyi bris// nam mkha' bri ba'i mi mchis kyang // nam mkha' 'bri ba'i dpe ma mchis// nam
224a3(ti): mkha' bri ba'i dpe btsal ba// phyug pa'i gzha' yul du byon// nam mkha' dpa ni gzha' las blangs// gzha' ris ser na nam mkha' ser// gzha' ris sngo
224a4(ti): na nam mkha' sngo// gzha' ris ljang na nam mkha' ljang // gzha' ris dmar na nam mkha' dmar// gser gyi nam mkha' g.yu'i chun bskor nas// dngul gyi
224a5(ti): nam mkha' la lcags kyi chun bskor can// phrugs kyi nam mkha' gser gyi chun bskor can// gser gyi nam mkha' la// gAyu'i re kha can// zangs kyi na ma
224a6(ti): mkha' la// dngul gyi re khA can// gser gyi nam mkha' la// g.yu yi chun skor can// g.yu yi nam mkha' la// zangs kyi re mkha' can// dngul gyi nam
224a7(ti): mkha' can// nam mkha' des byung ste// nam mkha' phur gyi gshog ma mchis// nam mkha' phur ba'i gshog mchis kyang // rma bya mdongs ldan lha yis bya// nam
224b1(ti): mkha' phur ba'i gshog ma mchis// zer mo 'phan bzang klu yi bya// nam mkha' 'phur ba'i bya gshog tu byas// re sde nag po bdud kyi bya// nam mkha' 'phur ba'i
224b2(ti): ga shog tu bgyis// kang ka mchu rings nam mkha' bya// nam mkha' 'phur ba'i gshog tu bgyis// krung krung skya mo gnam gyi bya// nam mkha' 'phur ba'i
224b3(ti): gshog tu bgyis// nam mkha' 'phur ba'i gshog mchis kyang // nam mkha' khong gi snying ma mchis// nam mkha' khong gi snying btsal ba// ston pa dga' rab
224b4(ti): rdo rje yis// rgya yul snying du byon// zong du gser phye ser mo snams// khal par mdze ma bre mo de dang // ya zam 'das pa las// ting za ma rgyal ba las// mdzo
224b5(ti): mo bre mo chab kyis khyer/ gser phye ser mo chab tu pho// nam mkha' khong gi snying med nas// yungs kar ser mo de yis bgyis// gser long ser mo de yis bgyis//
224b6(ti): nam mkha'i khong gi snying mchis kyang // nam mkha' mdzes pa'i rgyan ma mchis// nam mkha' mdzes pa'i rgyan btsal ba// dar sna dkar po che ba'i rgyan// nam mkha
224b7(ti): mdzes pa'i rgyan du bgyis// dar sna sngon po yon tan brgyan// nam mkha' mdzes pa'i rgyan du bgyis// dar sna dmar po chags pa'i rgyan// nam mkha' mdzes pa'i
225a1(ti): rgyan du bgyis// dar sna ser po las rab rgyan// nam mkha' mdzes pa'i rgyun du bgyis// mdzes pa'i rgyan mchis kyang // nam mkha'
225a2(ti): mgul gyi rgyan ma mchis// nam mkha' mgul gyi rgyun 'tshal// skar gyi rgyal po 'phra men 'dis// dkar dang dmar dang ser dang ldang // sngo dang nag tu 'phyil
225a3(ti): ba 'dis// dang po stag gzig yul nas byung // bris pa stug gzig rgyal pos bris// nam mkha' mgul gyi rgyan med nas// nam mkha' mgul gyi rgyun du
225a4(ti): bgyis// mgul rgyun mchis kyang // stong du lhag pa'i bya ma mchis// byang chub gang nas byung // srid pa la byang ste// ye med stong pa las// mi srid pa'i
225a5(ti): chos byung ste// rgya mtsho gting med bya ba nas// rtsa rtsa med bya ba skyes// rtsa rtsa med kyi rtsa ba ru// drod dang rlan gshog pos// ya mtshan 'phrul gyi tshang gcig/

225a7(ti): zangs sgong dmar po dang // lcags sgong nag po dang // gser sgong ser po la// rtol ba'i mi ma mchis// sgo nga rang rdol bas// gser bya ser du byung // gtu
225b1(ti): slong sngon po la// rtol ba'i mi ma mchis// sgo nga rang rdol bas// g.yu bya sngon po byung // zangs sgong dmar po de// rtol gyi mi ma mchis// sgo nga rung rtol bas//

225b3(ti): mi che ste// 'jig rten mdos dang mnyam// chung yang mi chung ste// sra gzhi mdos dang mnyam// nag mo gser mig 'di// bya mig mas yang 'gebs pa ni//
225b4(ti): srid pa mas yang chags pa yin// bya mig dmar la gdangs pa ni// srid pa khrag las chags pa yin// nag mo gser mig 'dri// 'gro na stobs dang ldan// smra na
225b5(ti): ngag kyang stan// gsung snyan kyu ru ru// ma bdud bskang ba'i bya// ma bdud kun bskang ngo // bya byung der byung ngo // shing khra'i chom ston// shing khra'i brang ma gdon//
225b6(ti): yo rkye dkar po lha'i shing // shing khra'i rgyu ru byas// mu la shing glu shing // smon shing mkhal ma 'dis// shing khra'i rgyu ru byas// gser shing skyer pa gdug pa'i shing //
225b7(ti): shing khra'i rgyu ru ba gyi sa// g.yu shing 'phang ma 'di// shing khra'i rgyu ru bgyis// lho smug ldem pa 'di// shing khra'i rgyu ru bgyis// shing khra'i cho bton te// lug gi cho ma bton// lug gi
226a1(ti): 'brang ma bton// lug byung gang nas byung // g.yung byung gang nas byung // mtshe'i snying po brag tu byung // brag gi snying po mtshe ru byung //

226a6(ti): gser 'phang ser mo la// g.yu yi mo lo dgu brtsegs la// gsu 'bang sngon mo la// zangs kyi mo mo dgu brtsegs la// zangs 'phang dmar po la// dngul gyi mo lo dgu bcigs

226b1(ti): dang po glung byung de nas byung // sku krung dang po de ltar phul// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las/ grung btsal ba lo rgyus kyi mdos bstan pa'i le'u ste/

226b4(ti): rim pa 'di lta ste// de yang rgyus bskang ba dang // mdangs kyis bskang ba'o// de la rnal 'byor pa dam tshig nyams pa la sogs pa rnams ni rgyu chen pos bskang ngo // sems can
226b5(ti): phal pa'i ched du rgya chung ngun gyis bslang ngo // rang bzhin ni mdos kyis bskang ngo // de la bskong bar bya ba'i dus/ snron la bsgrub par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bya ste 'di

226b7(ti): dpag bsam shing gi shun pa la// zhe sdang me 'bar lams se lams// dpag bsam shing gi lo ma la/ gti mug mun pa thibs sa thibs// dpag bsam shing gi khong srog la/
227a1(ti): nga rgyal khrag chen thabs se thabs// dpag bsam shing gi rtse mo na// phrag dog tshub nag khyi li li// chag snang rnam lnga tshad pa'i shing gcig gda'/
227a2(ti): dpag bsam shing gi rtse mo na// phrag dog tshub ma'i nang shed na// pha dgu khri stong gi rgyal po zhes kyang bya// skos rje brang dkar zhes kyang bya// srid pa'i skos mkhan zhes kyang
227a3(ti): / dpag bsam shing gi rtse la bzhugs// dpag bsam shing gi rtsa ba na// 'dod chags khrag gi mtsho'i dkyil shed na// ma phywa sangs 'bum gyi rgyal mo bzhugs/
227a4(ti): bdud mo brgya byin kun dga' mos kyang bya// srid pa'i skos 'dings rgyal mo bzhugs// pha gu khri stong gi rgyal po des// thugs kyi yig 'phrin rgya mtsho'i gting du bskyal// ma

227b1(ti): mo dung gi ral pa can// phyag na dung gi ga'u bsnams// sems can kun la 'tshe bar byed// pha dgu khri sbyong gi rgyal pos ming btags pa// mkha' la 'gro zhing sems

228a3(ti): dmar yol bres me re re// gsu yi nad 'khor khrigs se khrigs// sre yi phying dkar zangs sa zangs// de 'dra'i gur yol nang shes na// bud med dmar mo byu ru'i

228a7(ti): phyogs dpag bsam yal ga la// phra stong khrag pa'i tshang bcas nas// phyi yi sgong bcag bar gyi sri brtol bas// 'phra gur khra bo skongs sa skongs// 'phra yol
228b1(ti): khra bo khyud de khyud// zangs kyi nam mkha' khrigs sa khrigs// dung gi phying dkar khrigs sa khrigs// de 'dra'i gur yol gyi nang shed na// bud med phra mo ba se yi

228b3(ti): dbugs mdzad ma// de phyir mkha' 'gro yang gsal g.yos// ma phya sangs 'bum gyi ming btags pas// snang srid 'byung ba rlung gi mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba

228b6(ti): mthing nag yol bres me re re// rin chen sna lnga'i bying dkar khrigs sa khrigs// pha dgu khri stong gi rgyal pos ming btags pas// mkha' la 'gro zhing sems can bkrag bdag

229a1(ti): sgyur zhing // skye 'gro'i bkrag la mnga' mdzad ma// las su yams nad sna lnga gtong // bkrag bdag chen mo'i thugs dam bskang // pa dgu khri

229a3(ti): ba'i gzhal yas nas// mi nad sna tshogs 'bebs// dbu dang spyan ni ji ltar ston// dbu la rin chen ral pa can// g.yas kyi phyag na khrag 'thor ma// mi nad phyugs nad
229a4(ti): sna tshogs 'bebs// g.yon nas bdud rtsi'i mchil ma 'thor// nad rnams thams cad bsil bar mdzad// zhal nas 'bras bu'i bcud 'dzag pas// skye 'gro kun gyi
229a5(ti): gsos mdzad ma// g.yas kyi phyag gis srid rtse bzung // srid pa gsum yang thal bar rlog/ g.yon pas 'og gi sa gzhi bzung // klu rnams kun kyang bred cing spangs/
229a6(ti): khyod kyi gsang ba'i lha gang las// snang sring thams cad 'phel 'grib mdzad// rin chen ral pa'i gseb nas ni// khrag gi 'od zer 'bros pa las// srid pa'i bud med dbang
229a7(ti): du sdud// nad dang rims nang thams cad bdag/ ri rab bum pa'i nang na bzhugs// snang srid bdag mo'i thugs dam bskang // pha dgu khri stong gis ming btangs pa// snang
229b1(ti): srid kun la dbang mdzad ma// de phyir dbang byed rgyal mos bya'o// ma phya sangs 'bum gyi ming btags pa// thog med srid pa gsum du mchi mdzad ma// srid pa bde 'gro ma shes
229b2(ti): ming yang btags/ bde 'gro ma yi thugs dam bskang // pha dgu khri stong gi rgyal po dang // phya sangs 'bum gyi rgyal mo gnyis// chags pa g.yos nas bar snang mkha' la sbyor
229b3(ti): ba mdzad pa las// 'byung ba me las sprul pa'i bud med gcig/ dkar mo dung mdog g.yu yi ral pa can gcig 'khrungs// dpral na mig gcig snang srid ltar// g.yas na

229b6(ti): du bcings pas na// de phyir nyi zla stong gi thod 'phreng can zhes bya// 'tshe ba'i nad kyi dbang bdag mo bskang // yum che na nyi zla'i thod 'phre can// mu stegs ka la nag po gnyis/

230a1(ti): btags pa// dkar mo thod bzang mngal dbang // de phyir dbyings phyug chen mos bya'o// nag mo mi bzad pa yi rgyan// mdog bzang nad rnams
230a2(ti): sna tshogs gtong // de phyir rgyan gyi rgyal mos bya'o// dmar mo bzang bzhin mi sdug/ skug pa'i nad rnams 'bebs par byed// de phyir bdag nyid ma zhes bya'o// ljang

230a4(ti): gtong mi zad gdug pa'i bu da med bzhi// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // phung byed nag mo sbas pa'i ma bzhi dang // nag mo mi zad sbyor ba byas pa las// dbang
230a5(ti): byebya da las mkhan ma mo bzhi zhig 'khrungs// pha yis ming btags khros pa'i dbang mo can bzhi zhes// ma yis ming btags nad gtong gdug pa'i tsha ba 'bebs mdzad ma//
230a6(ti): khros shing dbang du sdud nyi mas brgyan// de phyir nyi ma 'gros pa'i dbang mo che// mnga' khrag mnga' mdzad nad sna tshogs 'bebs/ pad+mo stong gis sku la legs par brgyan//
230a7(ti): khros nas dbang du ma yang sdud// de phyir bde sbyor 'phros pa'i dbang mo che// srog la mnga' mdzad bdud rtsi sbyor// phyag na ga'u bsnams shing stong gsum gsos mdzad ma//
230b1(ti): khros nas yang dbang du sdud// de phyir bdud sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che// b+ha ga yongs kyi mkha' la mnga' mdzad cing // skye ba'i rgyud rnams rtsad nas gcod par mdzad//
230b2(ti): khros nas ma yang dbang du sdud// de phyir b+hag khros pa'i dbang mor btags// khros pa'i dbang can g.yang gzhi khrag 'thor zhing / bde ba kun lam thams cad rdzogs
230b3(ti): mdzad ma// khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi yi thugs dam skangs// khros pa'i dbang chen ma mo bzhi rnams dang // 'byung ba bzhi yi bdag mo rtses pa las// mu stegs ka la
230b4(ti): nag pos tshor// mu stegs gdug pas dmod pa bor ba las// mtsha' sna byed pa'i bud med khyed rnams kyi// nal bu lho ru bsrel nas kyang // ngo tsha bu yang sbed par shog/
230b5(ti): gdug pa'i dmod pa de btsan nas// bu mo spun bzhi skyes pa las// 'am bzhi yi ngo tsha nas// ngo rab gling bzhir bskus nas bzhag/ bud med bzang sdug la 'dod chags
230b6(ti): pa bzhi 'khrungs// pha yis ming btags pa/ gling bzhi'i rgyal mo bya'o// 'am nyi ma khros pas ming btags pa// dkar mo mig gcig bya rgod thul pa can// tshe la
230b7(ti): dbang byed sems can dbang sdud ma// de phyir dkar mo stong khams rgyas 'debs ma ru btags// 'am pad+ma khros pas ming btags pa// nag mo ral pa can zhing gi g.yang
231a1(ti): gzhi gsol// dbang po kun la dbang byed pas// de phyir nug mo snang srid rmongs byed mar btags// 'am bde sbyor khros pa'i ming btags pa/
231a2(ti): dmar mo mi zad chu srin ga yang gzhi gsol// sha khrag kun la dbang byed pas// de phyir dmar mo snang srid za byed ma ru btags// 'a ma cag khros pas ming btags pa/
231a3(ti): ser mo las mkhan rma bya'i thul pa can// tshe dbang sdud cing snang srid 'phel mdzad ma// de phyir ser mo las mkhan ma ru btags// g.yas pa khrag 'thor ba la nang
231a4(ti): 'bebs// g.yon pa gab 'thor ma mo 'bod// gling bzhi'i ngos la dbang gnas pas// sgras bdag gling gi bdag mos bya'o// bskang ngo gling bzhi'i rgyal mo'i thugs dam
231a5(ti): bskang // bskang yang bskang ste mchod kyang mchod// bskang mchod bya'i dus la 'bab// srid pa skos rje brang dkar yang // ri rab kha la gnas bcas nas// dpag bsam
231a6(ti): shing skyes pa nas// srid pa cha byed cha snyoms bzhugs// de gnyis sbyor ba mdzad pa las// gdug pa'i ma mo spun drug skyes// pha yis ming btags pas// phung byed
231a7(ti): nag mo ral pa can drug ces ming btags// 'am srid pa cha byed ma yis ming btags pa// ri rab byang shar mtshams la dbang byed ma// na bzar sprin dkar rgyan gsol
231b1(ti): ma/ e ka dza ti ma ru ming yang btags// de yi nub mo tha chungs ni// nu nges stengs kyis nang shad na// nag mo mi bzad mi thod can// g.yas nas bdud kyi khram bam
231b2(ti): bsnams// sems can thams cad khram la 'debs// khram bdag kun gyi khang dpon ma// g.yon na shong rje dkar nag 'a grams// sems can thams cad shod la
231b3(ti): 'debs// shod la 'debs pa'i khang dpon mdzad// mtshan ni nad kyi rkyal pa 'debs// nang dang rims kyi bdag mo lags// bu mo yin te dbang yang che// ma
231b4(ti): bdud mo yis dbang byas nas// phung byed nang dang dal 'debs ma// ya bdud nag mo dbang byas nas// ya bdud gnam nas 'debs par byed// mthing gi gu ra nag
231b5(ti): nang na bzhugs// nag mo 'dod khams gtso ru btags// phung byed nag mo'i thugs dam bskang // bzhi ni ri rab zung bzhir bzhag/ ri rab gru yang 'degs su bcug
231b6(ti): rgyal chen bzhi yi chung mar byin// srid pa'i gru 'degs chen mo ste// shan ting dkar mo chen mo dang // dun ting nag mo chen mo dang // ha ra ting dmar mo chen mo dang /
231b7(ti): gru ting ser ljang zhes su btags// bu mo yin te dbang yang chung // de phyir ri rab gru yang 'debs par byed// gru 'degs chen mo'i thugs dam bskang // srid pa'i gru
232a1(ti): 'degs bzhi rnams dang // rgyal chen bzhi rnams dang 'tshogs pa'i sras// mi mo bzhi rnams skyes pa las// pha yul 'khor srung gis ming
232a2(ti): btags pa// lag na dAr dkar ba dan bsnams// khrag 'thung kun la dbang sgyur mas// dmag gi rgyal mor mid yang btags// 'a ma sha na ting dkar mos ming
232a3(ti): btags pa// snang srid skye 'gro thams cad kyi// yan lag dbang sdud mtsho ba gtsigs// de phyir dkar mo mche gtsigs ma ru ming yang btags// bskang
232a4(ti): dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang // pha 'phags skyes po yis ming btags pa// gshin rje khams kyi dbang sdud btags// de phyir dmag gi rgyal mor btags//
232a5(ti): 'am dun ting nAg mos ming btags pa// snang sbrid 'bum la rag ta'i badrag/ nag mo kha rgan nad 'bebs ma// de phyir nag mo kha g.yal ma// bsang ngo dmag
232a6(ti): gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bsgrung // pha mig mi bzang gis ming btags pa// klu yi dbang sdud phyag na dar dmar bu dan bsnams// de phyir dmag gi rgyal mor btags// 'am
232a7(ti): shan ting dmar mos ming btags pa// dmar mo klu nad rnam pa sna tshogs 'bebs// rtsa nad 'ching zhing zha grum nad 'ching ma// de phyir dmar mo mchu 'jib ma ru
232b1(ti): btags// bskang po dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bsgrung // pha rnam thos sras kyis ming btags pa// gnod sbyin dbang sdud dar ser phyag na bsnams// de phyir dmag
232b2(ti): gri rgyul mo zhes kyang bya// 'am grub ting ser ljang ming btags pa// ser mo snang srid dbugs la mnga' mdzad ma// rkang dang bcud len za byed chen mo ste//
232b3(ti): phyir ser mo rkang lhag ma zhes btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang // dmu dang srin por 'tshogs pa'i sras// mi bzad ral can bdun 'khrungs te/
232b4(ti): nags kyi bu mo chen mo ni// lha chen tshogs kyi bdag la byin// nag mo rgyu mtsho gting skems ma// sems can khrag thang dbang mo che// a pa dmu yis ming btag
232b5(ti): pa/ nag mo dbang sdud ces su btags// 'am srin mo mgo 'phyangs ma yis ming btags pa// dbang chen sems can kun bsgral bas// de phyir dpal ldan shugs
232b6(ti): ba grol ma zhes bya ba// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang // de 'og dga' byed chung ma yin// mdzes pa'i cha byad bzung nas ni// 'chi bdag kun gyi gzi
232b7(ti): 'phrog ma// a pha dmu yis ming btags pa// gzi 'phrog bdag mo chen mos bya'o// ma srin mo'i rgyal mos ming btags pa// rgyan bzang srid pa dbang sdud/
233a1(ti): ma// dkar mo kun bzang zhes su btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang // de 'og byed spu'i chung ma yin// nam mkha'
233a2(ti): dkyil nas nad gtong ma// srid gsum rtsel dbang mdzad ma// dregs pa kun gyi kha lo sgyur// a pha da mu yis ming btags pas// tshe bdag chen mor ming yang
233a3(ti): btags// 'a ma srin mo'i rgyal mos ming btags pa// dkar mo za byed kun grags ma zhes btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang // de 'og khyab
233a4(ti): 'jug chung ma yin// rnal 'byor dam tshig nyul byed ma// de phyir ye shes chen mor ming btags pa// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskrang // de 'og b+h+ring
233a5(ti): gi ri rab snying chung ma yin// khrag gi rgyal mo'i nang na bzhugs// nad kyi dra ba mig dgu thogs// kha rlangs nad gtong za byed ma// a pha dmu yis ming btags pa/
233a6(ti): lag rings dgug pa zhes su btags// 'am srin mo'i rgyal mos ming btags pa// rdo rje 'od chags zhes su btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang //
233a7(ti): de 'og ma hA kA la'i chung ma yin// dmar mo sgeg ma lag na zhags pa thogs// khams gsum ma lus 'ching zhing sgrol bar byed// a pa dmu yis ming btags pa//
233b1(ti): srid pa thams cad 'ching byed ma// ma srin mo'i rgyal mos ming btags pa// 'jig rten ma yis 'gengs zhing gsal mdzad ma// rdo rje gsal 'phros zhes su
233b2(ti): btags// tha chungs gzhon nu'i chung ma yin// mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// lcags kyu thogs shing dbang du sdud// dam las 'das pa'i snying 'byin
233b3(ti): ma// a pha dmu yis ming btags pa// 'dren byed chen mos ming yang btags// 'am srin mos ming btags pa// dbu la g.yu yi ral pa can// ral
233b4(ti): pa'i gseb nas sprul pa 'gyed// 'gyed byed g.yu yi sgrol mar btags// bskang do dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang // yar la shod kyi skyes to re// ri rab byang shar mtshams
233b5(ti): na gnas// bdag nyid ma zhes bya ba ni// nub kyi phyogs na gnas pa las// de gnyis yid kyis 'tshogs pa las// dbu mangs ral pa 'bar bas gzigs// spyan mig
233b6(ti): snang srid byar byed// gdug pa'i las mkhan chen mo ste// a pha skyes to re yis ming btags pas// sprul pas 'jig rten bsgral bar mdzad// ma bdag nyid ma nyid ma yis
233b7(ti): ming btags pa// rdzu 'phrul che zhing las la brtson// de phyir gar gyi rgyal mos btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi pa skang // yar la shod kyis skyes to dang //
234a1(ti): dbyings phyugs ma zhes bya ba ni// yid kyis sbyor ba byas pa las// nad gtong chen mo 'khrugs pa las// dmar nag 'jigs byed ral pa can//
234a2(ti): lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang // grong las thor zhing nad 'bebs na// pha yis ming btags nad gtong yin// ma dbyings phyug ma yis ming btags pa// khrag 'thor
234a3(ti): klu rnams dbang byed pa// sa bdag pad+ma 'phreng du btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang // ri rab kha khyor shar phyogs nas// bdud nag gsod byed chen
234a4(ti): mo gnas// ri rab bang rim shar phyogs na// e ka dzA ti gnas pa las// de gnyis sbyor ba byas pa'i bu// za byed bud med gnyis cig 'khrungs// a pha bdud kyis//
234a5(ti): ming btags pa// phung byed nam mkha'i rgyal mos bya'o// a ka dzA tis ming btags pa// sngon mo ral gcig gsar sha bcibs// lag na tshe yi bum pa rnams//
234a6(ti): tshe dang g.yang gi bdag mo son// rin chen srid 'debs ma zhes btags// bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang // dkar mo g.yu yi go cog can// chibs su dung
234a7(ti): sha ga yu chung chibs// lag na gser gyi thugs kyu bsnams// khams gsum thams cad thal bar rlog/ gling bzhi kun la dbang sgyur ma// de phyir 'jig rten dbang phyug
234b1(ti): ma ru btags// lha chen rgyal po grags mchog dang // dkar mo mig gcig 'tshogs pa'i sras// las la mkhas pa'i bud med 'khrungs// gling bzhir sgrub cing las
234b2(ti): la brtson// brgya byin mi zad srin mo yin// de phyir gling bzhi rgyal mo lha yi sring // bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bkang // gshin rje nag po chen po dang /
234b3(ti): nag po ral can tshogs pa'i sras// mi yi lus la gcan gzan sder// gdug pa'i brjid med nag mo 'khrungs// mkha' la rgyug cing srog 'phrog cing // de phyir mkha' la
234b4(ti): khyung lding gshin rje'i snying // bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang // klu yi rgyal mo a ldan dang // dmar mo dbang sdud 'tshogs pa'i sras// gdug byed bud med
234b5(ti): lus pa la// dbu yang 'phra men dbu can 'khrungs// dmar chen khrag la rol mdzad cing // klu yi las rnams kun la mkhas// klu yi khams las kun las bskul//
234b6(ti): dga' bo 'jog po'i sring mo yin// de phyir dkar mo g.yag thod klu yi sring // bskang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang // gnod sbyin rag sha byed dang // sor mo las ma
234b7(ti): 'tshogs pa'i bu// nag mo sder can gnod sbyin sring // gnod sbyin dkar mo'i sring mo yin// gling bzhir rgyug cing las la brtson// nag mo sder chen gnod sbyin sring /
235a1(ti): 'jig rten rnams kyi sring mo ste// gdug byed nad gtong 'dra men du// lag na glo snying nang grol thogs// mkhal ma khrag grang snyim par 'debs//
235a2(ti): brkang ngo dmag gi rgyal mo ma bzhi bskang // dkar nag dmar sdang zhal ma'i// gdug pa'i ma mo khyed bskang ngo // bdud mo bkol byang las/ bskang la nag mo ri rab
235a3(ti): la gnas pa'i ma mo brkang ba'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten las grub pa'i ma mo yi// 'khoran/
235a4(ti): nag mo 'bum sde dang // bdud mo rnams kyis bskor nas bzhugs// 'jig rten mi la gnod byed pas// de yi bskang ba ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bshad du
235a5(ti): gsol// mngon rdzogs dpal gyis bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten pa yi bdud mo ni// sems can kun la gnod byed pas// de yi bskang ba ngas bshad kyis// nyon
235a6(ti): cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// hUM/ chos nyid kun tu bzang mo las// kro d+hi shwa ri mu kha le// bdal ba chen po'i mkha' klong dbyings// sku gcig zhal lnga dbang sgyur ma//
235a7(ti): zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma// dbyings lnga ye shes lnga 'char ma// klong lnga rgyal mo rus 'gyur ma// dpyid kyi rgyal mo rus 'gyur ma// gting gi drod na khe ru 'don//
235b1(ti): kha yi khyag pa gting du sdud// snang srid 'bras bu'i bcud skyed ma// na bza' lha gur mthing sgyu gsol// sku mdog mon kha thal mdog ma// dpyid zla gsum gyi rgyal
235b2(ti): mo yang // me dang drod la mnga' mdzad ma// dpyid kyi rgyal mo rus sgyur ma// sngo la gdang ba'i zhal 'char ma// skye 'gro gso ba'i mdzad ma// do nod dpyid kyi rgyal mo
235b3(ti): bzhang // dbyar gyi rgyal mo dus sgyur mu// snang srid mkhar la thon rgyas ma// sku mdog sngo ljang g.yu 'od 'bar// dbyar zla gsum gyi rgyal mo las// gsher dang rlan
235b4(ti): la mnga' mdzad ma// dbyar zla rta pa'i zhal 'char ma// mi las 'khor ba'i b+ha ga can// thugs rje skye 'gro gso ba'i phyir// de nod dbyar gyi rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang//
235b5(ti): ston gyi rgyal mo dus sgyur ma// rtsi bcud 'bras bu smin par mdzad// sku mdog gser gyi 'od 'bar ma// ston zla gsum gyi rgyal mo yi// gsal 'dod pa'i dbang chen
235b6(ti): gyis// bkrag dang mdangs la mda' mdzad ma// ston gyi rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang // dgun gyi rgyal mo dus sgyur ma// gting gi 'khyug pa kha ru 'don// kha ru gton
235b7(ti): cing rgyas 'debs ma// sku mdog shel gyi 'od 'bar ma// dgun zla gsum gyi rgyal mo yi// lcags dang rlung la mnga' mdzad ma// dgun gyi rgyal mo dbang sgyur ma// grang
236a1(ti): la 'den pa'i zhal 'char ma// thugs rje skye 'gro gso ba'i phyir// de nod dgun gyi rgyal mo bskang // dus bzhi ra ba'i rgyal mo bzhi// zhal
236a2(ti): lnga ra bskyed pa'i yum lngar bskang // glong lngar sdud pa'i kha lngar bskang // dbyings lngar gsal ba'i thugs lngar bskang // rgyud dang 'bras bu sman dang rdzas// phu dang gling dang
236a3(ti): rin po che// rgyal mo bzhi yi thugs dam bskang // kro d+hi shwa ri bzhi bslangs pas// kro d+hi shA ri mu kha la// srid pa'i rgyal mo bskangs nas kyang // kun tu bzang mo bde gyur
236a4(ti): cig/ rgyal ba bskyed pa'i yum du bskang // sems can bskyed pa'i ma ru bskang // 'byung ba gnod pa'i dbyings su bskang // snang srid 'char ba'i klong du bskang //

236b3(ti): g.yag shing khro la te khro la// dung gi sgo mo khrigs sa khrigs// de 'dra blon mo'i dbyar sa nas// dung gi me tog ha li ni// dar dkar gur phub skongs sa skongs/

238b1(ti): du de ni rag ta 'thung // dgun sa mkhar na bzhugs tsam na// khro chu'i bang rim sku mkhar na// ma ru tsi yi grong gis bskor// ma bdud dbyar sar bzhud pa'i tshe// gur
238b2(ti): nag mang po skongs sa skongs// yol nag mang po khyud de khyud// gnam lcags phur pa thams sa thams// glog gi 'phreng ba brengs se brengs// gur nag nang na bzhugs tsam na//

239a1(ti): khams ma gi na// gnam sa smug 'thibs nang shed na// dmu bdud rgyal mo de na bzhugs// srid pa'i gting khams ma gi na// dmu mkhar bas yi

239a3(ti): shing rengs se rengs// rma bya'i rgyal mtshan ya re re// de 'dre'i gur gyi nang shed na// smug ting rgyal mo bzhi zur ma// mchong gi bud med dmu yi lcam// dmu za bdud kyi
239a4(ti): sru ma cig can// sku la mchong gi zang rab gsol// rma bya stong gi phud khang can// ba se yi thul pa ya ba bskor// mtshan ni dmu lcam bral ma nyan// smug po 'bras bu
239a5(ti): can gyis bskang // de yi bu mo gcung mo ni// dmu mkhar lcags kyi skra zur la// gong sngon dmu bya 'phur zhing 'chags// gur dang yol gyi ru zur la// mthong gi mdze rma
239a6(ti): 'brug ltar du ra// smug mo dmu yi mdun zur ma// rma bya spungs pa'i thul pa gsol// phyag na mchong gi gyid dkar bsnams// smug mo 'bum gyi rgyal mo bzhugs// dmu
239a7(ti): sman bdun zur srid pa'i las// dmu bdud 'dod chags nga yis bskang // de yi g.yog mo bskang ba ni// ri rab zad pa'i rmang sna na// jo mo sri bdud rgyal ma ni// phung sriH
239b1(ti): mo ta rA non// ra nag ral kha gos su gon// phung sri rnga mog pa la// thugs kyi dra ba lal du 'grel// kha dgu'o dod gnam du 'bod// mig dgu byar srid la gtong /
239b2(ti): phung sri rnga mo zhon pa bskang // gling bzhi 'gras pa'i tha ma na// lcags kyi gur zlum nag po na// zhing sri rgyal mo mig gcig ma// rta ru phag pa lto zhan zhon// zhing sri rgyal
239b3(ti): mo'i thugs dam bskang // srid pa bgrangs pa'i mar gzhug na// dur sri mdze mo ru yon zhon// wa mo gzhug rings rol du khrid// lus la lcags kyi srog pa gsol/
239b4(ti): bskang ngo ma mo khyod kyang bskang // khu le shang sa ma gi na// rta ru rtol mo ru yon zhon// khyi mo dmar mo rol du khrid// khrim sri nag mo'i thugs dam bskang // khu le shang
239b5(ti): smad ma gi na// rta ru zum pa rag pa chi bas// rol du zangs kyi bred mo khrid// khrim srin ga mo'i thugs dam bskang // zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha
239b6(ti): rgyud las/ smug ting rgyal mo bskang ba'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o// // gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// yul gdon ma mo ji ltar bskang // yang
239b7(ti): dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// yul gdon ma mo bskang ba ni// nga yis khyod la bshad kyis nyon// ga nam srid 'ol ma chen mo ni// rta ru klong rta dmar mo zhon// gos
240a1(ti): su smag gi sprug pa gon// ga nam sri 'ol ma'i thugs dam bskang // de nas sa sri mer ba bskang // bzhugs ni sa yi gting na bzhugs// rnga mo
240a2(ti): nag mo rta ru zho na// grum ma skya bo rol du khrid// ral lcags grum ka'i rol pa gsol// sa sri mer ma'i thugs dam bskang // dam sri mchod ma chen mo ni// ba na de mo ni
240a3(ti): chen mo la// 'phreng ba dkar nag skye la 'chang // long gor skya mo rkang la gyon// kyi sra'i klog pa sku la gsol// mchod rten thul po'i gseb nas ldang // khang pa hrul
240a4(ti): po'i nang na gnas// sdongs ni the rang 'byung po de dang sdongs// dur khrod shin dog sdongs zla mdzad// dbang ni phag pa khyi sde dbang // dam sri mtshon pa'i thugs dam bskang
240a5(ti): de nas chung srin myug ma ni// bzhugs ni rgya mtsho'i gting na bzhugs// ldang ni rgya mtsho'i gting nas ldang // chu gzhung sngon mo rta ru zhon// ta sram mang po rol du rol//
240a6(ti): me bzhur mang po'i 'od la ste// 'debs ni dar dang 'khag par 'debs// chu yi kha ni thur du 'bab// lce yi kha ni gye nal 'khyil// rgyun mtsho rgyu gsum la rgyu// dbang ni
240a7(ti): phag pa chu kha dbang // chu lag sngon mo'i thugs dam paskang // de 'og phug bdag phug sri ni// dkar sral can dang sngo sral can// dmar sral ma dang gse ra sral ma/
240b1(ti): se skyer mang po yangs sa sangs// sdug bran mang po ldems so ldems// bya bran mang po pu ru ru// gcan gzan mang po zal ma zul// mdze tol mang po dar ma du pa
240b2(ti): smug mo mchod mdog 'di yis bskang // zhes gsungs so// bdud mu bkol byung nam mkha'i rgyud las/ yul gdon ma mo bkang ba'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o//
240b3(ti): gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i bdud mo ji ltar bskang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud mo bskang ba 'di lta
240b4(ti): na cig gnang 'dul mas de byud// mthong bdud sal 'byas sa/ mtshang gra stsung gu mtsha las/ sa ma 'ad kyi ba/ n+ta/ tha rdzam nas
240b5(ti): la gsol// sbrul nag 'khrigs pa'i zhags pa 'phen// rdzu 'phrul zhabs kyis nam mkha' gnon// phyag gis bdud kyi sgo dza 'dril// rma bya zhon nas rlung lcags rdeg
240b6(ti): srid pa gsum mthong mig rtsub sgrib// g.yung drung mun pa'i ra lA pa can// me ri brtsegs pa'i bod ka can// rgyal mo dbyar na bzhugs pa'i tshe// sngon dmar 'thibs pa'i
240b7(ti): gur na bzhugs// rgyal mo ston na bzhugs pa'i tshe// snang srid gsol ba'i snying po can// rgyal mo dgun na bzhugs pa'i tshe// lcags mkhar sngon mo rtsa badral ma//
241a1(ti): / rgyal mo dpyid na bzhugs pa'i tshe// rlangs pa drod kyi snying thibs nang // khyod ni rin chen mgo yag lcam// nag mo khyod kyi 'khor g.yog ni// nag
241a2(ti): mo khram thogs bcu yis bskor// gling bzhi khram khra'i nang du bcug/ sna'i srid sems can khram la 'debs// nam mkha' nag mo bcu yis bskor// bdud la dbang
241a3(ti): 'dul mthu mo che// rin chen 'gong yag kha sgyur la// ya bdud lag tu sho ra re// yu lung gser gyi ye khyud na// srid ma mar gyi gur yol na// nag mo 'bum gyi phod
241a4(ti): ka ba sgyur// gos su grib so nag po gon// srugs thag dgu yi zhags pa 'phan// zhabs kyis dpag bsam shing bu non// phyag gis bdud rta yam pa 'debs//
241a5(ti): skyung mo zhon nas me lcags rdeg/ sems can mthong na mig rtsa ba sgrib// shing lo thabs pa'i ral pa can// khro bcu brtsegs pa'i mche ba gtsigs// rgyal mo dbyar na
241a6(ti): 'grogs pa'i tshe// khrag gi rgya mtsho'i gting na bzhugs// rgyal mo ston dang 'grogs pa'i tshe// gser gyi mching par 'bras bu 'gams// rgyal mo dgun dang 'grogs
241a7(ti): pa'i tshe// rlung chub grong ba'i ded dpon mdzad// lho rgyal mo dpyid dang 'grogs pa'i tshe// skra gur 'thibs pa'i nang na gzims// 'khor ni srin mo stong gis bskor/
241b1(ti): brtul zhugs bcu yis las byed ma// khyod ni bkrag med ldum mo yin// bdud la dbang sgyur mthu mo che// khyod la nag mo'i mdos bskang gis// nag po bkrag med
241b2(ti): lham mo khyod// nag po bkrag med kha sgyur la// bdud kyi lag tu sho ra re// nam mkha'i bcu yis thugs dam skong // bdud yul lu gu gur shod na// dgun gyi
241b3(ti): dgunas nas// bdud mkhar sgo dgu'i rdzong na bzhugs// skya mo gdong dgu rlung gi ral pa can// tshub ma dgu 'khyil rang ral can// zangs kyi dri rta dgu la zhon//
241b4(ti): bskang ngo khyod kyi thugs dam bskang // yul dang mang yung yang stengs ni// yel yol yal kha na// g.yung drung gzi 'bar ma du na sa nas// nag mo me yi phod ka can// mu na
241b5(ti): pa'i bzang ral sku la gsol// sngon dmar gzha' yi zhags pa 'phen// zhabs kyis ri rab rtse mo gnon// phyag gis sprin dang khu rlangs sdud// 'brug lnga zhon nus
241b6(ti): grog lcag rdeg/ tsha grang 'bar ba'i ral pa can// gza' skar 'od kyi mche ba gtsigs// le brgan 'od kyi lcags skyud nas// rgyal mo dbyar na bzhugs pa'i tshe//
241b7(ti): ha lo me tog gur gling na// mthing nag g.yu gur nang na bzhugs// blon mo bcu gsum 'khor gyis bskor// rgyal mo srid pa rdzogs pa'i ston sa nas// ka sha
242a1(ti): / 'bras bu bcu gsum bdag/ bud med bcu gsum spyi bdud ma// rgyal mo dgun na bzhugs pa'i tshe// snang srid gting du btsud nas ni//
242a2(ti): snang srid kha la rgyas 'debs ma// rgyal mo dpyid na bzhugs pa'i tshe// skyed pa'i ma mo bcu gsum bdag/ khyod ni phya ba dud lcam mo yani// ba dud la dbang sgyur
242a3(ti): mthu mo che// bdud ye la khyab pas kha sgyur la// nag mo shel skyong 'di yis bskang // nam mkha' gsum gyis thugs dam bskang // yul dag na yul yang
242a4(ti): na// nam mkha' mthongs kyi gur yul na// khyung gshog nyi ma'i phod ka can// 'od zer 'bar ba'i zang ral can// nyi zer dkar po'i zhags pa 'phen// zhabs kyis
242a5(ti): srid pa'i rtse mo gnon// phyag gis srid pa'i tshe brag sdud// khyung la zhon nas gzha' lcug rdeg/ skye 'gro yongs la mig rtsa sgrib// rlung dang bu yug ral pa can// gnam
242a6(ti): lcags khros pa'i mche ba gtsigs// dar nag 'od kyi lcags bskyong ma// rgyal mo dbyar nas 'grogs pa'i tshe// g.yu lu 'od kyi mar shod na// mthing ni gur ba gur yon tan//
242a7(ti): shugs sgrol bcu yi 'khor du bskor// rgyal mo ston na bzhugs pa'i tshe// gser mdog bcu gnyis rab skyugs ma// rgyal mo dgun na bzhugs pa'i tshe// srid pa'i dpal skyed
242b1(ti): dgun yul na// 'phra men gser gur mnga' bdag mo// ye shes kar lung khong seng nas// rgyal mo dpyid na bzhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' la drod 'bebs bcu gnyis bsnan/
242b2(ti): khyod ni sgos mkhan lham mo yin// nam mkha' bcu gnyis thugs dam bskang // bdud la dbang sgyur mthu mo che// skos rje brang dkar bka' sgyur la// bya nag lug nag 'di
242b3(ti): yis bskang // rgyal mo dgun na bzhugs pa'i tshe// bu yug gangs kyi phod ka can// nam mkha' sgyu mo'i mnga' bdag mo// rgyal mo dpyid ni bzhugs pa'i tshe// gting ra
242b4(ti): drong lung khyud 'khor nas// ma khyim chen mo kha dgu ma// lho gur sgyu mo na bza' gsol// lcags kyi dri rta dgu la zhon// gting khams 'khrug cing dod glong ma// rgyal mo srid
242b5(ti): kyi las mkhyen mo// nam mkha' dmar mo'i mnga' bdag mo// rgyal mo dbyar na 'grogs tsam na// rgya mtsho ru yi dgu ling na// mthing nag gur phub skongs so skongs// chu dar
242b6(ti): yol ba khyud de khyud// g.yu yi tshugs shing rengs se rengs// gur dang yul gyi nang shed na// g.yu char zam zim kha chu la// nam mkha' sngon mo'i mnga' bdag mo// rgyal
242b7(ti): mo ston dang 'grogs pa'i tshe// gangs kyi ri rab gser mtshon// gser gur mang po skongs so skongs// bud med gser gyi phod ka can// phod mkhar 'bras bu bcud chags ma//
243a1(ti): chibs su bdud kyi rtal zhon// rgyal mo ston gyi las byed ma// nam mkha' gser mig mnga' bdag ma// 'khor ni nag mo bzhi yis bskor//
243a2(ti): shar nas bskor ba'i nag mo ni// nag mo srid par nyal byed ma// shel sgong nag mo spyi dkar bdag/ nag mo lcags skad la 'bebs na// nam mkha' nag mo'i mnga' bdag
243a3(ti): mo// lho nas bskyod pa'i nag mo ni// nag mo dud kha sha ma thabs can// shel sgong nag mo'i mnga' bdag mo// lho nas srid pa dbang la 'debs// lag na bdud kyi khra ma thogs
243a4(ti): ma// khyod ni nam mkha' mthing ging ba dag/ nub nas bskor ba'i nag mo la// nag mo cha ri rgya mtsho'i bdag/ shel sgong nag mo chu kha'i bdag/ lag na khrag gi rkyal pa
243a5(ti): thogs// khyod ni nam mkha' dmar mo'i bdag/ byang nas bskor ba'i nag mo ni// nag mo gser gyi zangs dal can// lag na gling thogs// shel sgong nag mo lha sar
243a6(ti): bdag/ dus bzhi las byed spun dgu byed// mche ba dgu gtsigs srid pa za// nyi ma dgu yi mig zur lta// spu na dgu zhag gi phod ka can// zhabs kyis gser gyi ri
243a7(ti): bdun gnon// phyag gis snang srid tshe bkrag sdud// cho 'phrul zhags pa dgu 'phen ma// dal nad 'bebs pas khrag lus ma// nag mo ral pa dgu thibs ma// khyod ni
243b1(ti): nam mkha' klog gi bdag/ 'dzam bu gling bzhir nyal ba'i tshe// na bza' smug nag sku la gsol// chibs su mdze dang rtol la chi bas// khrag gi ril ba khal du bkal/
243b2(ti): nag mo nam gru spun dgu ma// nam mkha' rgyu yi mkha' bdag mo// khyod la ming po dgu yod de// jo bo dgu yi ming dgu ni// kha tshig lce tshig jo bo'i ming // skye shi mdzad yag
243b3(ti): jo bo'i ming // bdud rje spyang khrag jo ba'i ming // bdud she ru gcig jo bo'i ming // lto ba sha zan jo bo'i ming // nag po bam pa rdza bo'i ming // 'thom po snying zan rdzatha
243b4(ti): ming / nag po phud med jo bo'i ming // ming dgu ldum dgu glud kyi bdag/ ming dgu lug la kha bstan nas// bdud lug nag po spyi dkar gyis// srid pa'i ming gi glud du
243b5(ti): 'bul// bdud la dbang sgyur mthu bo che// khyod la nag po 'di yis bskang // ya bdud lag tu sho ra re// gling bzhi mtshams kyi gur bzhin// dregs pa lcam dral brgyad
243b6(ti): bzhugs pa// lho nub mtshams kyi mthing gur nas// mi nag rta nag ldum mo gcig/ lag na srin po'i mdung thogs ma// na bza' dar nag sgogs ma la// dmar smug
243b7(ti): me yi phod ka can// shod rje dkar nag lag na thogs// mi nag rta nag bka' bsgyur la// bdud kyi phyag brnyan da ra re// nub byang mtshams kyi g.yu gur nas// mi sngon
244a1(ti): rta sngon ldum mo gcig/ lag na khram shing dkar nag thogs// mtshan ni sngon mo g.yu 'thungs ma// na bza' g.yu yi na bza' la// ha lo ma
244a2(ti): tog cha ga can// mi sngon rta sngon bka' bsgyur cig/ byang shar mtshams kyi gser gur nas// mi ser rta ser lcam mo ni// lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// maH
244a3(ti): ni ser mo las byed ma// na bza' gser gyi na bza' la// ra gan 'bar ba'i cha ga can// mtshan ni ser mo las mkhan mo// mi ser rta ser bka' bsgyur cig/
244a4(ti): shar mtshams kyis gling gur nas// mi da mar rta dmar lham mo cig/ lag na gcod pa'i spu gri thogs// mtshan ni shan pa gri thogs ma// na bza' zangs kyi nu bza'
244a5(ti): la/ byu ru 'bar ba'i cha ga can// mtshan ni dmar mo ral gcig ma// mi dmar rta dmar bka' bsgyur cig/ srid pa'i bud med bdud btsan lcam// gling bzhi mtshams
244a6(ti): kyi bdud mo bzhi// nam mkha' brgyad kyis thugs dam paskang // bdud pa tsan khram la thebs sa ma re// phyag brtan lag tu sho ra re// srid pa'i gling khams ya ga na/
244a7(ti): ri spug de ni lung du spug/ mchong gi bud med g.yu yi skum// mtshan ni dmu lca ma bra ma nyan// ba 'og gur la g.yu yi yol// gur dang yol gyi sta zur la// dmu bya gong
244b1(ti): sngon 'chags shing 'phur// dmu nag dmu yi mdun zur ma// rma bya spungs pa'i thul pa gsol// ming po dmu bdud bka' sbyar la// dmu khams chen pos bkab pa ra/
244b2(ti): dmu pa tsan lag tu shor ra re// bar snang nam mkha'i mthongs gong nas// srid pa'i bud med nyi ma 'phreng // na bza' nam mkha'i bza' ral can// sprin dkar brtsegs pa'i
244b3(ti): phod ka can// gnam sman 'bum gyi gtso mo mdzad// dkar mo dung gi thod rdeng can// shel gyi ser ba yang thabs 'thor// nam mkha' stong la dbang sgyur ba// nam
244b4(ti): mkha'i ma mo drug zur ma// khyod ni ya dzo dkar po'i ldu ma// ga nam gyi dkar po kha bsgyur la// rgyal mo dmangs la babs sa ma red// bsnams te lag tu shor ra re//
244b5(ti): bai DU ra nam mkha'i 'od gling nas// srid pa'i bud med glog mda' 'phen// skya rengs 'od kyi bzang ral can// sprin dkar brtsegs pa'i phod ka can// nyi zer khra bo'i ral pa
244b6(ti): can// phyag na skar mda' phyogs bcur 'phen// skar chen lus la za zur ma// nam mkha' lnga yi mnga' bdag mo// the brang khra bo kha sgyur cig/ the brang phugs su zhus
244b7(ti): re/ the brang lag tu sho ra ro// srid pa'i bud med mthu mo che// ma shod gling gi mnga' bdag mo// sku la pad+ma'i 'phreng ba can// sku la sor gyi thul pa gsol// sa thab
245a1(ti): nag po kha bsgyur la// grong du 'byung po babs sa re// sribs kyi lag tu sho ra ro// srid pa'i bud med mi bzad ma// mdzad pa'i cha lugs thol
245a2(ti): ma gyur// spyi gtsug ral pa rdo rje 'greng // drag shul tshang rmad srid la byed// bud med dbu la gdong drug ma// dmar mo glog gi gdong rangs ma// sri can lag tu sho
245a3(ti): ra re/ sri can gdul ba'i drug zur ma// srid de dmar mo kha bsgyur la// blon po'i mang po dar ra re// sri mgo lag tu sho ra re// sngon gyi bdud mo'i thugs dam
245a4(ti): bskang / srid pa'i bud med ral gcig ma// dpral na mig gcig zangs kyi zhal// kha nas so gcig gye na la gtsigs// spyi gtsug ral gcig khrag gi dbu// lag na
245a5(ti): tshuchub ma'i snam bu 'greng // na bza' bas yi skrag pa la// dmar nag khrag gi phod ka can// nag mo srid pa'i drug zur ma// nag mo nyams can spun gsum gyis// dmar
245a6(ti): po spun gsum kha sgyur cig/ srog bdag nar ba byung nga re// ya ma shud dmar po thugs su bcug ga re// brag srin dmar po yul phyir 'khor ra re// mi reng dmar po'i lag
245a7(ti): tu sho ra re// gi ting bdud nag mo'i sprul pa'i lus// srid par 'khyams pa'i khrag 'thung ma// gling bzhi nyul zhing khrag la sgro// chibs su rlung gi 'khor lo chibs// dpral
245b1(ti): na mig gcig snang srid gsal// se skyur ral pa yangs so yangs// mdze dang rtol gyi skrag pa la// dred mo bla tshar phod ka can// sku la sbrul gyi ska rags bcing // bud
245b2(ti): med lus la po chas can// shel rtsal lus la lnga zur ma// nam mkha' lnga yi mnga' bdag mo// khyod ni gru ba can l+h+wam mo ste// skyes bu gru btsan lcam mo yin//
245b3(ti): glu ba can thams cad kha bsgyur la// rgyal ba tsan sgrog la btab pa re// spyi bcan lag tu sho ra re// srid pa'i bud med ro khyung ma// thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul ye shes can//
245b4(ti): seng ge dkar po chibs su tshobs// na bza' mthing gi skrag pa la// g.yu bran brtsegs pa'i pod ka can// 'jigs pa'i ral pa se ral kha// tshangs pa'i bu mo bzhi
245b5(ti): zur ma/ bzhi zur lhags kyi sras gcig ma// 'khor ni 'dod khams rgyal mo bzhi// gling bzhi 'khrug pa'i khro tshul ma// jo mo gcig dang khol mo gsum// spyi
245b6(ti): 'gro legs kyi rgyan zhal ma// ri rab 'grim zhing rgya mtsho bskor// nam mkha' bzhi yi mnga' bdag mo// khyod ni rje btsan lham mo yin// rje bdud rje btsan kha bsgyur

246a3(ti): go mdzad ma// nam mkha' gsum gyi mnga' bdag mo// khyod ni btsan phran jo mo ste// lung gsum mtsho ba kha bsgyur la// ba can gyi khram la thabs sa re// shar ba'i
246a4(ti): lag tu sho ra re// srid pa'i bud med dri 'dul ma// dri btsan zer thabs 'dul ba mo// re rab lhun po'i zom rtsi nas// khams gsum rlabs kyis 'dul mdzad ma//
246a5(ti): sku mdog de ni dmar sgyu la// phyag na gser gyi zangs gri thogs// gnam lkugs ngar ma'i mche ba can// phyag na tshon sna'i bal tshon thogs// spu gri thogs pa'i
246a6(ti): skrag pa la// 'khor lo brtsegs pa'i phod ka can// dus bzhi srid pa khyab par nyul// khros nas gling bzhi khrag tu 'gengs// sku gcig zhal drug gsum zur
246a7(ti): ma/ nam mkha' gsum gyi mnga' bdag mo// mchog tu khrag dang dri la snom// dri bo'i dri thabs kha sgyur la// dri btsan thun du byung ba raM// srid pa'i ro langs
246b1(ti): srid 'dul ma// rta sha za ba'i mo gdong ma// srid dgu 'dul ba'i dpal gyi yum// sku la 'jigs pa'i ral kha gsol// dred mo ral pa dgu sprul ma// zangs
246b2(ti): dang bas yi mche ba gtsigs// srid pa dgu gting kha yi 'debs// khros na rang la rang yang g.yang dus na// stong gsum mchi mche khrag gis 'gongs// g.yas
246b3(ti): na 'jigs pa'i spa ra chen rdeng // srid can kha nas bzung ste rde bas// g.yon na dgra sta drang byed ma// sri can thal bar rlog mdzad ma// zhal kha sre khung gdengs pa 'dra//
246b4(ti): shangs nas glog stong bsnol mar 'don// nyin zhing dur khrod gnas nyul ma// mtshan zhing dur khrod khyab par 'gro// thabs dang shes rab zhabs gnyis ma// srid pa gsal ba'i
246b5(ti): na bza' la// sprul pa thabs kyi phod ka can// dur sri nag po kha bsgyur la// sri dgu can dgu langs sa re// sri can lag tu shor ra re// khyod ni nam mkha' gcig gi bdag
246b6(ti): bskang ngo ma mo khyod bskang ngo // zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byeng las/ bdud mo phod ka can bcu gsum bskang ba bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o//
246b7(ti): / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bdud mo khyo chol 'di rnams kun// nag brgya'i bskang bzlog ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// bskang
247a1(ti): bzlog las rnams gong ma bzhin// 'di yi bca' thabs ni/ 'bru sna mang po la rin po che brdar la spu'o// de cho gsum du bcad la gcig la bud med
247a2(ti): nag mo dgu bya'o// gcig la 'brang rgyas dgu bya'o// gcig la ri rab gling bzhi bya'o// 'brang rgyas dgu la 'phang khra dgu gzugs so// bzang ras kyis brgyan pa'o//
247a3(ti): nam mkha' bcu gsum bya ste/ gtso mo la nag mo khong sngon gcig bya'o// de'i phyi ma la nag mo dung mig gcig/ g.yu mig gcig/ zangs mig gcig/ gser mig
247a4(ti): gcig/ 'bri gnyis/ ra gnyis/ nag mo zangs ma bzhi ste bcu gsum bya'o// phye gtsang ma gcig la lug po mkhal skya gcig/ lug nag po gcig la bdud mo nag mo gcig
247a5(ti): bskyon par bya/ bya nag mo la bud med nag mo gcig bskyon par bya/ lug nag gcig la bya nag gcig bskyon la bzhag/ de rnams bca' thabs so// dang po
247a6(ti): khyo 'tshol ba bcu la glud bsngo ste 'di skad ngo // lug ni nag po mkhal skya 'dis// bdud mo khyo tshol khyod rnams thugs dam bskang // rgyab ni nag por 'dug pa 'di/ sa bdud
247a7(ti): kyi bu mos bris pa yin// rwa gnyis lcags ru ra 'dug pa ni// lha yi bu mos bris pa yin// mig gnyis ser por 'dug pa ni// lha min bu mos bris pa yin// gdong pa rgya bo ra
247b1(ti): 'dug pa ni// da mu yi bu mos bris pa yin// lkog ma dkar por 'dug pa ni// lha yi bu mos bris pa yin// khob ma ser mor 'dug pa ni// khyo tshol bzhi yis bris pa yin//
247b2(ti): rmig pa lcags su 'dug pa ni// bran mo khyo chol bzhi yis bris// lte ba dkar por 'dug pa ni// pad+ma 'phreng gis bris pa yin// de ltar rtags rnams yod pa ni// bdud ma
247b3(ti): nyi shu rtsa drug 'thun pa'i rdzas// de phyir thugs dam skongs gyur cig/ de nas khyo tshol ma bcu'i thugs dam bskang ste/ glung bsngo zhing bskang ba zlog bya ste 'di skad
247b4(ti): do// hUM/ lha yi bu mo khyo tshol ma// khyod 'thun pa'i rdzas chen ni// mthing gi nam mkha' nag mo la// mthing nag gur phub rmongs so skongs// mthing gi sol ba khyud de khyud//
247b5(ti): de 'dra'i gur gyi nang shed na// bud med nag mo hral hral mo// phung bya mang mo gdong la 'dod// pa ni lha ste ma ni bdud// de phyir shA la dbang ba yin// 'thibs shing lci ba'i
247b6(ti): nad bdag mo// bskang ngo khyed kyi thugs dam bskang // skong gyur dgra bgegs bzlog gyur cig/ nag rgya 'di yis thugs dam bskang // ma mo de yi ga cung mo ni// lha
247b7(ti): min bu mo khyo tshol ma// 'bri yi nam mkha' nag mo la// nam mkha' gur nag skongs so skongs// yol nag mang po khyud de khyud// de lta bu yi nang shed na// bud med nag mo
248a1(ti): hral hral mo// phung bya mang po gdong la 'dod// kha brgyad mang po cher re/ bkang ngo khyod kyi thugs dam bskang // sgor gyur dgra bgegs bzlog/
248a2(ti): gyur cig/ nag rgya 'di yis thugs dam bskang // ma mo de yi 'byung mo ni// phyogs phyogs de ni pha gi na// nyi ma byang shar mtshams shes na// brag dang chu 'thab pa gi na//
248a3(ti): byang zang thad ri dmar po bya// zangs mtsho dmar po khyil li li// de lta bu yi nang shed na// ma med shing med rgyu zhags dgu// bzar med gtsang med dgung zhags dgu//
248a4(ti): dgung zhags dgu gsum par 'das na// lhas ngan srin bya nyin dang sgong // 'grag lcog sngon mo mtshan yang 'gyur// mi sgyid de ni sdug yul na// de na dga' bo dgon pa tsam//
248a5(ti): de na bskang ba yog pa tsam// de lta bu yi nang shed na// nam mkha' bal nag nam mkha' la// dar nag gur phub skongs sa skongs// dar nag yol ba khyud de khyud// de
248a6(ti): lta bu yi nang shed na// gshin rje'i bu mo khyod 'tshal ma// phung bya smyung kha gdong la 'dod// pha ni bdud la ma ni btsan// bdud pa tsan gshos pa'i byang rgyal khyod// pha yis
248a7(ti): rtags byin lus po gnag/ ma yis rtags byin rkang pa ser// zhang pos rtags byin pase yi mchu// de phyir bdud kyi thal yi yin// bskang ngo khyod kyi thugs dam pa skang //
248b1(ti): gong gyur dgra bgags pazlog gyur cig/ nag rgya 'di yis thugs dam bkang // ma ma da yi gcung ma na// srin mo 'bum khyod tshal ma// re nag gur bub gongs sa rmongs/
248b2(ti): re nag yol ba khyud de khyud// de lta bu yi nang shed na// bud med nag mo hra la hra la mo// phung bya mang po gdong la ded// pha ni rgyal te ma ni bdud// rgyal bdud 'tshos pa'i bu mo

248b6(ti): la ded// dmu bya phug ron gdong la ded// bal sngon de yi nam mkha' la// dar sngon gur phub skongs so skongs// dar sngon yol bya khyud de khyud// bskang ngo khyed kyi thugs dam

249a1(ti): mo// phung bya mang ba gdong la dad// khA ta mang mo gdong la ded// nam mkha' ba la nag nam mkha' la// dar nag gur phub skongs so skongs//

249a7(ti): dkar gur phub skongs sa skongs// dar dkar ba dan lhabs se lha bas// shal gyi rte'u khrigs sa khrigs// dar dkar yol ba khyud de khyud// khyod ni nag rgya'i mnga' bdag mo//

249b3(ti): yi gu ra phu ba skongs se skongs// gzi yi stegs bu khrigs sa khrigs// ha yi gdan khri stobs sa stobs// ha yi yol ba khyud de khyud// nag rgya 'di yis thugs dam bskang //

249b5(ti): chen mo yas la gshegs// bskrad do khyod kyi thugs dam paskang // bdud mo bkol byang las/ bdud mo khyo tshol ma bcu la glud bsngo ba'i le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o//

249b7(ti): la ga ser gyi 'phang lo gsal te gzhag/ de nas glud bsngo ba 'di skad do// sa yi de ni lug nag la// ga nam gyi de ni bya nag skyon// dpal ldan dbus kyis khyo stor ma//
250a1(ti): bdud kyi lum la gshin rje'i yum// chu nad thams cad bzlog tu gsol// glung bdag chen mo glung 'di bzhes// shar gyi phyogs su rgyang rngu /

250b2(ti): ba spangs pa'i nad 'di bzlog/ grung bdag chen mo grung 'di bzhes// byang shar mtshams nas khyod stor ma// glang gzer 'tsho ba'i nad bdag mo// byi na ya ga'i sprul
250b3(ti): par 'gyed// tsha ba'i gzer nad bzlog tu gsol// glung bdag chen mo glung 'di bzhes// bdud mo bkol byang las/ zan mo khyod stor ma dgu la glung bsngo ba'i

250b5(ti): na// gling gi ming ni khyi yi gring // bya yi ming ni gser gyi bya// mtsho yi ming ni g.yu yi mtsho// gser bya g.yu mtsho'i nang shed na// sngon gyi rgyal mo khyo mi 'dod// da lta

251a1(ti): bdud mo khyi tshol ma// glud du nag mo mkhal rgyu 'bul// bzhes shig gtan gyi grogs su bzhes// 'bul lo yun gyi 'bangs su 'bul// bkang

252b1(ti): g.yas pa na// s+ya bye lto dkar 'phur zhing lding // da lta'i gur sgo g.yon pa na// gdug pa sbrul cig khrugs sa byugs// de 'dra'i gur gyi mnga' bdag mo// khrag gi bud

254a1(ti): bdud mo khyo rkun ma// khyod dang khyo dag mi rku ste// skye ba de yi gong ma la// pha ni gnod sbyin skar ma gdong // ma ni klu mo lce 'byam ma// pha ma

254a3(ti): la yogs da lta langs// stong khams bskor kyang khyo ma rnyed// dbang ni smug nag mkhal brgya dbang // skong ni mdos dang gling gis skong // skyes pa pho yi srog ma

254b1(ti): ni// rus pa'i bud med khrag mig ma// rus pa'i ral pa sha ra ra// 'dod khams lha yul ya gi ru// grogs kyi zla rogs tshol du phyin// lha yul bskor kyang khyo ma
254b2(ti): rnyed// des na bud med bsod nams chung // rus pa'i skrag pa gos su gon// las su rus nad 'brum bu gtong // dbang ba smug nag srol po dbang // bskang ngo khyed
254b3(ti): kyi thugs dam bskang // lho phyogs gling bar mun pa nas// gnod sbyin sngon po'i bu mo ni// me yi bu mo g.yo mig ma// 'dod khams lha yul ya gi na// grogs kyi zla
254b4(ti): rogs tshol du phyi na// lha yul ba tsa la kyang khyo ma rnyed// des na bud med bsod nams chung // me yi skrag pa gos su go na// me yi ral pa sha ra ra// las su tshad nad smra
254b5(ti): tshogs gtong // dbang ni nag rgya srol po dbang // bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // nub phyogs gling bar mun pa nas// gnod sbyin sngon po'i bu mo ni// khrag
254b6(ti): gi bud med dung mig ma// 'dod khams lha yul ya gi ru// grogs kyi zla rogs tshol du phyin// lha yul btsal kyang khyo ma rnyed// des na bud med bsod nams chung //
254b7(ti): khrag gi skrag pa gos su gon// khrag gi ral pa sha ra ra// las su khrag nad rgyu gzer gtong // dbang ni mkhal rgya srol po dbang // bskang ngo khyed kyi thugs dam bskang //
255a1(ti): byang phyogs grang bar sman pa nas// gnod sbyin sman po'i bu mo s+ho// gser gyi bud mod khrag migs// khrag gi lab pagarar// 'dod langs/
255a2(ti): rgyu yul ya gi ru// grogs kyi blo rogs tshol du phyin// g+ha yul bskor kyang khyom rnyed// des na bud med bsod nams chung // rlung gi sreg bgos su gon// rlung gi
255a3(ti): ral pA sha ra ra// las su b+h+yo bog log rgyal gtong // dbang ni mkhrul rgya srol po dbang // bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // rlung gi bur chen slongs so skongs//
255a4(ti): rlung gi bA dan rtsibs sa thib ste// ser bu'i tshon blag na rar// de 'dra'i gu lkog sa smra pa na// chu srin rgyu sa can swai re re// de 'dra gur sgrogs na pa na// rlung gi rgyas
255a5(ti): mtshan mo re// de 'dza bur gyi mnga' bdug sa// sa brgyan dag rgyas dbyur mo yis/ ba las kyi da po// nga 'dzin da ma rnapa mangs// b+h+ya
255a6(ti): rlung mdangs kyis bkag// dpag pasas shing gi som// de bldan pa'i bum pa// sum srid pa'i rgyam mo don bzhugs// thugasas sprus pakri dang 'dzum/ ma
255a7(ti): kyim drugs das bka/ phreng ba'i rgyas pa'i gtor mas bzhag/ zhes gsu // bdung sa bka bya / drug rgya tshus po rje/ na
255b1(ti): / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// de yi yas thabs ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// 'bru sna tshang ba'i gling chung la/
255b2(ti): smag mo dgu la bud med dgu// 'brang rgyas dgu la 'phang khra dgu// mtsho dgu nang du bya dgu'o// gling chung de la nam mkha' dgu// khong sngon gcig dang mig bzhi dang // tshon gsum
255b3(ti): bzhi dang dgu ru bsog/ sman dang gtor ma cha dgu'o// de ni yas kyi rim pa'o// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang las/ smug rgya'i yas bstan pa'i le'u ste nga lnga pa'o// /
255b4(ti): / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// gting khams klu bdud 'di rnams la// nag mo chu khams ji ltar bskang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal
255b5(ti): pa// gting khams klu bdud 'di rnams la// chu khams bskang ba 'di ltar ro// de 'og srid pa'i ma mo ni// srid pa'i rgya mtsho khu drangs nas// khram thog klu yis sol gtong ma//
255b6(ti): chu srin g.yang gzhi lus la gon// dkar nag sbrul gyi ral pa can// chu glang sngon po'i gdan la bzhugs// nyin zhing glud sman rgya dang rtse// mtshan zhing sa bdag gnyen dang sdongs//
255b7(ti): zhal nas rgya mtsho'i klong 'khyil na// klu chen brgyad kyi sring gcig ma// snang srid rtsa ba phyag gis bzung // dgyes na 'jig rten rgyas 'debs ma// khros na klu yi dal 'bebs ma/
256a1(ti): bud med kun gyi ting rgyab can// klu srin pa mo'i jo mo ste// khyod la ming dang mtshan btags pa// klu yi rgyal pos ming btags pa// gtsug na/
256a2(ti): rin chen skad du na// klu sma na rgyal mo chu 'khrim ma// gshe na ra bas mi bo'i skad du na// klu bdud rgyal mo sku 'jal ma// dam pa chos kyis ming btags pa// klu mo yid
256a3(ti): 'ong bkra shis ma// chu gur 'khyil ba'i nang na bzhugs// stag sgo glang dmar brgya yi khal// gzig sgo glang dmar brgya yi kha la// glang dmar nyis brgya'i khal 'dogs ma//
256a4(ti): rgyal mo nam mkha' gcig gi bdag/ klu bdud kun la dbang sgyur ma// gdug pa klu yis zin ta raM// klu gnyan lag tu sho ra re// di ring nag mo chu mdos long // ma bdud
256a5(ti): bcu gnyis rgyal mo ni// ro la mtsho khrag gi gting khams na// bdud khams chud kyi rgyal mo ni// chu bdud gting gi khrag 'thung ma// dmar mo phya sangs chu bya gdong // chi bas
256a6(ti): su zangs kyi chu bya chibs// rol mtsho'i gting nas mdos le na ma// do nod nag mo'i chu mdos long // yon bdag khrag gi glud du ba zhes// glung pa zhes de ni phya sangs cig
256a7(ti): rol mchog yu yi gting mtsho nas// ma bdud chud kyi rgyal mo ni// lag na sngon dmar me 'bar ma// sngon mo nya sgribs g.yu ral mo// chibs su mtsho yi rgyud mo tshabs// sngon
256b1(ti): mo ba gdong mtsho sman bdud// khyod ni sngon mo chu kha'i bdag/ de ring nag mo mdos kyis bskang // gting gi bdud mo klu bdag mo// de 'og ma yi mdos bdag mo// rol mtsho
256b2(ti): gting gi 'o mtsho nas// klu sman ma bdud chud za mo// gting bdud gur bdag phya sangs ma// chibs su chu klung sngon po chibs// de ring nag mo chu mdos long // gting gi bud med
256b3(ti): 'bre bo gdong // chibs su chu klung sngon po zhon// lag na me yi ba dan 'phyar// na bza' chu dar sngon po go na// nag mo chu mdos sra ma len ma// de ring nag mo chu mdos long //
256b4(ti): mun mtsho khrag gi ga ting bdud mo// nag mo chu ba du da sha zan ma// bzhugs ni rgya mtsho'i gting na bzhugs// kha rlangs nag po gnam du gtong // chibs su chu sram nag po
256b5(ti): zhon/ nag mo mdos bdag sram bdog ma// mtsho bdud rgyal mo glud kyi bdag/ na bza' chu bya'i thul pa gsol// nag mo 'bring mig gting bdud mo// chu mtsho mer nag
256b6(ti): gting na bzhugs// yar 'gro mar 'gro chu gzhung zhon// rol du chu sram sngon po khrid// me bzhur zhon zhing rjes rnyog ma// ribs po 'thibs pa'i bdud dang sdong // nag
256b7(ti): mo'i rdzong mdzes drod pa long // khyi phag sha zan glud mig lus// lus la chu gri'i mtshon gon no// rol mtsho bdun gyi gting myul zhing // rgya mtsho kha yi rlabs gcod ma/
257a1(ti): chibs su chu srin bi ra la zhon// do nub rdzing mdos chu mdos long // khyod ni chu bdu rdzing gi bdag/ nag mo chu mdos 'di yis bskang // nag mo chu kha la
257a2(ti): dbang ba bdun bskang ba'o// bdud mo bkol byang las/ klu bdud bskang ba'i le'u steng drug pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// snang srid
257a3(ti): ma mo mkha' 'gro ni// sha dang khrag la ngad che bas// de yi bskang ba ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bshad du gsol// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon
257a4(ti): cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// hUM/ ye shes tshogs kyi rje mo ni// kun tu bzang mo mu kha la// seng ge dkar po'i sha yis bskang // chags sdang rnam lnga byang bar mdzad// rten
257a5(ti): byed shal gyi mkha' stong nas// mnga' bdag mkha' 'gro seng ge gdong // ba glang dkar po'i sha yis bskang // gti mug nad rnams byang bar mdzod// g.yo byed rlung gi mkha'
257a6(ti): stong nas// 'degs byed mkha' 'gro yang gsal g.yos// thogs med bya khyung sha yis bskang // phrag dog nad rnams byang bar mdzod// sdud byed chu yi mkha' steng nas//
257a7(ti): mthu ldan mkha' 'gro gnyen gsal 'bar// rol pa rma bya'i sha yis bskang // 'dod chags nad rnams byang bar mdzod// rtog bral me yi mkha' stong nas// mi gnas mkha'
257b1(ti): 'gro 'od gsal 'bar// dpa' gtum stag mo cho sha yis bskang // nga rgyal nang rnams byang bar mdzod// mi rtog nam mkha'i mkha' stong nas// rtog med mkha' 'gro bkrag
257b2(ti): gsal 'bar// sha tshon tshogs pas thugs dam bskang // zhe sdang nad rnams byang bar mdzod// khams gsum gsal ba'i yum mchog ma// 'phra men rgya mtsho srid pa'i
257b3(ti): yum// bar snang shol mo'i sha yis bskang // dkar mo nyi zla'i thod 'phreng can// bya rgod dkar po'i sha yis bskang // rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi// lce spyang nag
257b4(ti): po'i sha yis bskang // phung byed sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi// gtum pa dom gyi sha yis bskang // dpal chen thugs kyi dge sde bzhi// zhe sdang sbrul gyi sha yis bskang // srid pa cha
257b5(ti): byed cha snyoms la// ga ti mug dred kyi sha yis bskang // e ka dzA ti spun drug la// nga rgyal ra yi sha yis pa skang // phung byed dur khrod ma ba du na ya// phung sri rnga ma'i sha yis bskang //
257b6(ti): phung byed nam mkha'i rgyal mo ne mtshan gsum// lcags kyi bya khra sngon po'i sha yis bskang // 'dod khams gtso mo ni mtshan la// lcags kyi dre rta rkang gsum sha yis bskang //
257b7(ti): dmag dpon rgyal po bzhi po la// 'dod chags spyang mo'i sha yis bskang // las kyi sring mo bzhi po la// gsung snyan ne tsho'i sha yis bskang // phung byed nyi shu rtsa brgyad la//
258a1(ti): thugs bya nag mo'i sha yis bskang // ba sa yi lha mo bzhi rnams la// dur khrod wa yi sha yis bskang // gti mug nad rnams byang bar mdzod
258a2(ti): bdud mo bkol byang las/ sha snas bskang ba'i le'u steng bdun pa'o// / khrag gis bskang ba 'di lta ste/ hUM/ kun tu bzang mo mu kha la// brjid
258a3(ti): pa seng ge'i khrag 'bul na// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo 'di// kun gzhi rnam shes rtsa ba chod// yon bdag khrag nad zhi bar mdzod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// /
258a4(ti): brtan pa glang chen khrag 'bu la na// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo 'di// mig gi rnam shes rtsa ba chod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// thogs med khyung gi khrag 'bul
258a5(ti): na// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// lce yi rnam shes rtsa ba chod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal 'bar// rol pa rma bya'i khrag 'bul na// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra
258a6(ti): bo yi// sna yi rnam shes rtsa ba chod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal 'bar// lhun grub bam gyi khrag 'bul na// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// yid kyi rnam shes
258a7(ti): rtsa ba chod// 'phra man rgya mtsho srid pa'i yum// bar snang shol mo khrag 'bul na// dgra bo zhe sdang rtsa ba chod// nyi zla stong gi thod 'phreng can// bya rgod dkar po'i khrag
258b1(ti): 'bul gyis// dgra bo'i gti mug rtsa ba chod// rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi// lce spyang nag mo'i khrag 'bul gyis// dgra bo'i 'dod chags rtsa ba chod// phung byed
258b2(ti): sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi// gtum pa dom gyi khrag 'bul gyis// dgra bo'i nga rgyal rtsa ba chod// dpal tshan thugs kyi dgas sde bzhi// zhe sdang sbrul gyi khrag 'bul gyis// dgra
258b3(ti): bo'i phrag dog rtsa ba chod// srid pa chags byed cha snyoms la// gti mug dred mo'i khrag 'bul gyis// e ka dzA ti spun drug la// nga rgyal 'bar ba'i khrag gis bskang // phung
258b4(ti): byed dur khrod ma bdun la// phung byed sre mo'i khrag gis bskang // phung byed nam mkha' rgyal mo ni mtshan gsum// lcags kyi bya khra sngon po'i khrag gis bskang // 'dod khams gtso/
258b5(ti): mo ne mtshan la// lcags kyi dri rta rkang gsum khrag gis bskang // dmag dpon rgyal po bzhi po la// 'dod chags spyang mo'i khrag gis bskang // las kyi sring mo bzhi po la//
258b6(ti): gsung snyan ne tsho'i khrag gis bskang // phung byed nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// lcags bya nag mo'i khrag gis bskang // bas yi lha mo bzhi rnams la// dur khrod wa mo'i khrag gis bskang //
258b7(ti): gti mug nad rnams byang bar mdzod// ces gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang las/ khrag sgras bskang ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu nga brgyad pa'o// // gnod
259a1(ti): 'dul lha yis yang gsol ba// tsit+ta sa yi bskang ba ji lta bu// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// hUM/ chos nyid kun bzang mA kha le//
259a2(ti): sang ge dkar po'i snying gis bskang // bsgrub ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ba sgrub// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// ba glang dkar po'i snying gis bskang // rdo rje rigs kyi
259a3(ti): mkha' 'gro ba sgrub// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// thog med khyung gi snying gis bskang // las kyi rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bsgrub// rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal
259a4(ti): 'bar// rol pa rma bya'i snying gis bskang // pad+ma rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bsgrub// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar// dpa' brtul stag mo'i snying gis bskang //
259a5(ti): rin chen rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ba sgrub// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal 'bar// g+hun grub mi yi snying gis bskang // de bzhin rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bsgrub// 'phra
259a6(ti): men rgya mtsho la sogs te// ye shes ma mo bcu bzhi la// gnam la 'phur dgu'i snying gi sa bskang // bsgrub ni ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgrub// srid pa cha byed la sogs te//
259a7(ti): dman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad la// logs la 'grim pa'i snying gis bskang // bsgrub ni las kyi mkha' 'gro bsgrub// skong ni dam tshig nyams pa skong // zhes gsungs so// bdud
259b1(ti): mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las/ snang srid snying gis bskang ba'i le'u steng dgu pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// yang dag rdzogs
259b2(ti): kyis bka' stsal pa// ye shes tshogs kyi rje mo la// seng ge dkar mo'i thod nang du// bam gyi snying khrag blugs la dbul// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// rnam par shes
259b3(ti): pa'i rten phrog cig/ nyid bzhi mu kha le b+h+yo/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// ba na glang dkar po'i thod pa ru// dri za'i snying khrag blugs la 'bul// dam nyams sdang ba'i
259b4(ti): dgra bo yi// gzugs kyi phung po rtsa ba tshod// 'gris mu kha ha b+h+yo/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// thog med khyung gi thod pa ru// gnod sbyin snying khrag blugs la dbus/
259b5(ti): dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// 'du byed phung po'i dkyil du rgyob// bi yang yang te b+h+yo/ rtag pa'i rgyal po gnyen gsal 'bar// rol pa rma bya'i thod pa ru// klu bdud snying
259b6(ti): khrag blugs la 'bu la// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// 'du shes phung po'i dkyil du rgyo ba// bi sa san ti b+h+yo/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar// dpa' brtul stag
259b7(ti): mo'i thod pa ru// gshin rje'i snying khrag blugs la dbul// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// tshor ba'i phung po'i dkyil du rgyob// dza la b+ha ra ma ha b+h+yo/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag
260a1(ti): gsal 'bar// rabs chad nag pa'i thod pa ru// brgya byin snying khrag blugs la dbul// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// rnam shes 'dung po'i rtsa
260a2(ti): ba chod// ma hA lan te ha b+h+yo/ ye shes ma mo bcu bzhi la// gnam la 'phur dgu'i thod pa ru// khrag sna stong gis bkang la dbum// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi//
260a3(ti): rnam shes tshogs brgyad rtsa ba chod// badz+ra kro d+hi shwa ri b+ha ga pad+ma rgya hUM b+h+yo/ srid pa'i sman mo thams cad la// logs la 'grim dgu'i thod pa ru// khrag sna stong gis bkang
260a4(ti): la 'bul// dam nyams sdang ba'i dgra bo yi// snga phung thal ba bzhin du thong // oM badz+ra dza khra ma mu ra na b+h+yo/ zhes gsungs so// bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las/ thod
260a5(ti): zor gyi le'u ste drug cu pa'o// // de nas gtor mas bskang ba spyi dang 'thun no// smon gyis bskang ba ni spyi dang 'thun pa 'di lta ste/ chos nyid yangs pa'i
260a6(ti): klong dkyil nas// kun tu bzang mo mu kha le// g+hi waM sman gyi thugs dam bskang // yams nad sna tshogs zlog tu gsol// me long ye shes klong dkyil nas// rtag pa'i rgyal
260a7(ti): mo rnam snang gas la// ga bur sman gyis thugs dam bskang // rus pa'i nad rnams zlog tu gsol// mnyam nyid ye shes klong dkyil nas// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gas la
260b1(ti): 'a ba ra// dza ti sman gyi sa thugs dam pa skang // mkhris pa'i nad rnams zlog tu gsol// so sor kun rtog klong dkyil nas// rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal 'a ba ra// li
260b2(ti): shi sman gyis thugs dam bskang // khrag nad thams cad zlog tu gsol// bya grub ye shes klong dkyil nas// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// gur kum sman gyi sa
260b3(ti): thugs dam bskang // rlung nad thams cad zlog tu gsol// stong nyid ye shes klong dkyil nas// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bklag gsal 'bar// cu gang sman gyis thugs dam
260b4(ti): bskang // rims nad sna tshogs zlog tu gsol// mkha' 'gro 'dus pa'i klong dkyil nas// ye shas ma mo bcu bzhi la// sman sna stong gis thugs dam bskang // ma
260b5(ti): mo 'dus pa'i klong dkyil nas// ma mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad lnga// sman sna tshogs pa'i thugs dam bskang // rims nad thams cad zlog tu gsol// zhes gsungs so//
260b6(ti): bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las/ sman gyis bskang ba'i le'u ste drug cu ri gcig pa'o// // gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// rnal 'byor dam tshig
260b7(ti): nyams gyur na// de yis bskang ba ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba 'di'o// hUM/ ri rab bum pa'i rtse mo na//
261a1(ti): yum chen kun tu bzang mo bzhugs// spos dang mar mes thugs dam bskang // rnal 'byor sku gsung thugs kyi// dam tshig nyams pa bskang du
261a2(ti): gsol/ ri ra ba bum pa'i shar phyogs na// yum cig mkha' 'gro rnam snang bzhugs// spos dang mar mes thugs dam bskang // rnal 'byor spyad par bya ba yi// dam
261a3(ti): tshig nyams pa skad du gsol// ri rab bum pa'i lho phyogs na// yum che na mkha' 'gro 'od gsal bzhugs// spos dang mar mes thugs dam bskang // rnal 'byor mi
261a4(ti): spang rnam lnga nyams pa byang ba ra mdzod// ri rab bum pa'i nub phyogs na// yum cig mkha' 'gro ga nye na gas la bzhugs// spos dang ma ra mes thugs dam bskang // rnam
261a5(ti): 'byor dang du blang ba yis// dam tshig nyams pa byang bar mdzod// ri rab bum pa'i byang phyogs na// yum cig mkha' 'gro yang gsal ba zhugs// spos dang mar mes
261a6(ti): thugs dam bskang // rnal 'byor shes bya'i dam tshig nyams pa byung bar mdzod// ri rab bum pa'i byang sha ra nas// yum cig mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal bzhugs// spos
261a7(ti): dang mar mes thugs dam bskang // rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i dam tshig nyams pa byang bar mdzod// ri rab bang rim gnyis pa la// ye shes rje mo bcu bzhi bzhugs// spos
261b1(ti): dang mar mas thugs dam bskang // yan lag dam tshig stong dang rtsa brgyad nyams pa byang bar mdzod// ri rab bang rim gsum pa la// sman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad bzhugs//
261b2(ti): spos dang mar mes thugs dam bskang // rnal 'byor bsgrub pa bdag cag gi/ sngags kyi dam tshig sa ma ya// 'bum sde nyams pa bskang du gsol// snang srid ma mor bgrangs
261b3(ti): pa sa// spos dang mar mes thugs dam bskang // skongs gyur dbang dang dngos grub gsol// zhes gsungs so// bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las/ dam tshig nyams pa
261b4(ti): bskang ba'i le'u ste drug cu re gnyis pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// phur pas bskang ba ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka'
261b5(ti): stsa la pa// hUM ri rab gling bzhi bzhengs pa la// phur pa stong gis bskor ba ni// snang srid ma mo'i thugs dam pa skang // sdang dgra gnod bgegs pasgral du gsol//
261b6(ti): hUM/ lkugs sna lnga yis phur pa la// mthing nag dar gyi cod pa na btags// skong ni kun tu bzang mo skong // bskul ni mkha' drug rgya la mo bskul// dgra bgegs rnam shes
261b7(ti): phung po'i rtsa ba chod// nyid bzhi mu kha le kI li ya mA ra ya rbad/ hUM/ tsa na dan dkar po'i phur ba la// dkar po dar gyi cod pan btags// rnam snang gsal gyi thugs dam
262a1(ti): bskung // rdo rje rigs kyi ma mo bskul// dgra bgegs gzugs phung rtsa ba rjod// 'gris mu kha kI la ma ra ya rbad/ hUM/ mdze mo dag gi phur
262a2(ti): pa la// le brgan dmar po'i cod pan btags// gnyen gsal 'bar gyi thugs dam bzang // pad+ma rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bskul// dgra bgegs 'du shes phung po'i rtsa
262a3(ti): byAts+tshed/ kha si san ti kI la ya mA ra ya rbad/ hUM/ sbyar ba dag gi phur pa la// ser po dag gi cod pan btags// yang gsal g.yos kyi thugs dam bskang // las
262a4(ti): kyi rigs kyi mkha' 'gro bskul// dgra bgegs 'du byed phung po rtsa ba chod// bi yang yang te kI la ya ma ra ya rbad/ hUM/ sher shing nag po'i phur pa la// za 'og dar
262a5(ti): gyi cod pa na btags// bkrag gsal 'bar gyi thugs dam bskrang // de bzhin rigs kyi ma mo bskul// dgra bgegs yid kyi rnam shes rtsa ba chod// ma hA ya ma taM kI/
262a6(ti): la ya mA ra ya rba da/ ces gsungs so// bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las/ mdos phur drug gi bsad pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu re gsum pa'o// /
262a7(ti): gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// sems can rnams la mi 'tsho'i phyir// gzugs kyis bskang ba ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// gzug
262b1(ti): kyis bskang ba ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig gnod 'dus lha yi gtso// hUM/ dpag bsam shing gi rtse mo na// gser mkhar ser po'i kha chen// yab ni skos rje brang
262b2(ti): dkar rje// sku la gser gyi skrag pa gsol// g.yas na gser gyi 'gying 'khar bsnams// g.yon na srid pa'i rtsibs byang bsnams// dbu la rin chen srog zhu
262b3(ti): gsol// g.yo sngon gser sgyu ma 'di bzhes la// ma mo'i skos ka mdzad du gsol// snang srid cha ma la dbab tu gsol// srid pa ri rab lhun po la// bang rim dang
262b4(ti): po gsar la bgyis// bang rim gnyis pa g.yul bgyis// tha ma rin chen sna lngas brgyan// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad nas// na rag dmyal khams yan chad du// skye
262b5(ti): 'gro 'dus pa'i srog chags ku na// ri rab gling bzhi'i rgyan du bkod// ri rab bang rim dang po la// 'dab chags rgyal po bya khyung drug/ 'dabag shog g.yul bgyis
262b6(ti): nas nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// lus po gser la bgyis te khams gsum dbang du sdud// sder mo lcags la bgyis te 'khor ba dbyings nas 'dren// spyan mig g.yas
262b7(ti): g.yon nyi zla 'khyil// ya mchu ma ma chu zangs la bgyis// khyab pa ye shes sku dang mnyam// yum che na kun tu bzang mo la// sku ni mi mngon dbyings na bzhugs// mkha'
263a1(ti): bzhi bde klong gcig tu 'khyil// zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma// skye 'gro gsang ba'i mkha' la 'khyil// 'dab chags rgyal po khyung drug gis//
263a2(ti): kun tu bzang mo'i thugs dam bskang // yul drug dbang po drug dang skong // srid pa'i byol kha bzlog tu gsol// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// sku ni nam mkha'i
263a3(ti): mtha' dang mnyam// 'byung ba bzhi yi stongs su che// sngar chags rgyal po seng ge drug/ 'dab gshog med par mkha' la 'gro// rdog ma g.yu 'od sprin ltar gtibs//
263a4(ti): lus po dung mdog 'od du 'phro// nga ro'i skad kyis gdug pa zil gyis non// yul drug dbang po drug dang skong // rnam snang gsal gyi thugs dam bskang //
263a5(ti): stobs kyi rgyal po glang chen drug/ dmag dpung bzlog pa'i stobs dang ldan// yang gsal 'bar gyi thugs dam bskang // cang shes rgyal po rta mchog drug/ shugs
263a6(ti): kyis sems can don mdzad cing // 'byung ba ma la dbang sgyur ma// 'od gsal 'bar ba'i thugs dam bskang // dbang gi rgyal mo rma bya drug/ dbu la rin cha na srog zhu
263a7(ti): gsol/ lus po g.yu 'od skar ltar 'khrug/ gzhug ma rin chen thig les brgyan// 'di ltar sems can ya mtshan can// 'byung ba chu la dbang sgyur ma//
263b1(ti): gnyen gsal 'bar gyi thugs dam pa skang // 'dab chags smra shes shang shang drug/ thog med mkha' la 'gro ba'i g.yu yi gshog 'dab can// mi skad smra ba'i rdzu 'phrul/
263b2(ti): lce btags nas// 'byung ba rlung la dbang sgyur ma// yang gsal g.yos kyi thugs dam bskang // yul drug dbang po drug kyang skong // dbyings kyi yum drug go//
263b3(ti): ri rab bang rim dang po la// bcu bzhi kun gyi gtso mo ni// dbu gsum rnam mthar gsum gyi dbu// phyag drug rgyud drug thugs rjes gzung // sku
263b4(ti): mdog cir yang ma nges te// thugs dam rkyen du dbul ba ni// cang shes rta rgyal bcu bzhi la// 'dod chags gtso mo bcu bzhi bskyo na// dkar mo mdzes pa'i na
263b5(ti): bza' la// gzha' tshon lnga yi rgyan gyis brgya na// ma mo thugs dam des skong ngo // srid pa'i byad kha zlog tu gsol// brgyad kyis rnam shes brgyad kyang skong // drug gis
263b6(ti): yum drug dbyings su skongs gyur cig/ rgyud drug kha lo sgyur ba'i byol zlog mdzod// khams gsum dbang sgyur ma mo kun gyi gtso// dkar mo nyi ma'i thod 'phrang can// stag
263b7(ti): gzig ris bkra bcu bzhi la// le brga na 'bar ba'i 'phur lha btags// ma mo'i thugs dam 'dis skongs la// stongs gsum mun nag sel ba'i las mdzod cig/ rnal 'byor
264a1(ti): khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum pad+ma nyi ma bdud rtsi khros pa'i dbang mo che// ba glang 'bar ba bcu bzhi dang // 'dab chags rma bya bcu bzhi la/
264a2(ti): rin chen dbu rgyan gtsug pud bkod// rin chen rnam lnga rgyan gyis brgyan// dbang chen bzhi yi thugs dam bskang // srid pa zil gyis gnon pa'i 'phrin las mdzod// dbyings
264a3(ti): phyug rgyan gyi rgyal mo bzhi// sku mdog sdang khu lha yi gos su gsol// gzha' tshon rnam lnga'i 'od kyi kha chag can// gling bzhi dbang du sdud cing skye 'gro dbugs nyal ma// stong
264a4(ti): gsum phung bar byed pa'i ma mo la// dkar mo ku ku tsa ra bcu bzhi la// rin chen gser gyi khol thag btags// ma mo'i thugs dam 'dis skongs la// dgra bgegs phung po
264a5(ti): rdul du rlog tu gsol// gsang ba thugs kyi dges sde ma// gling bzhi'i rgyal mo bzhi po la// 'dab chags smra shes shang shang bcu bzhi la// 'phrin las kha dog ljang khu la/
264a6(ti): stong khams 'phyo ba g.yu yi gshog 'dab can// le brgan dmar po dbul bcings// mi rkang smra ba'i rdzu 'phrul skye btags nas// srid pa'i byol po bzlog pa'i phyir// phung
264a7(ti): sri dur sri zlog tu gsol// brgyad kyi rnam shes brgyad kyang skongs// drug gi yul drug dbyings su skobs gyur cig/ de yan chad ye shes kyi rdza mo bcu bzhi'o//
264b1(ti): hUM/ grub pa'i rnal 'byor chen mo ni// gser gyi sha po rwa bcu la// lus po gser la bgyis te gser 'od me ltar 'bar// rmig bzhi lcags la bgyis te bdud bzhi zil gyis
264b2(ti): gnon// ru bcu dung la bgyis te dge bcu thar lam ston// mig gnyis she la la bgyis te shel mig nyi zla 'khyil// kha rlangs sprin la bdud rtsi'i cha ra ltar 'bebs// bsam
264b3(ti): gtan lha yi skor yin 'gro ba mi yi glud// srid pa chags byed cha snyoms thugs dam bskang // e ka dza ti chen mo la// dung sha dkar mo chen mo bzhi// la brgan 'bar ba'i
264b4(ti): phur rtser btags// der rje dkar po'i sgra yi ba stad// rin chen ga yu yi thig les brgyan// bsam gtan lha yi skor yin 'gro ba mi yi glud// a ka dzA ti'i thugs dam
264b5(ti): skongs gyur cig/ bdud kyi yum cig chen mo la// lcags kyi dre rta rkang gsum la// za 'og gis ni sgra stan gtad// shel na spyi dkar la dar gyi phur lce btags// srid pa'i
264b6(ti): khung gi nor yin yang 'gro ba mi yi glud// bdud kyi yum cig thugs dam skongs gyur cig/ gling bzhi spyi phud ma dang tshe bdag chen mo la// thogs med mkha' la 'phyo ba bya rgod
264b7(ti): gsum/ lus po dung la g.yu yi gshog pa can// dar dkar la brgan phur lce btags// gling bzhi spyi 'gro chen mo dang // tshe bdag chen mo'i thugs dam bskongs// rdo rje
265a1(ti): gar gyi dbang phyug spun gnyis la// thog med sngar 'jing lcags kyi bya khra ni// khams gsum khyab cing srog gcod las la dga'// gser gyi thig
265a2(ti): les brgyan cing lcags kyi sngar chen gdengs// 'dab chags kun gyi bdud yin kyang 'gro ba mi yi glud// yo ma srog chags nor gyi dbyings mchog ste// rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi

265a6(ti): dkar ral pa can// ne tshe smra mkhan bzhi bskur nas// srin mo bzhi yi thugs dam skongs gyur cig/ shar du shel dkar rgyan dang bzhi// skyes pa rgyan can bzhi bskyon
265a7(ti): nas// dkar mo mche gtsigs thugs dam bskang // lho ru dom bu snying dka ra bzhi// bud med nag mo bzhi ba skyon nas// nag mo kha gla la ma yi thugs dam skongs gyur
265b1(ti): cig/ nub tu spre'u thang can bzhi nas// bse yi skyes bu bzhi dang chas// dmar mo mchu 'jib ma yi thugs dam paskang // byang du 'brong bu dar ma ba ni// skyes bu rgyun
265b2(ti): can bzhi dang chas// ser mo las mkhan ma yi thugs dam bskang // ri rab chen po'i logs bzhi nas// gsang ba'i skar khung bzhi nas ni// dkar mo g.yu yi
265b3(ti): thor tshugs can// sngon mo gser gyi go cog can// dmar mo g.yu yi thor tshugs can// ser mo byu ru'i lan tshar can// gsang ba thugs kyi dges sde bzhi//

265b5(ti): skongs gyur cig/ dkar mo ba sa yi gzhong thogs bdun// sngon mo gsar gyi gzhong thogs bdun// dmar mo zangs kyi gzhong thogs bdun// ljang nag g.yu yi ga yang

265b7(ti): sbyin bdud mo sma na mo la// bse yi bya chung nyi shu gcig/ bdud mo'i tsho gas la bdun tsho gcig/ gnod sbyin tshogs la bdun tsho gcig/ dman mo'i tshogs la bdun tsho
266a1(ti): bdun// so so'i khram kha gzhan du sgyur// ma mo'i khram nad dgra la sgyur// dal kha nad kha dgral sgyur// ma he ba glang bong bu dang // chu glang

267a7(ti): mkha'i lcags mig tshon bzhis spras// dar dang za 'og rgyan gyi sa brgyan// ri rab bum pa'i byang shar du// mkha' 'gro bkrag la gur du 'bul// nam mkha' dung
267b1(ti): mig tshon bzhis spras// da ra sna lnga yis rtse la brgyan// nam mkha' g.yu mig tshon bzhis spras// dar sna sngon pos rtse la brgya na// nam mkha' zangs mig tshon
267b2(ti): bzhis spras// dar sna dmar pos rtse la brgyan// nam mkha' gser mig tshon bzhis spras// dar sna ser pos rtsel brgyan// ri rab kha khyer phyogs bzhi ru//
267b3(ti): yum bzhi 'thun pa'i gur du 'bu la// nam mkha' lcags mig tshon bzhis smras// ga nam la phur dgu'i sgo yis brgyan// srid pa bde 'gro'i gur du 'bul//

267b6(ti): mkha' gser mig tshon bzhi sa spras// gan ma la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis spras// bang rim gnyis pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// sbas pa'i ma bzhis gur du 'bu la// dkar
267b7(ti): sngo dmar ser tshon bzhis spras// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgo yis brgyan// khang rim gnyis pa'i mtshams bzhi ru// thugs kyi dges sde bzhi yi gur du 'bul//
268a1(ti): dkar mo g.yu yi chud 'khor can// zangs kyi 'od dang ldan pa ni// bang rim gsum pa'i shar lho ru// shel 'phreng can gyi gur du 'bul/

268a7(ti): dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// bang ri ma gsum pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// srin mo ma bzhi'i gu ra du 'bu la// nam mkha' lcags mig tshon bzhis spras/ ga na ma la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis

268b3(ti): mkha' gsar sham can// ga ser gyi nam mkha' g.yu sha ma can// ga na ma la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// bang rim gsum pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// dmag gi rgyal mo'i gur
