268b5(ti): nam mkha' dkar mo zang ma drug/ dung mig zangs kyi sham bu can dang bdun// gnam la 'phur dgu'i sgra yis brgya na// lcags ri tha ma'i shar phyogs su// rdo rje rigs kyi
268b6(ti): ma bdun gu ra du 'bul// nam mkha'i sngon mo zangs ma drug/ g.yu mig gsar sham can dang ba dun// ga na ma la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// lcags ri tha ma'i lho phyogs su//
268b7(ti): rin chen rigs kyi ma ba du na gur du 'bul// nam mkha' dmar mo zangs ma bdun// zangs mig dung sha ma can dang bdun// ga na ma la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan//
269a1(ti): lcags ri tha ma'i nub phyogs su// pad+ma rigs kyi ma bdun gur du 'bul// nam mkha' gser mo zangs ma drug/ gser mig g.yu sha ma can dang
269a2(ti): bdun/ ga nam la 'phur dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// lcags ri tha ma'i byang phyogs na// las kyi rigs kyi ma bdun gur du 'bul// lcags kyi nam mkha' g.yu yi sham bu mig
269a3(ti): bzhi/ dung gi nam mkha' g.yu sha ma bzhi// zangs kyi nam mkha' g.yu sham bzhi// brtan ma bcu gnyis gur du 'bul// nam mkha' dag ni zangs ma bzhi// gnam
269a4(ti): la 'phu ra dgu'i sgro yis brgyan// bang rim gsum pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// srin mo bzhi yi gu ra du 'bu la// ba skang yang bskang ste mchod kyang mchod// bskang mchod gnas
269a5(ti): 'dir gshegs su gsol// khyed kyi thugs dam bdag skong na// bdag gis bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// lcags kyi nam mkha' mthing nag 'di// gsar gyi 'od kyis
269a6(ti): brgyan pa dgu// bdud mo dgu yi gur du 'bu la// 'bri yi nam mkha' zang sha ma bzhi// mi sring bzhi yi gur du 'bul// rtsid pa'i nam mkha' dung sham bzhi// chu srin
269a7(ti): bzhi yi gur du 'bul// rtsid pa'i nam mkha' gser sha ma bzhi// g.yu yi 'od dang ldan pa ni// shing srin bzhi yi gur du 'bul// ra ba la nam mkha' zangs mig bzhi//
269b1(ti): sa srin bzhi yi gur du 'bul// de yi nam mkha' rtsid sham bzhi// phud bdag bzhi yi gur du 'brul// nam mkha' nag mo g.yu mig ma// ra ba la dkar po'i sha mu bu can//
269b2(ti): bdud mo nyag gcig gur du 'bu la// lcags kyi nam mkha' g.yu sha ma lnga// kha yi bud med lnga yi gur du 'bul// nam mkha' nag mo zang ma bzhi// dam sri bzhi yi thugs
269b3(ti): dam paskang // ra ba la nag po'i nam mkha' la// 'bri yi nam mkha' 'od ldan la// khyi ba la dkar po'i mtha' chag bzhi// bdud mo khyo mi 'dod bzhi yi gur du 'bul//
269b4(ti): dung gi nam mkha' 'gri sha ma bzhi// bdud mo khyo med bzhi yi gur du 'bu la// lcags kyi nam mkha' zang mig bzhi// bdud mo khyo rkun ma bzhi'i gur du 'bul// lo la
269b5(ti): bu'i nam mkha' bde chod bzhi// dam sr-i mtshon ma'i gur du 'bu la// 'bri yi nam mkha' zang mig ma// dung gi 'od dang ldan pa ni// klu srin chen mo'i gur du 'bu la//
269b6(ti): lcags kyi nam mkha' zang mig ma// gser gyi 'od dang ldan pa ni// gting bdud chen mo'i gur du 'bul// ra ba la dmar po'i nam mkha' la// 'bri yi sham bus rab tu
269b7(ti): brgya na// g.yu yi 'od dang ldan pa ni// klu bdud chen mo'i gur du 'bul// re 'bri'i nam mkha' zang ma lnga// 'brog mo rnams kyi gur du 'bul// re lde g.yu mig
270a1(ti): nam mkha' ni// lho 'brog chen mo'i gur du 'bul// 'bri bung zad mig nam mkha' ni// byang 'brog chen mo'i gur du 'bul// srin bal gser
270a2(ti): mig nam mkha' ni// byang sman chen mo'i gur du 'bul// dkar sral ma dang dmar sral ma// sar sral ma dang sngo sral ma// sral mo sde bzhi'i gur du 'bul// zhes
270a3(ti): gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las/ nam mkha' bskang ba'i le'u ste drug cur lnga pa'o// // gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa/
270a4(ti): de ltar ri rab gling bzhi 'di// ma mo rnams la ji ltar bsngo// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' sku la pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag
270a5(ti): pa// so so'i bsngo ba 'di ltar ro// hUM/ ma tshogs ni gnyan mchod phyir// 'bru sna ni sna tshogs la// 'bru che ni mang po la// rin chen gyi phye bdar te// ri rab ni lhun
270a6(ti): po'i gzugs// gling bzhi ni gling phran brgyad// lcags ri ni nag pos bskor// kha dog ni rigs dang bstun// rgya khyon ni dpag tu med// gling bzhi ni gtor ma dang //
270a7(ti): srog chags ni mang pos bskor// kun kyang ni rin po che// rgyan dang ni cha lugs ldan// 'jig rten ni zas kyis bskor// dkon pa'i rdzas kyis brgyan// mu men gyi
270b1(ti): stegs bu la// rin chen ni gsal bkram ste// byu ru'i skas btsugs nas// spos kyi sa gzhi la// dbang gi dkyil 'khor ldan// dar dkar yol bres te// gas
270b2(ti): ba'i me bus nas// rgyal mtshan ni mang po btsugs// le brgan ni gdugs kyis bkab// dud pa ni gnyen 'phyur zhing // gser gyi ni skye mas bdar te// tshe srog gi
270b3(ti): glud du'abul// chung srid kyi glud du 'bul// longs spyod kyi glud du 'bul// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag ni glud pa zhes shig/ hUM/ ri rab
270b4(ti): gling bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni// ma mo tshogs kyi rgyal mo ste// 'jig rten yongs kyi mnga' bdag mo// srid pa yongs kyi bdag mo la// skye 'gro yongs kyi za byed ma//
270b5(ti): na bza' stong gsum g.yang gzhi la// thod rlon mang po'i 'phreng bas brgyan// lag na snying gi longs spyod ma// 'dir spyon tshe srog glud pa zhes la// mdos bdag
270b6(ti): chen mo mdos long la// glung bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ rdo rje rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// shar phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// dkar mo sprin dkar gos
270b7(ti): bu la// lag na gser gyi spu gri thogs// srid pa kun gyi rus 'cha' ma// 'dir skyon tshe srog grung bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glungad bdag chen
271a1(ti): mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ rin chen rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// lho phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// nag mo g.yu yi gos zul// lag na ma
271a2(ti): yi dkyil 'khor thogs// bskal pa me yi 'od 'bar zhing // skye 'gro kun gyi tshe srog bdag/ 'dir spyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mngos bzhes la//
271a3(ti): glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ pad+ma rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// nub phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// dmar mo khrag gi gos zu la// lag na thod pa khrag
271a4(ti): gis bkang // skyi 'gro kun gyi khrag 'thung ma// 'dir spyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glung bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/
271a5(ti): las kyi rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// byang phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// ser mo rlung gi gos zu can// lag na ne la'i rgyal ba thogs// skye 'gro kun gyi dbugs 'phrog
271a6(ti): ma// 'dir spyon tshe srog glung bzhes la// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ nam mkha' rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// 'jig rten
271a7(ti): yongs kyi mnga' bdag mo// mthing nag nam mkha'i gos zul// gser gyi dril zhags rdeg cing 'phen// skye 'gro kun gyi bkrag 'brog ma// 'dir skyon tshe srog klung
271b1(ti): bzhes la// mdos bdag ni mdos pa zhes la// glud bdag ni glud pa zhes shig/ hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i zo ma rtse nas// snang srid srog gi phud nyul ma// sku mdog
271b2(ti): mthing nag chen mo la// dbu dang spyan ni cir yang ston// rin chen ral pa sna tshogs kyi// snang srid kha dog gsal mdzad ma// spyan gnyis mdzes pa'i mchi ma
271b3(ti): yis// g.yas pas snang srid dbong du sdud// g.yon pas skye 'gro gso mdzad ma// lnga bcu rtsa bdun jo mo ste// skye 'gro yongs kyi mnga' bdag mo// ma mo chen
271b4(ti): mo gshegs nas kyang // tshe dang srog gi glud pa zhes la// 'dir spron tshe srog glud pa zhes shig/ mdos bdag ni mdos pa zhes shig/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes
271b5(ti): shig/ hUM/ che zhe chen mo dkar mo ste// nyi zla stong gi thod 'phreng can// lkugs dang zangs kyi dril zhags la// snying gi zhags pa sdog cing 'phen// sprul pa
271b6(ti): chen mo'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glud pa zhes la// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes la// glud bdag ni klud bzhes shig/ hUM/ che zhe dkar mo nyi ma'i
271b7(ti): bdag/ srid pa gsum char sgrol mdzad ma// lag na shel gyi spu gri thogs// khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glud pa zhes la// mdos
272a1(ti): / bdag ni mdos pazhes la// glud bdag ni glung pa zhes shig/ hUM/ che zhe nag mo khrag 'thung ma// srid pa gsum char dbang du sdud//
272a2(ti): lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams// khros pa'i rgyul mo'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos long la//
272a3(ti): glung bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ hUM/ che zhe dmar mo bdud rtsi bdag/ srid pa gsumo gyi gsos kyi bdag/ lag na bdud rtsi bum pa thogs// khros
272a4(ti): pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas byung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glung bdag chen mo glung pa zhes shig/ hU/
272a5(ti): zhe ljang nag ga nam 'phrul ma// srid pa gsum char ga na sa la sbyor// lag na zhing lpags rgyal mtshan thogs// khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog
272a6(ti): glud pa zhes la/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos pazhes la// glu de bdag chen mo glung pa zhes shig/ hUM/ mtshan ni srid pa'i rgyan byed ma// lag na rgyu ma'i zhags pa thogs//
272a7(ti): phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog grud pa zhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mngos pazhes la// glung bdag chen mo grud pa zhes shig/ hUM/ mtshan ni
272b1(ti): dbyings phyug chen mo ste// lag na zhing gi dbyug pa thogs// phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/
272b2(ti): glud bdag ni glud pa zhes shig/ hUM/ mtshan ni bdag nyid chen mo ste// lag na zhing gi rgyu zhags 'phen// phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glud
272b3(ti): bzhes shig/ mdos bdag ni mdos pa zhes shig/ glung bdag ni glud pa zhes shig/ hUM/ mtshan ni gcig pu chen mo la// lag na mi yi g.yang gzhi rdebs// phung byed
272b4(ti): chen mo'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glung ba zhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pa zhes la// glud bdag chen mo glung pa zhes shig/ hUM/ gling ba ni phyogs kyi dkyil
272b5(ti): 'khor nas// srog sa shar gyi mnga' bdag mo// dkar mo chen mo mig gcig ma// lag na ban d+ha zlum po thogs// skye bar byed pa'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe//
272b6(ti): srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glung bdag chen mo glung bzhes shig/ hUM/ srid pa lho yi bdag mo ste// nag mo chen mo ral pa can// lag
272b7(ti): na ban d+ha sul mang thogs// srid par byed pa'i ming nas phyung // 'dir skyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud pa zhes
273a1(ti): shig/ hUM/ srid pa nub kyi bdag mo ste// dmar mo dbang gi rgyul mo ste// lag na ban d+ha lcang lo ca na// 'chi bar byed pa'i ming nas phyung // 'dir
273a2(ti): skyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glung bzhes shig/ hUM/ srid pa byang gi bdag mo ste// ser mo chen mo las kyi
273a3(ti): bdag/ lag na ba na d+ha rgya gram thogs// len par byed pa'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glung ba zhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pazhes la// grung bdag
273a4(ti): chen mo glung bzhes shig/ hUM/ srid pa yongs kyi sho za mo// sha na sha na ne'u tshogs kyi rje// gos su mi lpags rlon ba gon// mtha' ma mi mgo stong gis bskor//
273a5(ti): srid pa kun gyi bdag nyid ma// zangs sri nag mo'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud
273a6(ti): bzhes shig/ hUM/ ha la ha la gdong brgya mo// srid pa gsum gyi khyim bdag mo// stag lpags ga yang gzhi gos su go na// he ru ka ni'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon che
273a7(ti): srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ hUM/ 'jig rten gsum gyi bya na mkhan mo// sprin dkar brtsegs pa
273b1(ti): gos su gon// lag na mi yi pags pa thogs// a ka dzA ti'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon mo srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pazhes la/ glung bdag
273b2(ti): chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ dngos po cha byad nag mo la// 'jigs su rung ba'i ral pa can// sku stod mi lpags g.yang gzhi gsol// sku smad zangs kyi sha ma thabs
273b3(ti): can// mi phyugs gsod pa'i khram pa ma thogaso// khyod ni 'dod khams gtso mo ste// gshin rje'i yum cig ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glung bzhes la//
273b4(ti): mdos bdag chen mo mdos pa zhes la// glud bdag che na mo klung pa zhes shig/ hUM/ cha byad sngon mo chen mo la// mu tig gos phangs gos su go na// lag na bdud rtsi za
273b5(ti): ma tog/ nam mkha'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glungad pa zhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glung bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig
273b6(ti): hUM/ cha byad dkar mo chen mo la// lcags kyu 'bar ba lan na thogs// gling bzhi nyul byed ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glud pa zhes la// mdos bdag chen ma
273b7(ti): mdos bzhis la// glung bdag chen mo grung bo zhes shig/ hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i gru' degs ma// cha byad dkar mo sgeg pa la// lag na rdo rje kha T+wAM thogs// ha ra Ni
274a1(ti): dkar mo'i ming nas byung // 'dir spyan tshe srog glung bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// grung bdag chen mo glung pa zhes shig

274a3(ti): mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud ba zhes shig/ hUM/ cha byad dmar mo sgeg ma la// lag na chu yi dkyil 'khor thogs// shan ting dmar mo'i ming nas phyung //

274a6(ti): hUMdamag gi rgyal mo chen mo bzhi// shar gyi dkar mo mtsho gtsigs ma// lho yi nag mo kha dbyal ma// nub kyi dmar mo mchu 'jib ma// byang gi ser mo rkang ldag ma//
274a7(ti): rigs bzhi dmag dpung 'khor gyis bskor// kha rdza zangs kha'i mnga' bdag mo// dmag dpon rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos
274b1(ti): bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glung bdag chen mo glung bzhes shig/ hUM/ lha chen brgyad kyi ma chen mo// nag mo chen mo brkam ma dang // srin mo chen mo rab tu brkam/
274b2(ti): srin mo chen mo phor thogs ma// srin mo chen mo dri 'dod ma// srin mo chen mo g.yang gzhi ma// srin mo chen mo gsos byed ma// srin mo chen mo sha za ma// 'jig rten
274b3(ti): khams rnams 'khrug par byed// tshe srog kun la gnod byed ma// mkhal ma snying dang nang khrol gyis// snyim pa shin tu bkang nas su// za zhing rngam pa kun tu rgyug/ ma
274b4(ti): bdun chen mo'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spyon tshe srog glud bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pa zhes la// glung bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ hUM/ shar phyogs

274b6(ti): bzhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mngos pa zhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ hUM/ gling bzhi kun tu rgyug 'gro ste// sa 'og kun nas gnyim byed cing //
274b7(ti): 'jig rten myos byed za ba mo// sa bdag chen mo'i ming nas phyung // 'dir spro na tshe srog glud pa zhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pazhes la// glud ba dag chen mo
275a1(ti): klung ba zhes shig/ hUM/ nag mo chen mo hral rdal mo// thab dang gzhob kyi sdong la mo// mA sang chen mo'i ming nas phyung // 'dir byon tshe
275a2(ti): srog glud pa zhes la// mdos bdag chen mo mdos long la// glung bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ da ni dbang phyug ma la bsngo bar bya ste// 'di skad
275a3(ti): do/ b+h+yo/ ma nu ra ga sha srin po'i chung ma ste// rgya mtsho'i ngos la gnas pa'i smyug nag ral pa can// ban d+ha rag tas bkang nas rdo rjes 'phrug cing gsol// khyod
275a4(ti): kyi bu ni sri na phrug lnga brgya ste// dpag tshad brgyadad khri ra 'gro zhing snying khrag dron mo 'thung // dam tshig srung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog
275a5(ti): sha khrag dbang du sdud// da ma nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsigasar skye mas mchod
275a6(ti): par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pa zhes la// glung bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ pra ma ni tshangs pa'i chung ma ste// ser mo dbu bzhi 'bar ba'i rab pa
275a7(ti): can// khyod kyi bu ni gzugs khams lha tshogs te// tshangs rigs lha tshogs bye ba 'bum gyis bskor// dam tshig srung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba
275b1(ti): kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// da ma nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi'i gser
275b2(ti): skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ ri'u tri ma ni lha chen chung ma ste// dkar mo ral pa 'bar
275b3(ti): 'i thod 'phreng can// khyod kyi lag na tri shu la thogs pas// gdug pa rdul du rlog pa'i bdag nyid ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba
275b4(ti): kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyams
275b5(ti): 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pa zhes la// grud bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ be na pa ni khyab 'jug chung ma ste// sngon mo ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng
275b6(ti): can// mthu chen rnams kyi mthu rnams phrogs nas ni// lag na 'khor lo thogs pas bdud bzhi 'joms// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma//
275b7(ti): 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi
276a1(ti): gser sgyu mas mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo grud ba zhes shig/ ko ma ri ni dbang phyug
276a2(ti): gzhon nu'i chung ma ste// da mar po ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// dbang chen rnams kyi dbang ni sdud byed ma// lag na mdung thung thogs pas kun sgrol ma//
276a3(ti): dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog sta rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdad// de ma nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka'

276a6(ti): dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka'
276a7(ti): dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skye mas mchod par 'bum// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pazhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/
276b1(ti): 'gugs byed ma ni khu byug mgo bo can// khyod kyi lag na lcags kyu thogs pa yin// shar phyogs dri za mang po zil gyis gnon// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje
276b2(ti): mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas
276b3(ti): mchog bdud rtsi gser sgyu mas mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pa zhes shig/ glud bdag chen mo gyud pa zhes shig/ lho phyogs nas badz+ra bi ka la ni rdza
276b4(ti): chung ma ste// dkar sor ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// ban d+ha rag tas bkang nas 'khrug cing gsol// mtshams kyi bgegs rnams ma lus tshar gcod ma// dam
276b5(ti): tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma
276b6(ti): 'da' bor// dam rdzas bdud rtsi gser skye mas mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glung bdag chen mo glad pa zhes shig/ a mr-i tA ni nyi ma'i
276b7(ti): chung ma ste// dmar mo ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// khyod kyi lag na bad+ma dmar po bsnams pa yi// bdud rtsi bum pas sdug bsngal sel bar byed// dam tshig bsrung
277a1(ti): ba'i mchog te rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog
277a2(ti): bdud rtsi gser skyams mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mangs pazhes la// glung bdag chen mo grud bzhes shig/ ser skya ma ni zla ba'i chung ma ste// dkar mo ral
277a3(ti): pa'abar ba'i thod 'brang can// lag na pad+ma bsnams pas gza' skar bzlog/ dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang
277a4(ti): du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dran mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser sgyu mas mchod par 'bul// mdos
277a5(ti): bdag chen mo mdos pa zhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ ba na d+ha haM ni be tshon chung ma ste// sku mdog ljang naga' ba ra ba'i ral pa can// khyod kyi lag na be
277a6(ti): / tshon thogs pa yis// gang la bya ba'i gnod byed rdul du rlog/ dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam
277a7(ti): nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skye mas mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mangs
277b1(ti): bzhes la// glung bdag chen mo glung bzhes shig/ rag shA si ni srin po'i chung ma ste// sdug nag ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// sti rab su drangs te zhal du gsol//
277b2(ti): skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i bdag nyid ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas
277b3(ti): 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' ba ra// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser sgyu mas mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glungad
277b4(ti): bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ bag sha sa ni spen pa'i chung ma ste// ljang khu ra la pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// rdo rje dbyug pas gdug pa rdul du rlog/ mi bzad 'jig
277b5(ti): rten khams la dbang byed ma// g.yas kyi zangs gri rnon pos sgrol bar byed// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang
277b6(ti): du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skye mas mchod par 'bul// mdos
277b7(ti): bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glungad bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ tsa ka la ni rdo rjer mgo can// 'ching bar byed pa'i lag na zhags pa thogs// lho phyogs gshin
278a1(ti): rje'i rigs rnams rdul du rlog/ dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams
278a2(ti): dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skye mas mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos
278a3(ti): bzhes la// glung bdag chen mo glung bzhis shig/ nub phyogs kyi ru ti ra ma tin sto bzang chung ma ste// dkar mo ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// phyag na gshol mda'
278a4(ti): ban d+ha 'dzin// sdug bsngal ma lus gnas nas 'dren mdzad ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam
278a5(ti): nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dran mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo
278a6(ti): mdos pa zhes la// glung bdag chen mo glung pa zhes shig/ e ka tsar khyod ni bdud kyi chung ma ste// dmar mo ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// khyod kyi lag na zangs gri
278a7(ti): thogs pa yis// skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i bdag nyid ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam

278b2(ti): ba zhes la// glung bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ ma nu ha ra ma khyod ni 'dod pa lha chen chung ma ste// dkar mo ral pa 'i'abar ba'i thod 'phreng can// khyod kyi lag na mda' gzhu
278b3(ti): thogs pa yis// dam las 'da' ba ma lus sgrol bar byed// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams
278b4(ti): dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gsar skye mas mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pazhes
278b5(ti): la// glud bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ si ti ka ni nor srungs chung ma ste// dmar mo wa mgo 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// khyod kyi lag na bum pa 'dzin pa yis// gang
278b6(ti): la bya ba'i thig le nor sbyin ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren
278b7(ti): mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skye mas mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag
279a1(ti): chen mo glung bzhes shig/ ba ya be ni rlung lha'i chung ma ste// sngon mo ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'brang can// khyod kyi lag na ban d+ha thogs pa yis/
279a2(ti): phyogs mtshams med par mthong zhing g.yeng bar byed// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra
279a3(ti): bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la//
279a4(ti): glud bdag chen mo glud ba zhes shig/ ma ha ma ra ni smug nag gsod byed me// mthing nag ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// khyod kyi lag na shas rab ral gri 'dzin//
279a5(ti): thams cad rdul du rlog pa'i gsod byed ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i
279a6(ti): snying nas 'drem mdzad ma// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skye mas mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pazhes la// glung bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ u mu ka
279a7(ti): la dmar mo lugs sgrog ma// 'bar ba nyi ma'i spyan can klu 'dul ma// nub phyogs klu dang chu gdol 'dul bar byed// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/
279b1(ti): 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser
279b2(ti): skye mas mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pa zhes shig/ glung bdag chen mo glung bzhes shig/ byang gi phyogs nas ag ne ma ni me lha'i chung ma ste// dmar
279b3(ti): ser ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// gsal shing 'dzin pa'i ye shes ma dpung gis// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog
279b4(ti): ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas
279b5(ti): mchog bdud rtsi gser sgyu mas mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pa zhes la// klud bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ ba ra hi ni sa bdag chung ma ste// nag
279b6(ti): mo mi bzad rngam pa phag gi dbu// phyag na zhags pa bsnams pas bdud bzhi 'dul// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha thag
279b7(ti): dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skye mas mchod par 'bul// mdos
280a1(ti): bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glung bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ tsa mu ti ni gshin rje'i chung ma ste// smug nag ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'brang
280a2(ti): can// lag na zhing chung ba su drangs nas gsol// gshin rje'i rigs rnams g.yo ba med par sgrol// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog
280a3(ti): sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skye mas mchod par 'bul// mdos
280a4(ti): bdag chen mo mdos pazhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ pu ta ya ni byi na ya ga'i chung ma ste// sngon mo ral pa 'bar ba'i thod 'phrang can// ban d+ha ra ga tas bkang nas
280a5(ti): 'khrug cing gsol// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs la mnga' mdzad ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam
280a6(ti): nyams dgra ba'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skyems mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mangs pa zhes
280a7(ti): la// grung bdag chen mo grung bzhes shig/ ru ba na ni chu b+ha'i chung ma ste// sngon mo ral ba 'bar ba'i thod 'phreng can// chu lha rgyan gyis brgyan pas mdzad pa ste// lag na chu srin dang
280b1(ti): ni sbrul zhags 'dzin// gang la bya ba dbang du spyad nas ni// klu yi rigs rnams g.yo ba med par sgrol// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog
280b2(ti): sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam mas ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud rtsi gser skye mas mchod par 'bul// mdos
280b3(ti): bdag chen mo mdos pa zhes la// glung bdag chen mo glu ba zhes shig/ lam po da ra ma ni dril 'khrol ma// ljang nag 'jig pas rdul du rlog byed ma// dam tshig bsrung ba'i mchog ste/
280b4(ti): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// 'gro ba kun gyi tshe srog sha khrag dbang du sdud// dam nyams dgra bo'i snying nas 'dren mdzad ma// sngon gyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar// rdzas mchog bdud
280b5(ti): rtsi gser skye mas mchod par 'bul// mdos bdag chen mo mangs bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glung bzhes shig/ dbang phyug ma'i bsngo ba'o// de nas bas mo la bsngo
280b6(ti): ste// hUM/ grub pa'i rnal 'byor chen mo ni// sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab// ma mo chen mo dam tshig can// tsha ba'i rong nas bzhengs pa ni// mar khu'i mtsho yi gting shad nas//
280b7(ti): bdud kyi bu mo chen mo ni// tshibs su bdud rta ting dkar chi bas// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsom// mthing gi ral pa sha ra ra// ral pa rel phur ba re// dar nag cod pan
281a1(ti): pu ru ru// dbang gi bse khrab si li li// brda ni mi phrad lo bal mo// skad ni mi snyan lngab mi ldag// dri ni mi zhim tshal mchil// gzugs ni mi sdug
281a2(ti): lag brgya mo// g.yas pa brgya ni phur pa 'dril// g.yon pa brgya ni zhags pa ldog/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glung bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ grub
281a3(ti): pa'i rnal 'byor chen mo ste// bal yul mthil nas bzhengs pa mo// sbrad rtsi'i mtsho yi gting shad nas// gzi yi bu mo chen mo ste// chibs su zungs rta ser po tshabs// na
281a4(ti): bza' gser mo'i bar chen gsol// ba se yi ral pa sha ra ra// ral pa re la phur pa re// dar na gcod pan pu ru ru// dbang gi bse khra ba si li li// brda ni mi phrad lho ba la
281a5(ti): mo// skad ni mi snyan ldab ma ldig/ gzugs ni mi sdug lag brgya mo// g.yas pa brgya ni phur pa 'dril// g.yon pa brgya ni zhags pa bsnams// mdos bdag chen mo mdos
281a6(ti): bzhes la// glung bdag chen mo glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ grub pa'i rnal 'byor chen mo ni// mang yul gseb nas bzhengs pa ni// khrag gi mtsho yi gting yangs nas// btsan gyi
281a7(ti): bu ma chen mo ste// chibs su bcan rta dmar po chibs// na bza' dar dmar bar chen gsol// khrag gi ral pa sha ra ra// ral pa ral phur pa re// dar na gcod pan pu ru ru/
281b1(ti): dbang gi bas khrab si li li// brda ni mi phrad lho bal mo// skad ni mi snyan lngab ma ldib// gzugs ni mi sdug lag brgya mo// g.yas pa brgya ni phur pa 'dril// g.yon pa brgya ni
281b2(ti): zhags pa bsnams// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glung bdag chen mo glung bzhes shig/ hUM/ grub pa'i rnal 'byor chen mo ni// spyan nam 'gram nas bzhengs
281b3(ti): pa ni// 'o ma'i mchod dkyil yangs pa nas// klu yi bu mo chen mo ni// chibs su chu rta sngon po chibs// na bza' dar ldang bar chen gsol// dung gi ral pa sha ra ra// ral pa
281b4(ti): re la phur pa re// dar nag cod pan pu ru ru// dbang gi bas khrab si li li// brda ni mi phrad lho bal mo// skad ni mi snyan lngab ma lji pa// gzugs ni mi sdug lag brgya mo//

281b6(ti): pa bsngo ba'o// hUM/ dgung sngon mtho yi yar stangs nas// nam mkha'i rgyal mo ting lo sman// sku ni dril lo 'bar ba 'dra// zhal ni sku btsun sgrol ma yis//
281b7(ti): dbu la g.yu yi thod gdeng can// mu tig mdzes pa'i zhugs 'bar can// phyag na ga nam lcags snying khrag thogs// sbyin gyi gos su mdzes brgyan gsol// chi bas
282a1(ti): su sprin dkar yud la chi bas// 'khor du gnam sman mang pos bskor// rol du nyi zla gnyen gyis rol// gdan du skar ma smin bdun 'dis// dgra

282a3(ti): chos dbyar mo sil// na bza' spang rgyan gos zul// u chos mdzes pa'i sug ma gtang // rus sbal dkar po'i thod gdeng can// chibs su snar chung sha mo chibs//

282a6(ti): zla'i spyan// che zhe sring cig dpal mo bstan// na bza' smug mo mi 'bar gsol// gser gyi thod rdengs thor tshugs can// phyag na khrag gi bum pa bsnams// chibs
282a7(ti): su kong rta nag chung chi bas// 'khor du kong btsun mang pos bskor// rol du bdud bya mang mo mnga'// ya ka dam nyams snying nas drongs// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pazhes

282b2(ti): bair chen dgu brtsegs gsol// dbul g.yu yi thod rjengs can// phyag na gser gyi nya mo bsnams// tshabs su kong rta kha dkar chi bas// 'khor du ma bdud tshogs kyis bkos

282b5(ti): brgyan gsol// rin chen mang po'i thod rdengs can// lag na mi khrag bsngal mo khyer// chibs su sras mo shad la tshabs// 'khor du spang sman 'bum gyis bskor//
282b6(ti): rol du brag srin mang po khrid// dgra bo dam nyams snyid nas drongs// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glung bdag chen mo krungad bzhes shig/ hUM/ lho nub
282b7(ti): mtshams kyi 'khor 'dul ma// gsang ri sngon po'i rtse ri nas// lho yi sbyin mthing g.ya' ma skyong // g.yu bu na dan sa bya bu na 'phrul// na bza' sprin dkar zab
283a1(ti): gsom// shes kyi thod rdeng thor tshugs can// phyag na dung gi 'phreng ba bsnams/ chibs su ser mo mdo long chibs// 'khor du klog char

283a3(ti): nub phyogs ngos kyi 'khor 'dul mo// mnga' la spyi bdud gangs rtse nas// mkha' la spyi bdud dpal gyi yum// na bza' btsos dang mu men gsol// gsar
283a4(ti): ga yu spras pa'i thod 'phreng can// phyag na mda' bzang g.yab dar thogs// chibs su bya chen lcog mo chi bas// 'khor du rgyu skar mang pos bskor// rol du gza'
283a5(ti): chen brgyad dang bcas// dgra bo dam nyams snying nas drongs// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag che na mo glung ba zhes shig/ hUM/ nub byang
283a6(ti): mtshams kyi 'khor 'dul ma// gangs dkar mthon po'i rtse nas kyang // grangs kyi yum chen g.yu 'bum ma// che zhe gangs dkar sha med ma// na bza' btsos dang
283a7(ti): ral dkar gsol// dar chan yug gis brgyan pa gsol// dbu la g.yu yi thod rdeng can// phyag na gser gyi sman sha bsnams// chibs su rkyang bu kha dkar chibs/
283b1(ti): 'khor du gnam sman 'bum gyis bskor// rol du glog dang me wu khrid// dgra bo dam nyams snying nas drongs// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pazhes la// glud bdag

283b3(ti): g.yag lpags gsol// lcags kyi thod rdang thor tshugs can// phyag na gser gyi cha lang thogs// chibs su dom bu smin nag chibs// 'khor du byang sman 'bum
283b4(ti): gyis bskor// rol du skar mda' glog ltar 'phen// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pa zhas la// glud bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ byang shar mtshams kyi
283b5(ti): 'khor 'dul ma// g.ya' ri sngon mo'i ljongs dag nas// khrag 'thung mon mo ga yu dril ma/ na bza' sprin dkar brtsegs ma la// mu tig g.yu dril mang pos
283b6(ti): brgyun// mthing nag go tshe yol ba bsko na// phyag na mu tig tshar gsum bsnams// 'khor du g.ya' sman 'bum gyis bskor// rol du bu yug dud ltar 'thub//
283b7(ti): mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes la// glud bdag chen mo glungad bzhes shig/ lho phyogs spang snar mthon po nas// dan ting shes chags sman cig ma// mi g.yo
284a1(ti): brtan pa'i sa 'dzin ma// na bza' bcos kyi gos zul// gser gyi byang bu 'bum gyis brgyan// gser gyi thod rdeng thor tshugs can/

284a3(ti): mo mdos pa zhes la// glud bdag chen mo glud pa zhes shig/ hUM/ nub phyogs spang snar mthon po nas// sbyin mthing gangs kyi pha rol sman// kha nas me 'bar rgya
284a4(ti): mtsho skems// mi sha khrag la longs spyod cing // na bza' bya rgod thul pa gsol// dkar mo mig gcig lcags kyi mche ba can// lag na mi mgo rlon pa thogs//
284a5(ti): chibs su chu srin dmar po chibs// 'khor du klu srin mang pos bskor// rol du nya mo 'bum dang bcas// bka' yi gtor ma 'di long la// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par
284a6(ti): mdzod// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pazhes la// glung bdag chen mo glung bzhes shig/ ces gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las/ gling bzhi la che ba'i yon
284a7(ti): tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa dang ma mo rnams la mdos so sor bsngo ba bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu re drug pa'o// // gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol ba// snang srid ma
284b1(ti): mo mkha' 'grol// rdzong brdab cho ga ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang // gang dag
284b2(ti): rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul sems dpa' khyod// hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'di la ma tshang dgu cig tshang // snod kyi 'jig rten 'di
284b3(ti): la chang // bcud kyi sems can 'di la tshang // snang srid ma mo mkha' 'grol// 'thun pa'i rdzas su 'bul lags na// thugs dam gnas su song bar mdzad// / ri rab bang
284b4(ti): rim dang po ni// chos kyi sku yi don dang ldan// rtsal gyi rgyal po seng ge drug/ ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// stobs kyi rgyal po glang chen drug/ ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs//
284b5(ti): shugs kyi rgyal po rta mchog drug/ ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// dbang gi rgyal mo rma bya drug/ ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// 'dab chags rgyal po shang shang drug/ ma
284b6(ti): mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// mkha' lding rgyal po bya khyung drug/ ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// ri rab bang rim par pa la// shugs kyi rgyal rta bcu bzhi yang // ma mo
284b7(ti): rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// 'dod chags gtso mo bcu bzhi ni// ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// stag gzig 'bar ba bcu bzhi yang // ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// ba
285a1(ti): grang 'bar ba bcu bzhi yang // ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// ku ku ra tsa bcu bzhi yang // ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// 'dab chags shang shang
285a2(ti): bcu bzhi yang // ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// mdos ldan sman byang bcu bzhi yang // ma mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// ri rab bang rim tha ma la// 'gro drug sems can
285a3(ti): rnams kyis bskor// sman mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// gnam la 'bur dang sa la skye// tshul 'phyo ba'i rdzas rnams ni// sman mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// 'di na spyan
285a4(ti): mo dgu zhig mchis// yang tshangs pa'i bu mo yis// mang yul la gtab nas// rgyo skyegs skye la dang // sma ra mAs rtog chen dang // mthing rams sngon mo dang // rgyal mo
285a5(ti): khyed la dkor du 'bul// blon mo khyed la rdzongs su 'bul// yal yal bzhad kyi na gshegs// phud phud dgyes kyin gshegs// pha rol la brtan nas// btsod mo yu rug
285a6(ti): dang // zhu mkhan ltebs chen dang // skra mo lhob chen dang // dbyer ma kha che dang // 'bras chen gar ma rnams// rgyal mo khyed la dkor du 'bul// blo na mo khyed la rdzongs su
285a7(ti): 'bul// yal yal bzhad kyi na gshegs// phud phud dgyes kyi na gshegs// yang chud pa'i bu mo yis// 'bru drug sa la btab// smin pa dus su smin// 'bru sna nyi shu
285b1(ti): rtsa gcig mchis// 'bru'i rgyal po rgya sra na dang // sran ma zlu ma dang // yungs kar yungs nag dang // 'bras dkar dmar dang // rgya bra bre dang cu tshe dang // so ba dkar mo
285b2(ti): bzhin bzang dang // nas dang spang mtha' ra ma bu ni// rgyal mo khyed la dkor du 'bul// blo na mo rnams la rdzongs su 'debs// yal yal bzhad kyin gshegs// phud phud
285b3(ti): rigs kyi na gshegs// yang skyes pa dar ma yis// byang sna brgyad nas// sha bla na nya blan nas// sha rgod nya rgod dang // rgo yi sha ba la dang / kha tsha bu la thogs dang //
285b4(ti): srung khrod su pa dang // rtsang khrod nyid shing dang // za mo g.yu rgyal dang // lo ma spang ma dang rnams// rgyal mo khyed la dkor du 'bul// blon mo khyed rnams la rdzas su
285b5(ti): bo sngo/ ya la yal bzhad kyi na gshegs// phud phud dgos kyi na gshegs// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang gi rgyud las/ rdzongs gdab pa'i le'u ste drug
285b6(ti): cu re bdun pa'o// // gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// gdon dang mi ru dbye ba gang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// dbye ba'i tshe
285b7(ti): gangs bstan gyis// nyon cig gnod 'dul g+ha yi gtso// dbye ba la ni 'di nyid do// sngon su dang su yi glud rgyal mo bcu gnyis nas khri legs pa dang bcu gsum gyi glud/
286a1(ti): slob dpon bcu gnyis dang smra blon zings dang bcu gsum gyi glung/ rje bcu gnyis na pha rje yag pa dang gsum gyi glung/ 'bangs bcu gnyis na rgyu sbyor yon
286a2(ti): bdag dang bcu gsum gyi glud/ de ring su yi glud// yon bdag bcu gnyis sngags 'chang rgyal po dang bcu gsum gyi glu/ da ni ma dang gdon dbye 'tshal// mi dang gdon
286a3(ti): dbye ba// yas dang thags kyis dbye// gnam dang sa dbye ba// skye ma sar dad kyis dbye// shar dang nub dbye ba// nyi zla dros kyis dbye// lho dang byang dbye ba// rdzi dang
286a4(ti): dad kyis dbye// pho blang ba skyod de gshegs// zhugs thab ling nge gshegs// ma 'dug zhi ba'i dang // 'dzam gling shar phyogs nas// rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi grong
286a5(ti): khyer na// bzhugs kyi nyams re dga'// gtan gyi yul re bzang // rgyal po sku re drang // blon po khong re lhod// btsun mo mdangs re legs// sras bu bzhin re sdug
286a6(ti): 'dod pa de na tshang // rgyal mo bskyod de gshegs// der kyang mi gshegs nas// 'dzam gling lho phyogs na// rgyal po 'phags skyes po'i grong khyer na// bzhugs kyi nyams
286a7(ti): dga'// gtan gyi yul re gzang // rgyal po sku re che// blon po khong re lhod// btsun mo mdangs re legs// sras bu bzhin re sdug/ 'dod pa de na tshang // rgyal ma
286b1(ti): bskyod de gshegs// der kyang mi gshegs na// 'dzam gling nub phyogs na// rgyal po spyan mig bzang gi grong khyer na// bzhugs kyi nyams re dga'// gtan gyi yul re
286b2(ti): bzang // rgyal po sku re che/ blon po khong re lhod// btsun mo mdangs re legs// sras bu bzhin re sdug/ 'dod pa de na tshang // rgyal mo bskyod de gshegs// der kyang
286b3(ti): mi gshegs na// 'dzam gling byang phyogs na// rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi grong khyer na// bzhugs kyi nyams re dga'// gtan gyi yul re bzang // rgyal po sku re drang // blon
286b4(ti): po khong re lhod// btsun mo mdangs re legs// sras bu bzhin re sdug/ 'dod pa de na tshang // der kyang mi gshegs na// 'dzam gling rgya re che// mgo nag grangs re mang //
286b5(ti): srid pa gru re yangs// pho brang bskyod de gshegs// bzhugs thab ling ste gshegs// ma gdug zhi ba'i ngang // zhes brjod do// mdos dbye ba'i cho ga'o// gdon dang mi ru
286b6(ti): dbye ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las/ gdon dang mi ru dbye ba'i le'u ste drug cu ra brgyad pa'o// / gnod
286b7(ti): 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ye shes rang bzhin srid pa'i sa// ma mo 'di thugs dam bskang ba la// sngon lam gdab pa ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsa la
287a1(ti): pa/ yon bdag gis bshams pa'i rdzas chud ma zos pa dang rnal 'byor pa la mi sgrib par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gdab pa bstan pa'o// smon lam
287a2(ti): gdab pa ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi bzhengs pa la// gser gyi ri bdun// rol pa'i mtsho bdun// tha ma lkugs ri
287a3(ti): khyud mos bskor// snang srid sems can gzugs kyis bskor// nam mkha' sna tshogs rgyan dang bcas// dpag bsam shing dang yul khar bcas// za 'og rigs kyi
287a4(ti): gdan dang gur// 'dab chags sgro dang gcan gzan ras// rin chen sna tshogs 'dod par mdzes// 'thun par bshams te phul ba yis// yon bdag rgyu sbyor ma lus
287a5(ti): dang // bdag cag rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gnyis// 'dod pa phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ 'bru sna sna tshogs bcud rnams dang // ma ra gur tsha'i rdzas rnams dang //
287a6(ti): 'thun par bshams te phul ba yis// bdag dang yon gyi bdag po gnyis// mu ge'i bskal pa zad gyur cig/ 'tsho byed sman gyi rnam pa dang // bla ba la sogs spros rnams
287a7(ti): dang / mar dang bu ra ma shing thog rnams// 'thun par bshams te phul ba yis// bdag dang yon bdag rgyu sbyor gnyis// nad kyi bskal pa zad par shog/ ral gri bzhi dang
287b1(ti): mda' bzhi dang // 'thun par bshams te phul ba yis// bdag dang yon gyi bdag po gnyis// mtshon gyi bskal pa zad par shog/ gling khog phul ba'i yon tan gyis//
287b2(ti): bdag dang yon bdag rgyu sbyor gnyis// phung po'i sdug bsngal byang nas kyang // yul zhing phun sum tshogs nas kyang // skye ba 'di dang phyi ma la// tshad med bzhi dang ldan
287b3(ti): nas kyang // dga' ldan gnas su skye bar shog/ rin chen sna lnga'i gter phul bas// bdag dang yon bdag rgyu sbyor gnyis// rin chen gtar la spyod par shog
287b4(ti): bdag dang yon bdag rgyu sbyor gnyis// skye ba 'di dang phyi ma la// bdag nyid sangs rgyas byin rlabs kyis// sems can 'gro don byed par shog/ snong srid sems can
287b5(ti): mang po dang // sdug cing mdzes pa'i rdzas phul bas// bdag dang yon bdag rgyu sbyor gnyis// ngag gi sgrib pa dag gyur nas// chos kyi longs spyod rdzogs par shog/
287b6(ti): stobs kyi rgyal po drug po dang // shugs kyi rgyal po drug po dang // 'dod chags gtso bo gtso mo rnams// bskyon nas phul ba'i yon tan gyis// bdag dang yon bdag rgyu
287b7(ti): sbyor gnyis// gsung gi dngos grub 'thob nas kyang // 'jig pa kun las thar bar shog/ 'byung ba lnga yi nam mkha' dang // rgyal mtshan me long phul ba yis// bdag
288a1(ti): / dang yon bdag rgyu sbyor gnyis// dug gsum rtsa ba brdar bcad nas// ye shes lnga yi yon rtogs nas// mngon shes drug dang ldan par shog
288a2(ti): ces gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las smon lam btab pa'i le'u ste drug cu re dgu pa'o// // gnod 'dul lha yis
288a3(ti): yang gsol pa// ri rab gru 'degs ji myur lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul sems
288a4(ti): dpa' khyod// hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i gru 'degs ma// shar lho mtshams kyi ma mo ni// srid pa'i dkar mo mi bzad ma// ral gcig mdzes pa'i 'od 'phro zhing /
288a5(ti): g.yas na sa yi dkyil 'khor thogs// g.yon ni dar dkar gur thag 'then// gur nas theg la gling yang bsgyur// gur 'degs gling bsgyur mthu mo che// 'dzam bu gling
288a6(ti): bskor ra re// srid pa'i gru 'degs rgongs sa skyongs// ri rab shar lho gru 'degs la// gur thag thegs gling sgyur tshig/ hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i lho phyogs nas// lho yi nag mo
288a7(ti): mi zad ma// lcags kyi ral pa bsigs pa yis// gshin rje'i khams rnams dbang du sdud// g.yas na ma yi dkyil 'khor thogs// g.yon na dar nag gur thag 'dren/
288b1(ti): kur thag theg la gling sgyur cig/ gur 'degs glud bsgyur mthu mo che// 'dzam bu gling bzhi khyi li mi// srid pa'i gru 'degs skongs so skongs// gur thag theg la gling sgyur cig
288b2(ti): hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i nub phyogs nas// srid pa'i bud med dmar mo la// byu ru'i ral pa gsigs pa yis// klu yi 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// g.yas na chu yi dkyil 'khor
288b3(ti): thogs// g.yon na dar dmar gur thag 'dren// gur thag thag la gling sgyur cig/ 'dzam bu gling bzhi khyi li li// srid pa'i gru 'degs sha ra ra// gur thag thag la gling sgyur cig/
288b4(ti): ri rab gling bzhi'i byang phyogs nas// srid pa'i bud med ljang nag ma// gau yu yi ral pa gsigs pa yis// gnod sbyin khams rnams dbang du sdud// g.yas na rlung gi dkyil
288b5(ti): 'khor thogs// g.yon na dar ljang gur thag 'dren// gur nas theg la gling yang bsgyur// gru 'degs gling bsgyur mthu mo ni// srid pa'i gru 'degs skor ra re// 'dzam bu gling
288b6(ti): bzhi khyi li mi// gur thag theg la gling sgyur cig/ ces gsungs so// bdud mo bkom byang las/ ri rab gra 'dogs pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o//
288b7(ti): gnod 'dum lha yis yang gsol pa// sgo dbye 'brang bsal ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// hUM/ srid pa'i gting
289a1(ti): khams ma gin// rgya mchog ting sgo e re dam// rgya mtsho'i gting na bdud mo'i sgo re dam// de ring klung sgo ma phye na// nag mo mdos kyi sgo bye dang /
289a2(ti): @de ring chung 'phrang ma bsal na// nag mo mdos kyi lam mi rnyed// tsho bdun bdud kyi sgo phye zhig/ lam bdun rgyal mos 'phrang sol cig/ shar phyogs 'o mtsho dkar mo'i sgo re dam//
289a3(ti): shel sgo dkar po thams se thams// dung gi yag shing e re dam// rdo rje rigs kyi rgyal mo yis// 'o mtsho dkar mo'i sgo phye zhig/ g+ho na g.yu mtsho sngon mo'i sgo re da ma// g.yu yi
289a4(ti): yag shing a re dam// rin chen rigs kyi rgyal mo yang // sngon mo g.yu yi lde mig cig/ g.yu mtsho sngon mo'i sgo phye zhig/ nub nas zangs mtsho dmar mo'i sgo re dam// 'dzin
289a5(ti): dmar yag shing e re dam// pad+ma rigs kyi rgyal mo ni// dmar mo byi ru'i lde mig can// zangs mtsho dmar po'i sgo phye zhig/ byang na gser mtsho ser mo'i sgo re dam// ra ga na
289a6(ti): g.yag shing e re dam// las rab rigs kyi rgyal mo ni// ser mtsho sor mo sgo phye zhig/ dbus na dug mtsho nag mo'i sgo re dam// lcags kyi g.yag shing a re dam// nam mkha'
289a7(ti): rigs kyi rgyal mo yis// nag mo sbrul gyi lde mig can// dug mtsho nag mo'i sgo phye zhig/ ces gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang las/ sgo dbye 'phrang bsal ba'i le'u ste bdun

290b1(ti): rje gshegs so sha ra ra// da rje gshegs shar du gshegs// shar phyogs pha gi na// dung mtsho dkar mo'i dkyil shad na// shel gyi gur cig skongs so skongs// dar dkar
290b2(ti): yol bre khyud de khyud// de 'dra'i gur yol nang shed na// bud med dkar mo 'bum dang sdongs// de khyed kyi g.yog mo lags// des ma zan sna dgu la// g.yo ngag cho dgu
290b3(ti): bgyis// jo mo mi byon du re// sgang bu mtho mtho nas// spos chen dud pa gtong // gshong bu dma' dma' nas// dngul rigs dkar po 'dri// rje gshegs de ru

290b6(ti): 'bum dang sdongs// de jo ma'i g.yog mo lags// ma zan sna dgu la// g.yog ngag tshe dgu bgyis// jo mo mi byon byon du re// sbrang bu mtho mtho nas// spos dkar dud pa

291a1(ti): sngon 'od regasal// kha dog sna tshogs ldan// de yis gnas su gshegs// da rje gshegs nub tu gshegs// nub phyogs ya gi na// zangs

291a3(ti): b+hu ru'i ral pa gamigs pa yis// mi bzang po nya 'bum 'phro ma// de jo ma'i g.yog mo lags// mi zan sna dgu la// g.yo dag cho dgu bgyis// jo ma mi byon byon du
291a4(ti): // sgang bu mtho mtho nas// spos chen dud pa gtong // shong bu dma' dma' nas// dmar chen mtshal gyis ri mo 'bri// rje gshegs nub tu gshegs// zlum po chen

291a7(ti): phyogs pa gi na// tsha mtsho mer ba'i gting shed na// bse yi gur cig gongs sa gongs// tha 'og yom bris khyud de khyud// de 'dra'i gur lol nang shad na// bud med rdzing
291b1(ti): nag 'bum dang ljongs// bas yi ral pa gsigs pa yis// byang gi 'brog mo skul byed ma// de jo mo'i g.yog mo lags// mi zan sna dgu la// g.yo dag cho dgu bgyis//

291b4(ti): gtsa mo dbyings nas bskyong // 'khor rnams gnas nas chos// re thag rkyang nas khrol// tshon phur btab pa phyung // byur gyi sha chibs srog la gshegs// nad kyi rlangs
291b5(ti): ba sdud la gshegs// mtshon gyi gru gu brtul la gshegs// 'og phyogs gling khams na// ma la chud kyi yul// rgya mtsho gting re zab// bskal pa thang re yangs//

292a2(ti): bdun// mtha' ma lkugs ris bskor ba 'di// snang srid sems can mang pos brgyan// 'byung ba lnga yi nam mkha' btsugs// dpag bsam shing dang yal gar bcas//

292a5(ti): dang dar dkar yol// mda' dang me long ral gris brgyan// 'di yang chags pa'i rgyu yin te// 'di yang tshe srog glud du 'bul// 'di la chags shing ma zhen cig/ 'di
292a6(ti): la chags shing zhen pa na// 'khor ba ngan song gsum gyi rgyu// snang srid dkon pa'i nor rdzas dang // rin chen gser g.yu byu ru dang // 'bru sna sna tshogs bcud rnams dang //
292a7(ti): 'di yang chags pa'i rgyu yin te// 'di yang tshe srog glud du 'bul// 'di la chags shing ma zhen cig/ 'di la chags shing zhen gyur na// 'khor ba ngan song gsum gyi rgyu//
292b1(ti): dang ra dgu sbyar ba'i zas rnams dang // gla ba spos dang shing 'khun rnams// 'di yang chags pa'i rgyu yin te// 'di yang tshe srog glud du 'bul// 'di la chags shing ma zhen
292b2(ti): cig/ 'di la chags shing zhen na ni// 'khor ba ngan song gsum gyi rgyu// 'thun pa'i rdzas chen shel sgong 'di// srog dang dbugs dang dngas mar bcas// 'di yang chags
292b3(ti): pa'i rgyu yin te// 'di yang tshe srog glud du 'bul// 'di la chags shing ma zhen cig/ 'di la chags shing zhen pa na// 'khor ba ngan song gsum gyi rgyu// phung po khams
292b4(ti): dang skye mched rnams// 'di yang chags pa'i rgyu yin te// 'di yang tshe srog glud du 'bul// 'di la chags shing ma zhen cig/ 'di la chags shing zhen pa na// 'khor ba ngan
292b5(ti): song gsum gyi rgyu// yul dang zhing dang mkhar dpe kun// sgo nor rta phyugs thams cad kun// 'di yang chags pa'i rgyu yin te// 'di yang tshe srog glud du 'bul// 'di
292b6(ti): la chags shing mi zhen cig/ 'di la chags shing zhen pa na// 'khor ba ngan song gsum gyi rgyu// zhes gsungs so// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud las/ chags
292b7(ti): pa dang bral ba'i le'u ste don bzhi pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// mngon rdzogs rgyal po yab cig lags// sku gsum rdzogs pas
293a1(ti): thams cad 'dul// 'gran gyi do med srid pa'i lha// bcom ldan dpal gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal bstod// rigs kyi khro bo mang po sku la rdzogs// khrag
293a2(ti): 'thung rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma mo mkha' 'gro 'bum gyi dbus na 'gying // rigs kyi ma mo bran dang g.yog tu 'khol// ma mo 'bum gyi rje la phyag 'tshal bstod//
293a3(ti): bzhi bcom drug ldan 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// mngon rdzogs dpal gyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod do// de nas mu kha le la sogs te chos kyi sku'i ma mo dang / srid pa
293a4(ti): bde 'gro la sogs pa'i longs spyod pa'i sku'i ma mo dang / srid pa chags byed ma la sogs pa'i sprul pa sku'i ma mo rnams rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das mngon rdzogs rgyal po
293a5(ti): dang lha gnod 'dul la gsang ba dgos pa'i mchod pa phul lo// bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud chen po las/ dpal chen po la bstod pa phul ba'i le'u ste don lnga pa'o//
293a6(ti): / bdud mo bkol byang nam mkha'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba bskang thabs ston pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// / ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung gi ma tshang ba kha
293a7(ti): slong ba'i rgyud do// @rgya gar skad du/ ma ma tan tra tse ta ma e nA ma/ bod skad du/ ma mo lam rgyud lung zhes bya ba
293b1(ti): yum mu kha le la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun/
293b2(ti): mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs te/ de'i tshe nam mkha' la sgra chen po sna tshogs pa dang gzugs sna tshogs pa byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi mu le la sogs pa las la gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i
293b3(ti): tshogs thams cad dang / rig pa ting nge 'dzin gyi mu kha la la sogs pa'i rtsa la gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dang / ye shes kyi mu kha le la sogs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa'i
293b4(ti): mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba thams
293b5(ti): cad dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la sogs te lha thams cad dang / sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin thams cad dang / nyi ma la sogs
293b6(ti): pa gza' thams cad dang / smin drug la sogs pa skar ma thams cad dang / ha ri ka la sogs te gnod sbyin thams cad dang / lang ka mgrin bcu la sogs te srin po thams cad
293b7(ti): dang / gzhan yang lha ma yin sde brgyad dang / lha 'dre gnyen bcu las kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang ldan pa thams cad sgra dang gzugs des bskul nas/ yum chen mo mu la le dang
294a1(ti): sab mngon rdzogs lha'i thad du 'dud par gyur to// de nas 'jig rten pa kun gyi yab dang yum gyi sku mdog dang rgyun la sogs pa de dag gis 'jigs shing
294a2(ti): skrag ste 'dar zhing dngangs bzhin du 'khod do// lha dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yab dang yum la ngo mtshar cher skyes te/ lha la sogs pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod /
294a3(ti): kun gyis bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gnas so// de nas yang nam mkha' las sems can ma mos 'dul ba'o sgyu mthun gyi smon lam dang / las dang ta thA'i thugs rje'i sprul
294a4(ti): pa'ang dang gnyis sgra chen po sna tshogs byung nas/ yab mngon rdzogs lha'i rgyal pos bskul lo// de'i tshe 'jig rten 'dir yang sa char g.yos te sems can long bas gzugs mthong
294a5(ti): ba la sogs bkra shis pa sna tshogs kyang byung ngo // de nas yab kyis yum la sems can gyi dug gsum rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ ha ha
294a6(ti): dang he he la sogs pa'i rol pa'i gsung dang yum chen mo mu kha le la gsol pa/ ma mos 'dul ba'i sems can la// ma mo srid pa bka' stsal na// ma mos 'dul ba'i sems can la//
294a7(ti): ma mo bgrod pa'i lam dang yang // de bzhin ma mo brten pa yis// ma mo thob pa'i 'bras bu dang // sa dang lam dang 'bras bu yi// rtags dang tshad dang ngo bo dang // de yis spangs
294b1(ti): pa'i rnam rtog dang // de la bar du gcod pa'i bdud// ma mo la 'jug gang zag dang // 'di rnams khyod kyis bshad du gsol// de nas yum chen mos gnas der 'dus pa'i 'khor
294b2(ti): de dag la 'di skad ces gsungs so// gsang ba/ cher gsang ba/ shin tu gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ zab pa/ rab tu zab pa/ kun tu zab pa/ zab pa'i yang zab pa/ phra ba
294b3(ti): kun tu phra ba/ kun nas phra ba/ phra ba'i yang phra ba dang / grol ba/ ye nas grol ba/ nges par grol ba/ grol ba'i yang grol ba ste/ gsang sngags ma mo'i dbang bzhi dang / bcu drug
294b4(ti): gi rang bzhin gyi ma mo bzhi dang / bcu drug la sogs pa nga yis bshad kyi/ legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig/ gal te ngas gsang sngags ma mo bshad pa ma shes sam/ le lo
294b5(ti): 'am grags pa 'am/ snyoms las la sogs pas tshul ma yin par bshad na/ mkha' 'gro khros pa'i bar chod ces bya ste/ nga yi mgo tshal pa brgya dang / snying dum bu stong dang /
294b6(ti): lce dus kyi mes tshig ste shi nas na rag tu mched par gyur la/ de bzhin du khyed dang nga'i bka'i gnang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir bai DUR+Ya la sogs pa'i me tog dbul ba dang / bsod nams dang
294b7(ti): ye shes kyi tshogs bsag pa'i phyir gleng gzhi dang / gzhung dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bar chod nye bar zhi ba dang / gnas skabs kyi dam tshig
295a1(ti): nyams pa bskang ba'i phyir/ gtor ma dang maN+Dal tshul bzhin du byas te lus cog tsog pu rab dug nas/ sems ma yengs par rna ba gtad de ngag bsgrims te nyon
295a2(ti): la/ de ltar ma nyan zhing go bas dga' ba dang sgrub par g+hur byas na dngos grub thams cad myur bar 'byung bar nges pa'o// khyod kyis de ltar ma byas na gong gi mkha' 'gro khros pa'i chad pas
295a3(ti): mgo tshal ba brgya dang / snying dum bu stong dang / lus sems gzhan dus kyi mes tshig ste na rag tu sreg par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs nas/ thams cad snod du rung zhes bya ba'i
295a4(ti): dbang bskur nas/ lam rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus lam dbu'i gtsug nas ma mo'i lus kyi
295a5(ti): dbang gi lam rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i sgra dang 'od zer dkar po byung ngo // de bzhin du mgrin pa'i gling bu gser gyi bum pa las ngag gi dbang gi lam rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i 'od
295a6(ti): zer dmar po dmar po 'dra ba sgra dang bcas pa byung ngo // thugs kha'i dpal gyi be'u las sems kyi dbang gi lam rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer kha dog nag po nag po 'dra bar sla
295a7(ti): dang bcas pa byung ngo // sku'i ste ba las kyang ye shes kyi dbang gi lam rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dmar ser dmar ser 'dra ba byung ste/ ma mo'i lam la sogs pa bka' stsal
295b1(ti): pa/ nyon cig skad ldan dad pa can// lam dang smon lam mthu ba tsan pa'i// bstan pa'i sems ldan brtul zhugs ldan// pha rol phyin bcu la sogs pa'i// thun mong bsrung ba
295b2(ti): tshul khrims ldan// khyad par gsang sngags ma mo yis// bsrung ba'i dam tshig ldan pa yis// bgrod pa'i lam ni 'di ltar yin// sku yi lam dang 'brel ba yi// ma mo bskyed
295b3(ti): pa'i rim pa ste// de yang re zhig rnam pa bzhi// gsang ba gzugs brnyan gyi bskyed pa dang // cher gsang dag pa bskyed pa'i spyad// shin tu gsang ba rang bzhin gyis// dag
295b4(ti): pa'i ma mo lam yin te// gsang ba'i yang dag gsang ba ni// gsang ba'i skyed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// de yang 'di ltar shes par bya// gnas bzhir sa la byas pa yi// shar
295b5(ti): phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stangs sogs// rang bzhin ma mor tha dad pa// de la bsgom sgrub bzlas pa ni// rang gi gzugs brnyan yin pas na// gzugs brnyan dman pas
295b6(ti): bskyed pa ste// 'di yis rnam rtog rags pa 'gegs// sman mo lnga bzhin rang bzhin te// tshogs kyi lam zhes de las grags// bskyed pa dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ni//
295b7(ti): rang gi lus kyi gnas rnams su// ma mo rang rang sa bon las// ma mo rang rang skur bskyed de// lus ni 'dom gang gru bzhi ste// g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo la sogs//
296a1(ti): bdud rtsi lnga dang tshon sna hA// yang ma kha dog rnam palnga// kA ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad de/ nus pa thig gi rang bzhin yin// hrIn lag dur khrod rang ba /
296a2(ti): la// yan lag de bzhin rgyan du shes// yi ge las skyed bskyed par grags// 'di yis gzugs brtan rnam rtog 'joms// ma mo bcu bzhi'i rang bzhin te// sbyor ba'i lam
296a3(ti): gyi cha gnyis te// drod dang rtse mo yin par 'dod// rang bzhin dag pa'i skyed pa ni// rang gi lus kyi gnas rnams su// rang gi snang ba'i dag pa las// rang gi khams dang
296a4(ti): phung po dang // 'byung ba rnam pa 'gags pa dang // ma mo sku yi snang bar gsal// phung po la sogs dag pa na// ma mo dag pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// ma mo ye nas rang
296a5(ti): bzhin gnas// de la rang bzhin bskyed par grags// gong gi skyed pa'i dag pa la// phung po la sogs rim de la// rang rang ming gi yi ge ra bsam// de las ma mo mkhas
296a6(ti): par 'dod// 'di ni dbyings kyi yum drug ste// sbyor ba lam gyi cha gnyis te// bzod pa dag ni chos kyi mchog/ de nas gsang ba'i skyed pa ni// rang gi tsit+ta'i gzhal yas
296a7(ti): su// ma mo bdun cu rtsa brgyad snang // rang bzhin dag pa'i dkyil 'khor 'joms// mu kha le yi rang bzhin te// mthong ba'i lam gyi bdag nyid yin// de ltar la ma gsum
296b1(ti): bgrod pa ni// ma mo bskyed pa'i rim pa yin// de ltar gyur pa de la yang // mkhas pas 'di ltar shes par bya// tshogs kyi lam la lam bzhi ste// ting nge 'dzin la sogs
296b2(ti): pas ni/ rang gsal ye shes la sbyor bas// tshogs kyi lam gyi sbyor lam yin// rnam rtog gang gis ma stsal pa// tshogs kyi bar chad med pa'i lam// rang gsal ye
296b3(ti): shes zang kar skyes// tshogs kyi grol lam yin par 'dod// gang las ye shes khyad par 'phags// tshogs kyi khyad par lam du 'dod// sbyor lam mthong lam de bzhin
296b4(ti): no// de ltar bskyed pa'i rim de yang // 'di ltar mkhas pas shes par bya// sems can rang sems gol ba la// theg pa'i rim pa du ma dang // snang ba du mar rang sems
296b5(ti): snang / mu stegs can la chad pa dang // rtag pa'i rang bzhin rang sems snang // nyan thos 'di ltar snang ba la// phra rab rdul du rang sems snang // rang rgyal brten cing 'brel
296b6(ti): pa ru// rang sems gol ba snang ba yin// theg chen 'byung bzhi rgyu 'bras kyi// rgyu ma'i snod bcud snang bar 'dod// kri ya dang ni yo ga gnyis// ting 'dzin sngags dang
296b7(ti): phyag rgya las// lha dang ga zhal yas khang par 'dod// thabs dang che ba'i cha gnyis te// de ltar mu stegs can lha nas// gsang sngags thabs kyi 'dod pa'i ba ra// nges par
297a1(ti): rang sems gol ba ste// shes rab rnal 'byor ma mo yis// rang sems golas las grol ba// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang // rin chen
